USE [DigGameDB]
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[_COM_T_Money_GSLog_Rank]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:07:54 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
------------------------------------
--项目名称: gslogdb金钱排行
--说明：
--时间：2011-05-04 14:51:32 HCH
------------------------------------
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[_COM_T_Money_GSLog_Rank]
@DigDate SMALLDATETIME,				--挖掘的数据的日期
@LSName nvarchar(50),
@BigZoneID int,
@BattleZoneID int,
@TABLENAME VARCHAR(30),
@OPID int,
@PARA_1 int
 AS 
BEGIN
--初始化变量
	DECLARE @SqlStr VARCHAR(MAX)
	DECLARE @year VARCHAR(4),@month VARCHAR(2),@day VARCHAR(2)
	SELECT @SqlStr=''
	SELECT @DigDate=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)
	SELECT @year=CAST(datepart(yy, @DigDate) AS VARCHAR(4))
	SELECT @month=CAST(datepart(mm, @DigDate) AS VARCHAR(2))
	SELECT @day=CAST(datepart(dd, @DigDate)AS VARCHAR(2))

	BEGIN TRY

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Money_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@BattleZoneID+' AND OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Money_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_UserID, F_RoleID, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', OPID,PARA_1,UID,CID,PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
	SELECT OPID,PARA_1,UID,CID,sum(PARA_2) AS PARA_2 FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
	OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_1='+@PARA_1+'
	group by  CID order by PARA_2  desc  limit 0,50'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

	END TRY
	BEGIN CATCH
	SELECT @SqlStr
	END CATCH
end
GO
/****** Object:  UserDefinedFunction [dbo].[f_IP2Int]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:07:56 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
-- =============================================
--说明:IP地址转换成格式化数字IP
--时间:2011-12-25 15:30 HCH
-- =============================================

CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[f_IP2Int]
(
    @ip CHAR(15)
)
RETURNS BIGINT
AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @re BIGINT   
    SET @re = 0   
    SELECT @re = @re+LEFT(@ip, CHARINDEX('.', @ip+'.')-1)*ID, @ip = STUFF(@ip, 1, CHARINDEX('.', @ip+'.'), '') 
    FROM (
             SELECT ID = CAST(16777216 AS BIGINT) 
             UNION ALL   SELECT 65536 
             UNION ALL   SELECT 256 
             UNION ALL   SELECT 1
         )A 
    RETURN(@re)
END
GO
/****** Object:  UserDefinedFunction [dbo].[f_Int2IP]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:07:56 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
-- =============================================
--说明:数字IP转换成格式化  IP地址
--时间:2011-12-25 15:30 HCH
-- =============================================
CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[f_Int2IP]
(
    @IP BIGINT
)
RETURNS VARCHAR(15)
AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @re VARCHAR(16)   
    SET @re = ''   
    SELECT @re = @re+'.'+CAST(@IP/ID AS VARCHAR), @IP = @IP%ID 
    FROM (
             SELECT ID = CAST(16777216 AS BIGINT) 
             UNION ALL   SELECT 65536 
             UNION ALL   SELECT 256 
             UNION ALL   SELECT 1
         )a 
    RETURN(STUFF(@re, 1, 1, ''))
END
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[WSS_GetRecordByPage]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:07:56 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
--===================================================================
--名称：_GSS_GetRecordByPage
--功能：通用分页查询
--输入参数：
--     @tblName              VARCHAR(1000),     -- 表名
--     @SelectFieldName     VARCHAR(4000),     -- 要显示的字段名(不要加SELECT)字段名用,隔开
--     @strWhere            VARCHAR(4000),     -- 查询条件(注意: 不要加 WHERE)
--     @OrderFieldName      VARCHAR(255),     -- 排序索引字段名
--     @PageSize            INT ,             -- 页大小
--     @PageIndex           INT = 1,         -- 页码
--     @iRowCount              INT OUTPUT,         -- 返回记录总数
--     @OrderType              BIT = 0             -- 设置排序类型, 非 0 值则降序
--返回：此条件的记录总数
--===================================================================

Create PROCEDURE [dbo].[WSS_GetRecordByPage]
(
     @tblName          VARCHAR(1000),    -- 表名,或联表
     @SelectFieldName     VARCHAR(4000),    -- 要显示的字段名(不要加SELECT)字段名用,隔开
     @strWhere            VARCHAR(4000),    -- 查询条件(注意: 不要加 WHERE)
     @OrderFieldName       VARCHAR(255),    -- 排序索引字段名
     @PageSize           INT ,            -- 页大小
     @PageIndex          INT = 1,        -- 页码
     @OrderType           BIT = 0,            -- 设置排序类型, 非 0 值则降序
     @iRowCount             INT OUTPUT       -- 返回记录总数

)
AS

DECLARE @strSQL     VARCHAR(4000)            -- 主语句
DECLARE @strTmp     VARCHAR(4000)            -- 临时变量
DECLARE @strOrder     VARCHAR(400)        -- 排序类型
DECLARE @strRowCount     NVARCHAR(500)  -- 用于查询记录总数的语句

SET @OrderFieldName = ltrim(rtrim(@OrderFieldName))

IF @OrderType != 0--如果排序类型不为0,则降序
     BEGIN
         IF CHARINDEX('.',@OrderFieldName)>0
         BEGIN
             PRINT CHARINDEX('.',@OrderFieldName)
            SET @strTmp = ' ORDER BY ' +substring(@OrderFieldName,CHARINDEX('.',@OrderFieldName)+1,LEN(@OrderFieldName)-CHARINDEX('.',@OrderFieldName)) +' DESC'
         END
         ELSE
         BEGIN
         SET @strTmp = ' ORDER BY ' +@OrderFieldName +' DESC'
         END
         SET @strOrder = ' ORDER BY ' + @OrderFieldName +' DESC'
     END
ELSE
     BEGIN
         IF CHARINDEX('.',@OrderFieldName)>0
         BEGIN
         PRINT CHARINDEX('.',@OrderFieldName)
         SET @strTmp = ' ORDER BY ' +substring(@OrderFieldName,CHARINDEX('.',@OrderFieldName)+1,LEN(@OrderFieldName)-CHARINDEX('.',@OrderFieldName)) +' ASC'
         END
         ELSE
         BEGIN
         SET @strTmp = ' ORDER BY ' +@OrderFieldName +' ASC'
         END
        
         SET @strOrder = ' ORDER BY ' + @OrderFieldName +' ASC'
     END

IF CHARINDEX(',',@tblName) >0
     BEGIN
        PRINT '多表查询'
   IF @strWhere != ''
         BEGIN
            --若条件查询语句不为空
             SET @strSQL = 'SELECT * FROM '
                + '(SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER('+@strOrder+') AS rownum,'+ @SelectFieldName +' FROM '+ @tblName + ' WHERE '  + @strWhere 
                + ' ) AS D WHERE rownum BETWEEN ' + Convert(VARCHAR(10),(@PageIndex-1)*@PageSize+1) + ' AND ' + Convert(VARCHAR(10),@PageIndex*@PageSize) + @strTmp
         END
     ELSE
         BEGIN
             SET @strSQL = 'SELECT ' + @SelectFieldName + ' FROM '
                + '(SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER('+@strOrder+') AS rownum,* FROM '+ @tblName + ' '  
                + ' ) AS D WHERE rownum BETWEEN ' + Convert(VARCHAR(10),(@PageIndex-1)*@PageSize+1) + ' AND ' + Convert(VARCHAR(10),@PageIndex*@PageSize) + @strTmp
         END
     END
ELSE
BEGIN
     IF @strWhere != ''
         BEGIN
            --若条件查询语句不为空
             SET @strSQL = 'SELECT ' +@SelectFieldName + ' FROM '
                + '(SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER('+@strOrder+') AS rownum,* FROM '+ @tblName + ' WHERE '  + @strWhere 
                + ' ) AS D WHERE rownum BETWEEN ' + Convert(VARCHAR(10),(@PageIndex-1)*@PageSize+1) + ' AND ' + Convert(VARCHAR(10),@PageIndex*@PageSize) + @strTmp
         END
     ELSE
         BEGIN
             SET @strSQL = 'SELECT ' + @SelectFieldName + ' FROM '
                + '(SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER('+@strOrder+') AS rownum,* FROM '+ @tblName + ' '  
                + ' ) AS D WHERE rownum BETWEEN ' + Convert(VARCHAR(10),(@PageIndex-1)*@PageSize+1) + ' AND ' + Convert(VARCHAR(10),@PageIndex*@PageSize) + @strTmp
         END
END
Print (@strSQL)
EXEC(@strSQL)

IF @strWhere != ''
         SET @strRowCount = 'SELECT @iRowCount = count(1) FROM ' + @tblName+' WHERE ' + @strWhere
ELSE
         SET @strRowCount = 'SELECT @iRowCount = count(1) FROM ' + @tblName

EXEC sp_executesql @strRowCount , N'@iRowCount INT out' , @iRowCount out
GO

)WITH (PAD_INDEX  = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE  = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS  = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS  = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[T_UserStateActive](
	[F_ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	[F_Year] [smallint] NULL,
	[F_Month] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_Day] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_Date] [smalldatetime] NULL,
	[F_BigZone] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_FirstLoginNum] [int] NULL,
	[F_CTNLoginDay3] [int] NULL,
	[F_CTNLoginDay4] [int] NULL,
	[F_CTNLoginDay5] [int] NULL,
	[F_CTNLoginDay6] [int] NULL,
	[F_CTNLoginDay7AM] [int] NULL,

(
	[F_ID] ASC
)WITH (PAD_INDEX  = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE  = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS  = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS  = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[T_UserOnlineLoginRank](
	[F_ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT FOR REPLICATION NOT NULL,
	[F_Year] [smallint] NULL,
	[F_Month] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_Day] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_Date] [smalldatetime] NULL,
	[F_BigZone] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_ZoneID] [int] NULL,
	[F_LoginNum] [int] NULL,
	[F_UserID] [int] NULL,
	[F_UserName] [nvarchar](40) NULL,
	[F_LoginIP] [nvarchar](300) NULL,

)WITH (PAD_INDEX  = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE  = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS  = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS  = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[T_RoleOnlineBaseDig](
	[F_ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT FOR REPLICATION NOT NULL,
	[F_Year] [smallint] NULL,
	[F_Month] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_Day] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_Hour] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_Date] [smalldatetime] NULL,
	[F_BigZone] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_Zone] [int] NULL,
	[F_LoginNum] [int] NULL,
	[F_LoginIpNum] [int] NULL,
	[F_ExitNum] [int] NULL,
	[F_ExitIpNum] [int] NULL,
	[F_OnlineNum] [int] NULL,
	[F_OnlineIpNum] [int] NULL,
	[F_OnlineTime] [bigint] NULL,

(
	[F_ID] ASC
)WITH (PAD_INDEX  = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE  = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS  = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS  = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[T_RoleLevelRank](
	[F_ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	[F_Year] [smallint] NULL,
	[F_Month] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_Day] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_Date] [smalldatetime] NULL,
	[F_BigZone] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_ZoneID] [int] NULL,
	[F_Level] [int] NULL,
	[F_Experience] [bigint] NULL,
	[F_RoleID] [int] NULL,
	[F_Pro] [int] NULL,

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[T_PublicSaleRankFight](
	[F_ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT FOR REPLICATION NOT NULL,
	[F_Year] [smallint] NULL,
	[F_Month] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_Day] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_Date] [smalldatetime] NULL,
	[F_BigZone] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_ZoneID] [int] NULL,
	[F_ExcelID] [bigint] NULL,

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[T_Fight_GSLog_Rank](
	[F_ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT FOR REPLICATION NOT NULL,
	[F_Year] [smallint] NULL,
	[F_Month] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_Day] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_Date] [smalldatetime] NULL,
	[F_BigZone] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_ZoneID] [int] NULL,
	[F_OPID] [int] NULL,
	[F_UserID] [int] NULL,
	[F_RoleID] [int] NULL,
	[F_Type] [int] NULL,
	[F_TradeCount] [int] NULL,
 CONSTRAINT [PK_T_Fight_GSLog_Rank] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED 
(

	[F_Year] [smallint] NULL,
	[F_Month] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_Day] [tinyint] NULL,
	[F_Date] [smalldatetime] NULL,
	[F_BigZone] [tinyint] NULL,

	[F_CurExp] [bigint] NULL,
	[F_CreateTime] [datetime] NULL,
	[F_LastUpDataTime] [datetime] NULL,

)WITH (PAD_INDEX  = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE  = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS  = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS  = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]

) ON [PRIMARY]

EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'编号' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'T_BaseRoleCreate', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'F_ID'
GO

/****** Object:  Table [dbo].[T_BaseParamDB]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:00 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[T_BaseParamDB](
	[F_ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	[F_DBType] [tinyint] NOT NULL,
	[F_BigZoneID] [tinyint] NOT NULL,
	[F_BattleZoneID] [int] NOT NULL,
	[F_DBIP] [nvarchar](30) NOT NULL,
	[F_DBPort] [nvarchar](10) NOT NULL,
	[F_DBName] [nvarchar](30) NOT NULL,
	[F_DBUser] [nvarchar](30) NOT NULL,
	[F_DBPSW] [nvarchar](30) NOT NULL,
	[F_Note] [nvarchar](100) NULL,
	[F_State] [bit] NOT NULL,
 CONSTRAINT [PK_T_BaseParamDB] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED 
(
	[F_ID] ASC
)WITH (PAD_INDEX  = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE  = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS  = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS  = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]
GO
EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'编号' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'T_BaseParamDB', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'F_ID'
GO

GO

GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[T_BaseJobMsg](
	[F_ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	[F_RunID] [nvarchar](50) NOT NULL,
	[F_Msg] [nvarchar](2500) NOT NULL,
	[F_DateTime] [datetime] NOT NULL,
 CONSTRAINT [PK_T_BaseJobMsg] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED 
(
	[F_ID] ASC
)WITH (PAD_INDEX  = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE  = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS  = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS  = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]
GO

GO

CREATE TABLE [dbo].[T_BaseJobConfig](
	[F_ID] [int] NOT NULL,
	[F_JobItem] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
	[F_Interval] [int] NULL,
	[F_RunTime] [smalldatetime] NULL,
	[F_State] [tinyint] NULL,
 CONSTRAINT [PK_T_BaseJobConfig] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED 
(
	[F_ID] ASC
)WITH (PAD_INDEX  = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE  = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS  = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS  = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]
GO

EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'父类型' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'T_BaseGameName', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'F_TypeP'
GO
EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'Description', @value=N'基础信息表-游戏名称' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'T_BaseGameName'
GO
/****** Object:  Table [dbo].[T_BaseGameItem]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:00 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[T_BaseGameItem](
	[F_ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	[F_StarLevel] [nvarchar](10) NULL,
	[F_Vocation] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
	[F_ExcelID] [int] NULL,
	[F_EquipType] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
	[F_VocationS] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
	[F_Level] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
	[F_SuitName] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
 CONSTRAINT [PK_T_BaseGameItem] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED 
(
	[F_ID] ASC
)WITH (PAD_INDEX  = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE  = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS  = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS  = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]
GO
EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'编号' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'T_BaseGameItem', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'F_ID'
GO

GO

GO
EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'装备类型' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'T_BaseGameItem', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'F_EquipType'
GO
EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'职业(简)' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'T_BaseGameItem', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'F_VocationS'
GO
EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'等级' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'T_BaseGameItem', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'F_Level'
GO
EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'第几套' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'T_BaseGameItem', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'F_SuitName'
GO
EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'基础信息表-游戏内容项' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'T_BaseGameItem'
GO
/****** Object:  Table [dbo].[T_AccountInterzone]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:00 ******/

GO
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[T_AccountInterzone](
	[ID] [int] IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL,
	[AccountInterzone] [nvarchar](50) NULL,
	[UserCount] [int] NULL,
 CONSTRAINT [PK_AccountInterzone] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED 
(
	[ID] ASC
)WITH (PAD_INDEX  = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE  = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS  = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS  = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
) ON [PRIMARY]
GO
EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'ID标识列' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'T_AccountInterzone', @level2type=N'COLUMN',@level2name=N'ID'
GO

GO

GO
EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_Description', @value=N'充值区间人数统计表' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'TABLE',@level1name=N'T_AccountInterzone'
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[SP_TodaySync_Dig_GameLogDB]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:00 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
create PROCEDURE [dbo].[SP_TodaySync_Dig_GameLogDB]
--@DigDate SMALLDATETIME,			--开始日期
--@DigDateEnd SMALLDATETIME=NULL,	--结束日期(如果不为空,则为@DigDate到@DigDateEnd的数据同步)
@Result INT OUTPUT
 AS 
BEGIN
declare @DigDate SMALLDATETIME;
set @DigDate=getdate();
declare @DigDateEnd SMALLDATETIME
print @DigDate

DECLARE @LSName NVARCHAR(50),@GUID VARCHAR(36),@SqlStr VARCHAR(MAX)
DECLARE @DigDateN DATETIME
SELECT @DigDate=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)

SELECT @DigDateEnd=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDateEnd,111)
print @DigDateEnd
SELECT @DigDateN=@DigDate
print '@DigDateEnd'
print @DigDateEnd
IF (@DigDateEnd is NULL OR @DigDateN>@DigDateEnd) SELECT @DigDateEnd=@DigDateN

--查看是否运行中
DECLARE	@JobItem NVARCHAR(50)
SELECT @JobItem='_Dig_GameLogDB'

SELECT @GUID =newid()
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'挖掘数据开始[_Dig_GSLOGDB]-数据时间'+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))

--游标开始
DECLARE @F_ID INT,@F_DBType TINYINT,@F_BigZoneID VARCHAR(5),@F_BattleZoneID VARCHAR(10),@F_DBIP NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBName NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBUser NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBPSW NVARCHAR(30)
DECLARE SynDBTable_CURSOR CURSOR LOCAL FOR SELECT F_ID,F_DBType,F_BigZoneID,F_BattleZoneID,F_DBIP,F_DBName,F_DBUser,F_DBPSW FROM T_BaseParamDB  WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_DBType=1 and F_State=1
OPEN SynDBTable_CURSOR
FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
BEGIN
BEGIN TRY
	SELECT @Result=0
	SELECT @LSName='LKSV_'+CAST(@F_DBType AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+@F_DBName+'_'+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+''--链接服务器名称
	print @LSName
--链接服务器判断
	IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM sys.servers WITH(NOLOCK)  WHERE is_linked=1 AND name=@LSName)
	BEGIN--链接服务器不存在
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器不存在 '+@LSName+'')
		SELECT @Result=1001 
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @retval INT
		BEGIN TRY
			EXEC @retval = sys.sp_testlinkedserver @LSName
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
			SET @retval = sign(@@error);
			INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'信息'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
		END CATCH;
		IF @retval<>0 --链接服务器无法连接远程服务器
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'')
		SELECT @Result=1002
		END 
	END
	print @Result
	IF(@Result<>0) 
	BEGIN
	FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
	END

	INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器挖掘开始 '+@LSName+'')

	SELECT @DigDate=@DigDateN
--遍历挖掘开始
	print 'run while foreach'
	WHILE @DigDate<=@DigDateEnd
		BEGIN
			
			
			print @DigDateEnd
			DECLARE @TABLENAME VARCHAR(30),@TABLENAMEN VARCHAR(30),@TABLENAMEP1 VARCHAR(30),@TABLENAMEP2 VARCHAR(30)
			DECLARE @DateDtr VARCHAR(10),@DateDtrN VARCHAR(10),@DateDtrP1 VARCHAR(10),@DateDtrP2 VARCHAR(10)
			DECLARE @year VARCHAR(4),@month VARCHAR(2),@day VARCHAR(2),@NDate VARCHAR(30),@NTableCTE NVARCHAR(MAX)

			SELECT @year=CAST(datepart(yy, @DigDate) AS VARCHAR(4))
			SELECT @month=CAST(datepart(mm, @DigDate) AS VARCHAR(2))
			SELECT @day=CAST(datepart(dd, @DigDate)AS VARCHAR(2))
			
			SELECT @NDate=CAST(dateadd(d,1,@DigDate) AS VARCHAR(30))
			SELECT  @DateDtr=convert(VARCHAR(8), @DigDate,112)
			
			--为什么进行日期处理
			
			SELECT  @DateDtrP1=convert(VARCHAR(8), dateadd(d,-1,@DigDate),112)
			SELECT  @DateDtrP2=convert(VARCHAR(8), dateadd(d,-2,@DigDate),112)

			SELECT  @DateDtrN=convert(VARCHAR(8), dateadd(d,1,@DigDate),112)
			SELECT @TABLENAME='T_UserEnterExitLog'+ @DateDtr
			SELECT @TABLENAMEN='T_UserEnterExitLog'+ @DateDtrN
			SELECT @TABLENAMEP1='T_UserEnterExitLog'+ @DateDtrP1
			SELECT @TABLENAMEP2='T_UserEnterExitLog'+ @DateDtrP2
			print '@TABLENAMEP2: '+@TABLENAMEP2

			--挖掘数据
			print @TABLENAME
			INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'统计数据 表'+@TABLENAME+'')

			DECLARE @Num INT
			DECLARE @SQLSt NVARCHAR(300);
			DECLARE @Parm NVARCHAR(300);

			print '用户登录统计'
			--用户登录统计
			print @DateDtr
			print @F_BigZoneID
			SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_UserLoginZone WHERE F_Date='''+@DateDtr+'''  AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+'  '
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			print 'statistic online user'
			SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_UserLoginZone (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date,F_BigZone,F_ZoneID, F_UserLoginNum, F_IPLoginNum,F_UserLoginDay2,F_UserLoginDay3) SELECT F_Year='+@year+',F_Month='+@month+',F_Day='+@day+','''+@DateDtr+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',(SELECT count(DISTINCT(F_UserID)) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK)) AS F_UserLoginNum,(SELECT count(DISTINCT(F_LoginIP)) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK)) AS F_IPLoginNum '
			print @SqlStr
			print @year
			print @month
			print @day
			print @TABLENAME
			SET @SQLSt =N'SELECT top 1 @Num=1 FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.sysobjects WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE name=@TABLENAME AND xtype= ''U''';
			SET @Parm = N'@TABLENAME VARCHAR(30),@Num INT OUTPUT';
			print '@TABLENAMEP1: '+@TABLENAMEP1
			--??这里查找的表是否对应最新生成的
			--EXECUTE sp_executesql @SQLSt,@Parm,@TABLENAME,@Num OUTPUT; 
			EXECUTE sp_executesql @SQLSt,@Parm,@TABLENAMEP1,@Num OUTPUT; 
			
			print 'out put ：'
			
			IF @Num is NOT NULL
				BEGIN
					print @TABLENAMEP1+'  found'
					SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+N',(SELECT count(1) FROM (SELECT COUNT(F_UserID) AS aa FROM  
					(
					SELECT DISTINCT(F_UserID) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK)
					UNION ALL
					SELECT DISTINCT(F_UserID) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAMEP1+' WITH(NOLOCK)  
					) a  GROUP BY F_UserID HAVING COUNT(F_UserID)=2 ) b) AS F_UserLoginDay2'

					
					SET @SQLSt =N'SELECT top 1 @Num=1 FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.sysobjects WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE name=@TABLENAME AND xtype= ''U''';
					SET @Parm = N'@TABLENAME VARCHAR(30),@Num INT OUTPUT';
					EXECUTE sp_executesql @SQLSt,@Parm,@TABLENAMEP2,@Num OUTPUT; 
					IF @Num is NOT NULL
						BEGIN
							SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+N',(SELECT count(1) FROM (SELECT COUNT(F_UserID) AS aa FROM  
							(
							SELECT DISTINCT(F_UserID) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK)
							UNION ALL
							SELECT DISTINCT(F_UserID) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAMEP1+' WITH(NOLOCK)
							UNION ALL
							SELECT DISTINCT(F_UserID) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAMEP2+' WITH(NOLOCK)
							) a  GROUP BY F_UserID HAVING COUNT(F_UserID)=3 ) b) AS F_UserLoginDay3'
						END
						ELSE
							BEGIN
								SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+N',0 AS F_UserLoginDay3'
							END
				END
			ELSE
				BEGIN
					print @TABLENAMEP1+' not found'
					SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+N',0 AS F_UserLoginDay2'
					SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+N',0 AS F_UserLoginDay3'
				END
			print @SqlStr
			EXEC (@SqlStr)

	--活跃用户 流失 回归

			--删除旧的统计数据
			IF(convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)=convert(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(),111))
			BEGIN
				SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_UserStateActive WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+'  AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' '
				EXEC (@SqlStr)
				SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_UserStateLose WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+'  AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' '
				EXEC (@SqlStr)
				SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_UserStateBack WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+'  AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' '
				EXEC (@SqlStr)
			END

			SELECT @Num=NULL
			SET @SQLSt =N'SELECT top 1 @Num=1 FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.sysobjects WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE name=@TABLENAME AND xtype= ''U''';
			SET @Parm = N'@TABLENAME VARCHAR(30),@Num INT OUTPUT';
			EXECUTE sp_executesql @SQLSt,@Parm,'T_UserStatis',@Num OUTPUT; 

			IF @Num is NOT NULL
			BEGIN
	--活跃用户
				IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_UserStateActive WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID)
				BEGIN

					SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_UserStateActive (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date,F_BigZone,F_FirstLoginNum, F_CTNLoginDay3, F_CTNLoginDay4,F_CTNLoginDay5,F_CTNLoginDay6,F_CTNLoginDay7AM) SELECT F_Year='+@year+',F_Month='+@month+',F_Day='+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',
		SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_FirstLoginTime,'''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''')=0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_FirstLoginNum,
		SUM(CASE WHEN F_CTNLoginCount=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_CTNLoginDay3,
		SUM(CASE WHEN F_CTNLoginCount=4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_CTNLoginDay4,
		SUM(CASE WHEN F_CTNLoginCount=5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_CTNLoginDay5,
		SUM(CASE WHEN F_CTNLoginCount=6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_CTNLoginDay6,
		SUM(CASE WHEN F_CTNLoginCount>=7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_CTNLoginDay7AM
		FROM  ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.T_UserStatis WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_ActiveTime>='''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''' AND F_ActiveTime<'''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@NDate)+''' '
					EXEC (@SqlStr)
				END
	--流失
				IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_UserStateLose WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID)
				BEGIN
					SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_UserStateLose (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date,F_BigZone, F_NoLoginDay3, F_NoLoginDay4,F_NoLoginDay5,F_NoLoginDay6,F_NoLoginDay7AM) SELECT F_Year='+@year+',F_Month='+@month+',F_Day='+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',
		SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,'''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''')=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_NoLoginDay3,
		SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,'''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''')=4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_NoLoginDay4,
		SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,'''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''')=5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_NoLoginDay5,
		SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,'''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''')=6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_NoLoginDay6,
		SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,'''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''')>=7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_NoLoginDay7AM
		FROM  ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.T_UserStatis WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_ActiveTime<'''+CAST(dateadd(d,-2,@DigDate) AS VARCHAR(30))+''' '
					EXEC (@SqlStr)
				END
	--回归
				IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_UserStateBack WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID)
				BEGIN
					SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_UserStateBack (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date,F_BigZone, F_BackIntervalDay3, F_BackIntervalDay4,F_BackIntervalDay5,F_BackIntervalDay6,F_BackIntervalDay7AM) SELECT F_Year='+@year+',F_Month='+@month+',F_Day='+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',
		SUM(CASE WHEN F_LastLoginInterval=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_BackIntervalDay3,
		SUM(CASE WHEN F_LastLoginInterval=4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_BackIntervalDay4,
		SUM(CASE WHEN F_LastLoginInterval=5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_BackIntervalDay5,
		SUM(CASE WHEN F_LastLoginInterval=6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_BackIntervalDay6,
		SUM(CASE WHEN F_LastLoginInterval>=7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_BackIntervalDay7AM
		FROM  ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.T_UserStatis WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_ActiveTime>='''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''' AND F_ActiveTime<'''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@NDate)+''' '
					EXEC (@SqlStr)
				END

			END
			print 'sync login num'
			print convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)
			print convert(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(),111)
	IF(convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)<>convert(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(),111))
		BEGIN
		--登录次数排行
				SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_UserOnlineLoginRank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+'  AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' '
				EXEC (@SqlStr)
				SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_UserOnlineLoginRank (F_UserID,F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date,F_BigZone,F_ZoneID, F_LoginNum, F_UserName, F_LoginIP) SELECT distinct(F_UserID),F_Year='+@year+',F_Month='+@month+',F_Day='+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',F_ZoneID,(SELECT count(1) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_UserID=a.F_UserID AND F_ZoneID=a.F_ZoneID) AS F_LoginNum,F_UserName,(SELECT count(distinct(F_LoginIP)) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_UserID=a.F_UserID AND F_ZoneID=a.F_ZoneID) AS F_LoginIP FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' a WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_UserID in (SELECT top 10 F_UserID FROM  ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' b WITH(NOLOCK)  WHERE a.F_ZoneID=b.F_ZoneID  group by  F_UserID order by  count(1) desc) order by F_LoginNum desc'

				EXEC (@SqlStr)
		----IP数排行
		 
				SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_UserOnlineIPRank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+'  AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' '
				EXEC (@SqlStr)
				SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_UserOnlineIPRank (F_LoginIP,F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date,F_BigZone,F_ZoneID, F_LoginNum, F_UserName) SELECT rtrim(F_LoginIP),F_Year='+@year+',F_Month='+@month+',F_Day='+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',F_ZoneID,(SELECT count(1) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_LoginIP=a.F_LoginIP AND F_ZoneID=a.F_ZoneID) AS F_LoginNum,(SELECT count(distinct(F_UserName)) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_LoginIP=a.F_LoginIP AND F_ZoneID=a.F_ZoneID) AS F_LoginIP FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' a  WITH(NOLOCK)WHERE F_LoginIP in (SELECT top 10 F_LoginIP FROM  ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' b WITH(NOLOCK)  WHERE a.F_ZoneID=b.F_ZoneID  group by  F_LoginIP order by  count(1) desc) group by F_ZoneID,F_LoginIP order by F_LoginNum desc'

				EXEC (@SqlStr)
		----分布地区统计
		 
				SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_UserLoginArea WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+'  AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' '
				EXEC (@SqlStr)
				SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_UserLoginArea (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date,F_BigZone,F_ZoneID, F_AreaName, F_IPLoginNum) SELECT F_Year='+@year+',F_Month='+@month+',F_Day='+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',1,isnull(F_AreaName,''其它地区''),count(1) FROM 
		(SELECT (SELECT top 1 F_AreaName FROM T_BaseIPAddress WHERE ip >=  F_IPBeginN AND ip <= F_IPEndN) AS F_AreaName FROM 
		(SELECT distinct(dbo.F_IP2INT(F_LoginIP)) AS ip FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK) )
		 a) b group by F_AreaName'
				EXEC (@SqlStr)
		END
	----时间段用户数量统计
			DECLARE @ExitTime DATETIME
			IF(convert(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(),112)=convert(VARCHAR(8),@DigDate,112))
			SELECT @ExitTime=GETDATE()
			ELSE
			SELECT @ExitTime=dateadd(d,1,@DigDate)

			SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_UserLoginTimePara WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+'  AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' '
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_UserLoginTimePara (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date,F_BigZone,F_ZoneID, F_TimePara, F_UserNum) SELECT F_Year='+@year+',F_Month='+@month+',F_Day='+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',1,F_TimePara,count(1) FROM 
	(
	SELECT Sum(F_TimeCount)/60 AS F_TimePara FROM 
	(SELECT  F_UserID,(CASE when F_TimeCount=0 AND F_ExitTime is NULL then datediff(n,F_LoginTime,'''+convert(NVARCHAR(50),@ExitTime)+''') ELSE F_TimeCount END) AS F_TimeCount FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK)) a group by F_UserID
	) a group by F_TimePara'

			EXEC (@SqlStr)

			--挖掘结束

			--挖掘数据的日期递增
			SELECT @DigDate=Dateadd(DAY,1,@DigDate)
		END
--遍历挖掘结束
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器挖掘结束 '+@LSName+'')

END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
SELECT @Result=1 
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器出错 数据库'+@LSName+' 信息:'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
END CATCH

FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
END
CLOSE SynDBTable_CURSOR
DEALLOCATE SynDBTable_CURSOR
--游标结束

INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'挖掘数据结束[_Dig_GSLOGDB]-数据时间'+CAST(@DigDateN AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))
END
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[_EXEC_SQLCustom]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:00 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
------------------------------------
--项目名称：执行远程SQL
--说明：SQLSERVER,MYSQL通用
--时间：2012-01-10 11:11:59 HCH
------------------------------------
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[_EXEC_SQLCustom]
@BigZoneID INT,
@ZoneID INT,
@DBType SMALLINT,
@Query NVARCHAR(MAX),
@RCount INT OUTPUT
AS
BEGIN
DECLARE @LSName NVARCHAR(50),@GUID VARCHAR(36),@SqlStr NVARCHAR(MAX)
SELECT @GUID =newid(),@RCount=0
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'执行[LKSV_'+CAST(@DBType AS VARCHAR(5))+'_DBName_'+CAST(@BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+CAST(@ZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+']-条件 '+@Query+'')



BEGIN TRY
--查询开始
	SELECT top 1 @LSName='[LKSV_'+CAST(F_DBType AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+F_DBName+'_'+CAST(F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+CAST(F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+']' FROM T_BaseParamDB  WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_DBType=@DBType AND F_BigZoneID=@BigZoneID AND F_BattleZoneID=@ZoneID

	IF(@LSName is NULL)
	BEGIN
	RAISERROR('找不到此数据库配置项', 16,-1)
	END

	SELECT @SqlStr=REPLACE(@Query,'[LKSV]',@LSName)
--SELECT @SqlStr
	EXEC (@SqlStr)
	SELECT @RCount=@@ROWCOUNT


--查询结束
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
SELECT @RCount=0
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'执行ERROR信息:'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
DECLARE @ERRORSTR NVARCHAR(200)
SELECT @ERRORSTR=ERROR_MESSAGE()
RAISERROR(@ERRORSTR, 16,-1)
END CATCH
END
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[_Dig_UserCoreDB_Money]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:00 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
------------------------------------
--项目名称：挖掘数据库日志
--说明：游戏数据库
--时间：2012-07-05 11:11:59 HCH
------------------------------------
Create PROCEDURE [dbo].[_Dig_UserCoreDB_Money]
@DigDate SMALLDATETIME,			--开始日期
@DigDateEnd SMALLDATETIME=NULL,	--结束日期(如果不为空,则为@DigDate到@DigDateEnd的数据同步)
@Result INT OUTPUT
 AS 
BEGIN
DECLARE @LSName NVARCHAR(50),@GUID VARCHAR(36),@SqlStr VARCHAR(MAX)
DECLARE @DigDateN DATETIME
SELECT @DigDate=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)
SELECT @DigDateEnd=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDateEnd,111)
SELECT @DigDateN=@DigDate
IF (@DigDateEnd is NULL OR @DigDateN>@DigDateEnd) SELECT @DigDateEnd=@DigDateN


SELECT @GUID =newid()
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'挖掘数据开始[_Dig_GSLOGDB]-数据时间'+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))

--游标开始
DECLARE @F_ID INT,@F_DBType TINYINT,@F_BigZoneID VARCHAR(5),@F_BattleZoneID VARCHAR(10),@F_DBIP NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBName NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBUser NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBPSW NVARCHAR(30)
DECLARE SynDBTable_CURSOR CURSOR LOCAL FOR SELECT F_ID,F_DBType,F_BigZoneID,F_BattleZoneID,F_DBIP,F_DBName,F_DBUser,F_DBPSW FROM T_BaseParamDB  WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_DBType=5
OPEN SynDBTable_CURSOR
FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
BEGIN
BEGIN TRY
	SELECT @Result=0
	SELECT @LSName='LKSV_'+CAST(@F_DBType AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+@F_DBName+'_'+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))--链接服务器名称

--链接服务器判断
	IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM sys.servers WITH(NOLOCK)  WHERE is_linked=1 AND name=@LSName)
	BEGIN--链接服务器不存在
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器不存在 '+@LSName+'')
		SELECT @Result=1001 
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @retval INT
		BEGIN TRY
			EXEC @retval = sys.sp_testlinkedserver @LSName
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
			SET @retval = sign(@@error);
			INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'信息'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
		END CATCH;
		IF @retval<>0 --链接服务器无法连接远程服务器
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'')
		SELECT @Result=1002
		END 
	END

	IF(@Result<>0) 
	BEGIN
	FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
	END

	INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器挖掘开始 '+@LSName+'')

	SELECT @DigDate=@DigDateN
--遍历挖掘开始
	WHILE @DigDate<=@DigDateEnd
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @TABLENAME VARCHAR(30)
		DECLARE @DateDtr VARCHAR(10)
		DECLARE @year VARCHAR(4),@month VARCHAR(2),@day VARCHAR(2),@NDate VARCHAR(30) 

		SELECT @year=CAST(datepart(yy, @DigDate) AS VARCHAR(4))
		SELECT @month=CAST(datepart(mm, @DigDate) AS VARCHAR(2))
		SELECT @day=CAST(datepart(dd, @DigDate)AS VARCHAR(2))
		SELECT @DateDtr=replace(convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111),'/','_')
		SELECT @NDate=CAST(dateadd(d,1,@DigDate) AS VARCHAR(30))

		--挖掘数据
		-------------用户活动状态表----------------
		SELECT @TABLENAME='T_UserMoney '+@DateDtr
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'统计数据 表'+@TABLENAME+'')
	
--每天真钱结算	

			--删除旧的统计数据
		IF(convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)=convert(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(),111))
		BEGIN
			DELETE FROM T_Money_Real_Day WHERE  F_Year=@year AND F_Month=@month AND F_Day=@day AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID
		END	

		IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_Money_Real_Day WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID)
		BEGIN
			SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Money_Real_Day(F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_MoneyDeposit, F_MoneyConsume, F_MoneySurplus)
			SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',
			(SELECT isnull(SUM(F_TradeMoney),0) FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog WITH(NOLOCK)
			WHERE F_DESC=''充值成功'' AND F_TradeTime>=''' + convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate) + ''' AND F_TradeTime<''' + convert(NVARCHAR(30),dateadd(day,1,@DigDate)) + ''') AS F_MoneyDeposit,
			(SELECT isnull(SUM(F_TradeMoney),0) FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_TradeMoneyLog WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_DESC=''减钱成功'' AND F_TradeTime>=''' + convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate) + ''' AND F_TradeTime<''' + convert(NVARCHAR(30),dateadd(day,1,@DigDate)) + ''') AS F_MoneyConsume,

			(SELECT isnull(SUM(F_RealMoney),0) FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccount WITH(NOLOCK)) AS F_MoneySurplus
			'
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
		END
		else
		begin
			SELECT @SqlStr=N'update T_Money_Real_Day set
			 F_MoneyDeposit=
				(SELECT isnull(SUM(F_TradeMoney),0) FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog WITH(NOLOCK)
			WHERE F_DESC=''充值成功'' AND F_TradeTime>=''' + convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate) + ''' AND F_TradeTime<''' + convert(NVARCHAR(30),dateadd(day,1,@DigDate)) + ''')
			 ,F_MoneyConsume=
				 (SELECT isnull(SUM(F_TradeMoney),0) FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_TradeMoneyLog WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_DESC=''减钱成功'' AND F_TradeTime>=''' + convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate) + ''' AND F_TradeTime<''' + convert(NVARCHAR(30),dateadd(day,1,@DigDate)) + ''')
			  where F_Date='''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''' and F_BigZone='+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'
			'
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
		end

	    --挖掘结束

		--挖掘数据的日期递增
		SELECT @DigDate=Dateadd(DAY,1,@DigDate)
	END
--遍历挖掘结束
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器挖掘结束 '+@LSName+'')

END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
SELECT @Result=1 
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器出错 数据库'+@LSName+' 信息:'+ERROR_MESSAGE()+ isnull(@SqlStr,''))
END CATCH

FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
END
CLOSE SynDBTable_CURSOR
DEALLOCATE SynDBTable_CURSOR
--游标结束

INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'挖掘数据结束[_Dig_GSLOGDB]-数据时间'+CAST(@DigDateN AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))
END
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[_Dig_UserCoreDB_AccountInterzone_ShopSale]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:00 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
------------------------------------
--项目名称：统计玩家消费习惯
--说明：SQL SERVER数据库
--时间：2013-07-04 11:11:59 Liucj
------------------------------------
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[_Dig_UserCoreDB_AccountInterzone_ShopSale]
@DigDate smalldatetime,			--开始日期
@DigDateEnd smalldatetime=NULL,	--结束日期
@F_BigZone int,
@F_ZoneID int,
@AccountInterzone int,
@Result INT OUTPUT
AS 
BEGIN
DECLARE @LSName NVARCHAR(50),@GUID VARCHAR(36),@SqlStr VARCHAR(MAX)
SELECT @DigDate=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)
SELECT @DigDateEnd=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDateEnd,111)
--查看是否运行中
DECLARE	@JobItem NVARCHAR(50)
SELECT @JobItem='_Dig_UserCoreDB'

SELECT @GUID =newid()
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'玩家充值统计开始[_Dig_GSLOGDB]-数据时间'+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))

--游标开始
DECLARE @F_ID INT,@F_DBType TINYINT,@F_BigZoneID VARCHAR(5),@F_BattleZoneID VARCHAR(10),@F_DBIP NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBName NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBUser NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBPSW NVARCHAR(30)
DECLARE SynDBTable_CURSOR CURSOR LOCAL FOR SELECT F_ID,F_DBType,F_BigZoneID,F_BattleZoneID,F_DBIP,F_DBName,F_DBUser,F_DBPSW FROM T_BaseParamDB  WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_DBType=5 and F_State=1
OPEN SynDBTable_CURSOR
FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
BEGIN
BEGIN TRY
	SELECT @Result=0
	SELECT @LSName='LKSV_'+CAST(@F_DBType AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+@F_DBName+'_'+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))--链接服务器名称

--链接服务器判断
	IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM sys.servers WITH(NOLOCK)  WHERE is_linked=1 AND name=@LSName)
	BEGIN--链接服务器不存在
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器不存在 '+@LSName+'')
		SELECT @Result=1001 
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @retval INT
		BEGIN TRY
			EXEC @retval = sys.sp_testlinkedserver @LSName
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
			SET @retval = sign(@@error);
			INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'信息'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
		END CATCH;
		IF @retval<>0 --链接服务器无法连接远程服务器
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'')
		SELECT @Result=1002
		END 
	END

	IF(@Result<>0) 
	BEGIN
	FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
	END

	INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器统计开始 '+@LSName+'')

IF(@AccountInterzone=0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT F_ItemExcelID,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum / F_ItemChildNum) AS F_GoodsNum,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum) AS F_ItemSaleNum, 
SUM(F_TradeCount) AS F_TradeCount, SUM(F_RoleCount) AS F_RoleCount, SUM(F_MoneyCount) AS F_MoneyCount
FROM T_ShopSaleItemByUser
WHERE F_Date>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND  F_Date<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+''''
IF(@F_BigZone<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_BigZone='+CAST(@F_BigZone AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
IF(@F_ZoneID<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_ZoneID='+CAST(@F_ZoneID AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_UserID IN(SELECT F_UserID
FROM(SELECT F_UserID,SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>0)
GROUP BY F_ItemExcelID ORDER BY F_MoneyCount DESC'
EXEC (@SqlStr)
END
IF(@AccountInterzone=1)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT F_ItemExcelID,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum / F_ItemChildNum) AS F_GoodsNum,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum) AS F_ItemSaleNum, 
SUM(F_TradeCount) AS F_TradeCount, SUM(F_RoleCount) AS F_RoleCount, SUM(F_MoneyCount) AS F_MoneyCount
FROM T_ShopSaleItemByUser
WHERE F_Date>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND  F_Date<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+''''
IF(@F_BigZone<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_BigZone='+CAST(@F_BigZone AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
IF(@F_ZoneID<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_ZoneID='+CAST(@F_ZoneID AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_UserID IN(SELECT F_UserID
FROM(SELECT F_UserID,SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>0 AND F_TradeMoney/10<100)
GROUP BY F_ItemExcelID ORDER BY F_MoneyCount DESC'
EXEC (@SqlStr)
END
IF(@AccountInterzone=2)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT F_ItemExcelID,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum / F_ItemChildNum) AS F_GoodsNum,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum) AS F_ItemSaleNum, 
SUM(F_TradeCount) AS F_TradeCount, SUM(F_RoleCount) AS F_RoleCount, SUM(F_MoneyCount) AS F_MoneyCount
FROM T_ShopSaleItemByUser
WHERE F_Date>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND  F_Date<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+''''
IF(@F_BigZone<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_BigZone='+CAST(@F_BigZone AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
IF(@F_ZoneID<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_ZoneID='+CAST(@F_ZoneID AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_UserID IN(SELECT F_UserID
AND F_UserID EXISTS(SELECT F_UserID
FROM(SELECT F_UserID,SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>99 AND F_TradeMoney/10<200)
GROUP BY F_ItemExcelID ORDER BY F_MoneyCount DESC'
EXEC (@SqlStr)
END
IF(@AccountInterzone=3)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT F_ItemExcelID,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum / F_ItemChildNum) AS F_GoodsNum,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum) AS F_ItemSaleNum, 
SUM(F_TradeCount) AS F_TradeCount, SUM(F_RoleCount) AS F_RoleCount, SUM(F_MoneyCount) AS F_MoneyCount
FROM T_ShopSaleItemByUser
WHERE F_Date>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND  F_Date<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+''''
IF(@F_BigZone<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_BigZone='+CAST(@F_BigZone AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
IF(@F_ZoneID<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_ZoneID='+CAST(@F_ZoneID AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_UserID IN(SELECT F_UserID
FROM(SELECT F_UserID,SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>199 AND F_TradeMoney/10<300)
GROUP BY F_ItemExcelID ORDER BY F_MoneyCount DESC'
EXEC (@SqlStr)
END
IF(@AccountInterzone=4)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT F_ItemExcelID,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum / F_ItemChildNum) AS F_GoodsNum,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum) AS F_ItemSaleNum, 
SUM(F_TradeCount) AS F_TradeCount, SUM(F_RoleCount) AS F_RoleCount, SUM(F_MoneyCount) AS F_MoneyCount
FROM T_ShopSaleItemByUser
WHERE F_Date>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND  F_Date<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+''''
IF(@F_BigZone<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_BigZone='+CAST(@F_BigZone AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
IF(@F_ZoneID<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_ZoneID='+CAST(@F_ZoneID AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_UserID IN(SELECT F_UserID
FROM(SELECT F_UserID,SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>299 AND F_TradeMoney/10<400)
GROUP BY F_ItemExcelID ORDER BY F_MoneyCount DESC'
EXEC (@SqlStr)
END
IF(@AccountInterzone=5)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT F_ItemExcelID,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum / F_ItemChildNum) AS F_GoodsNum,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum) AS F_ItemSaleNum, 
SUM(F_TradeCount) AS F_TradeCount, SUM(F_RoleCount) AS F_RoleCount, SUM(F_MoneyCount) AS F_MoneyCount
FROM T_ShopSaleItemByUser
WHERE F_Date>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND  F_Date<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+''''
IF(@F_BigZone<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_BigZone='+CAST(@F_BigZone AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
IF(@F_ZoneID<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_ZoneID='+CAST(@F_ZoneID AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_UserID IN(SELECT F_UserID
FROM(SELECT F_UserID,SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>399 AND F_TradeMoney/10<500)
GROUP BY F_ItemExcelID ORDER BY F_MoneyCount DESC'
EXEC (@SqlStr)
END
IF(@AccountInterzone=6)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT F_ItemExcelID,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum / F_ItemChildNum) AS F_GoodsNum,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum) AS F_ItemSaleNum, 
SUM(F_TradeCount) AS F_TradeCount, SUM(F_RoleCount) AS F_RoleCount, SUM(F_MoneyCount) AS F_MoneyCount
FROM T_ShopSaleItemByUser
WHERE F_Date>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND  F_Date<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+''''
IF(@F_BigZone<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_BigZone='+CAST(@F_BigZone AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
IF(@F_ZoneID<>0)
BEGIN

END
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_UserID IN(SELECT F_UserID
FROM(SELECT F_UserID,SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>499 AND F_TradeMoney/10<600)
GROUP BY F_ItemExcelID ORDER BY F_MoneyCount DESC'
EXEC (@SqlStr)
END
IF(@AccountInterzone=7)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT F_ItemExcelID,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum / F_ItemChildNum) AS F_GoodsNum,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum) AS F_ItemSaleNum, 
SUM(F_TradeCount) AS F_TradeCount, SUM(F_RoleCount) AS F_RoleCount, SUM(F_MoneyCount) AS F_MoneyCount
FROM T_ShopSaleItemByUser
WHERE F_Date>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND  F_Date<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+''''
IF(@F_BigZone<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_BigZone='+CAST(@F_BigZone AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
IF(@F_ZoneID<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_ZoneID='+CAST(@F_ZoneID AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_UserID IN(SELECT F_UserID
FROM(SELECT F_UserID,SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>599 AND F_TradeMoney/10<700)
GROUP BY F_ItemExcelID ORDER BY F_MoneyCount DESC'
EXEC (@SqlStr)
END
IF(@AccountInterzone=8)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT F_ItemExcelID,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum / F_ItemChildNum) AS F_GoodsNum,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum) AS F_ItemSaleNum, 
SUM(F_TradeCount) AS F_TradeCount, SUM(F_RoleCount) AS F_RoleCount, SUM(F_MoneyCount) AS F_MoneyCount
FROM T_ShopSaleItemByUser
WHERE F_Date>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND  F_Date<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+''''
IF(@F_BigZone<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_BigZone='+CAST(@F_BigZone AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
IF(@F_ZoneID<>0)
