END
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_UserID IN(SELECT F_UserID
FROM(SELECT F_UserID,SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>699 AND F_TradeMoney/10<800)
GROUP BY F_ItemExcelID ORDER BY F_MoneyCount DESC'
EXEC (@SqlStr)
END
IF(@AccountInterzone=9)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT F_ItemExcelID,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum / F_ItemChildNum) AS F_GoodsNum,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum) AS F_ItemSaleNum, 
SUM(F_TradeCount) AS F_TradeCount, SUM(F_RoleCount) AS F_RoleCount, SUM(F_MoneyCount) AS F_MoneyCount
FROM T_ShopSaleItemByUser
WHERE F_Date>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND  F_Date<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+''''
IF(@F_BigZone<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_BigZone='+CAST(@F_BigZone AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
IF(@F_ZoneID<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_ZoneID='+CAST(@F_ZoneID AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_UserID IN(SELECT F_UserID
FROM(SELECT F_UserID,SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>799 AND F_TradeMoney/10<900)
GROUP BY F_ItemExcelID ORDER BY F_MoneyCount DESC'
EXEC (@SqlStr)
END
IF(@AccountInterzone=10)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT F_ItemExcelID,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum / F_ItemChildNum) AS F_GoodsNum,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum) AS F_ItemSaleNum, 
SUM(F_TradeCount) AS F_TradeCount, SUM(F_RoleCount) AS F_RoleCount, SUM(F_MoneyCount) AS F_MoneyCount
FROM T_ShopSaleItemByUser
WHERE F_Date>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND  F_Date<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+''''
IF(@F_BigZone<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_BigZone='+CAST(@F_BigZone AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
IF(@F_ZoneID<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_ZoneID='+CAST(@F_ZoneID AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_UserID IN(SELECT F_UserID
FROM(SELECT F_UserID,SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>999 AND F_TradeMoney/10<2000)
GROUP BY F_ItemExcelID ORDER BY F_MoneyCount DESC
'
EXEC (@SqlStr)
END
IF(@AccountInterzone=11)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT F_ItemExcelID,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum / F_ItemChildNum) AS F_GoodsNum,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum) AS F_ItemSaleNum, 
SUM(F_TradeCount) AS F_TradeCount, SUM(F_RoleCount) AS F_RoleCount, SUM(F_MoneyCount) AS F_MoneyCount
FROM T_ShopSaleItemByUser
WHERE F_Date>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND  F_Date<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+''''
IF(@F_BigZone<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_BigZone='+CAST(@F_BigZone AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
IF(@F_ZoneID<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_ZoneID='+CAST(@F_ZoneID AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_UserID IN(SELECT F_UserID
FROM(SELECT F_UserID,SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>1999 AND F_TradeMoney/10<3000)
GROUP BY F_ItemExcelID ORDER BY F_MoneyCount DESC'
EXEC (@SqlStr)
END
IF(@AccountInterzone=12)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT F_ItemExcelID,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum / F_ItemChildNum) AS F_GoodsNum,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum) AS F_ItemSaleNum, 
SUM(F_TradeCount) AS F_TradeCount, SUM(F_RoleCount) AS F_RoleCount, SUM(F_MoneyCount) AS F_MoneyCount
FROM T_ShopSaleItemByUser
WHERE F_Date>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND  F_Date<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+''''
IF(@F_BigZone<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_BigZone='+CAST(@F_BigZone AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
IF(@F_ZoneID<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_ZoneID='+CAST(@F_ZoneID AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_UserID IN(SELECT F_UserID
FROM(SELECT F_UserID,SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>2999 AND F_TradeMoney/10<10000)
GROUP BY F_ItemExcelID ORDER BY F_MoneyCount DESC'
EXEC (@SqlStr)
END
IF(@AccountInterzone=13)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT F_ItemExcelID,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum / F_ItemChildNum) AS F_GoodsNum,SUM(F_ItemSaleNum) AS F_ItemSaleNum, 
SUM(F_TradeCount) AS F_TradeCount, SUM(F_RoleCount) AS F_RoleCount, SUM(F_MoneyCount) AS F_MoneyCount
FROM T_ShopSaleItemByUser
WHERE F_Date>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND  F_Date<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+''''
IF(@F_BigZone<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_BigZone='+CAST(@F_BigZone AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
IF(@F_ZoneID<>0)
BEGIN
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_ZoneID='+CAST(@F_ZoneID AS VARCHAR(2))+''
END
SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' AND F_UserID IN(SELECT F_UserID
FROM(SELECT F_UserID,SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>10000)
GROUP BY F_ItemExcelID ORDER BY F_MoneyCount DESC'
EXEC (@SqlStr)
END
    --统计结束
    INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器统计结束 '+@LSName+'')

END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
SELECT @Result=1 
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器出错 数据库'+@LSName+' 信息:'+ERROR_MESSAGE()+ isnull(@SqlStr,''))
END CATCH

FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
END
CLOSE SynDBTable_CURSOR
DEALLOCATE SynDBTable_CURSOR
--游标结束

INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'玩家充值数据统计结束[_Dig_GSLOGDB]-数据时间'+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))
END
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[_Dig_UserCoreDB_AccountInterzone]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:00 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
------------------------------------
--项目名称：统计玩家充值数据
--说明：SQL SERVER数据库
--时间：2013-07-03 11:11:59 Liucj
------------------------------------
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[_Dig_UserCoreDB_AccountInterzone]
@DigDate smalldatetime,			--开始日期
@DigDateEnd smalldatetime=NULL,	--结束日期
@Result INT OUTPUT
AS 
BEGIN
DECLARE @LSName NVARCHAR(50),@GUID VARCHAR(36),@SqlStr VARCHAR(MAX)
SELECT @DigDate=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)
SELECT @DigDateEnd=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDateEnd,111)
--查看是否运行中
DECLARE	@JobItem NVARCHAR(50)
SELECT @JobItem='_Dig_UserCoreDB'

SELECT @GUID =newid()
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'玩家充值统计开始[_Dig_GSLOGDB]-数据时间'+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))

--游标开始
DECLARE @F_ID INT,@F_DBType TINYINT,@F_BigZoneID VARCHAR(5),@F_BattleZoneID VARCHAR(10),@F_DBIP NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBName NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBUser NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBPSW NVARCHAR(30)
DECLARE SynDBTable_CURSOR CURSOR LOCAL FOR SELECT F_ID,F_DBType,F_BigZoneID,F_BattleZoneID,F_DBIP,F_DBName,F_DBUser,F_DBPSW FROM T_BaseParamDB  WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_DBType=5 and F_State=1
OPEN SynDBTable_CURSOR
FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
BEGIN
BEGIN TRY
	SELECT @Result=0
	SELECT @LSName='LKSV_'+CAST(@F_DBType AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+@F_DBName+'_'+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))--链接服务器名称

--链接服务器判断
	IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM sys.servers WITH(NOLOCK)  WHERE is_linked=1 AND name=@LSName)
	BEGIN--链接服务器不存在
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器不存在 '+@LSName+'')
		SELECT @Result=1001 
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @retval INT
		BEGIN TRY
			EXEC @retval = sys.sp_testlinkedserver @LSName
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
			SET @retval = sign(@@error);
			INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'信息'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
		END CATCH;
		IF @retval<>0 --链接服务器无法连接远程服务器
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'')
		SELECT @Result=1002
		END 
	END

	IF(@Result<>0) 
	BEGIN
	FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
	END

	INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器统计开始 '+@LSName+'')

--增加玩家充值累积0-99元统计
SELECT @SqlStr=N'TRUNCATE TABLE T_AccountInterzone'
EXEC (@SqlStr)

SELECT @SqlStr=N'
INSERT INTO T_AccountInterzone(AccountInterzone,UserCount) SELECT ''0-99元'' AS InterZone,COUNT(F_UserID) as UserCount
FROM(
SELECT 
F_UserID,
SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>0 AND F_TradeMoney/10<100'
EXEC (@SqlStr)

--增加玩家充值累积100-199元统计
SELECT @SqlStr=N'
INSERT INTO T_AccountInterzone(AccountInterzone,UserCount) SELECT ''100-199元'' AS InterZone,COUNT(F_UserID) as UserCount
FROM(
SELECT 
F_UserID,
SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>99 AND F_TradeMoney/10<200'
EXEC (@SqlStr)

--增加玩家充值累积200-299元统计
SELECT @SqlStr=N'
INSERT INTO T_AccountInterzone(AccountInterzone,UserCount) SELECT ''200-299元'' AS InterZone,COUNT(F_UserID) as UserCount
FROM(
SELECT 
F_UserID,
SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>199 AND F_TradeMoney/10<300'
EXEC (@SqlStr)

--增加玩家充值累积300-399元统计
SELECT @SqlStr=N'
INSERT INTO T_AccountInterzone(AccountInterzone,UserCount) SELECT ''300-399元'' AS InterZone,COUNT(F_UserID) as UserCount
FROM(
SELECT 
F_UserID,
SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>299 AND F_TradeMoney/10<400'
EXEC (@SqlStr)

--增加玩家充值累积400-499元统计
SELECT @SqlStr=N'
INSERT INTO T_AccountInterzone(AccountInterzone,UserCount) SELECT ''400-499元'' AS InterZone,COUNT(F_UserID) as UserCount
FROM(
SELECT 
F_UserID,
SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>399 AND F_TradeMoney/10<500'
EXEC (@SqlStr)

--增加玩家充值累积500-599元统计
SELECT @SqlStr=N'
INSERT INTO T_AccountInterzone(AccountInterzone,UserCount) SELECT ''500-599元'' AS InterZone,COUNT(F_UserID) as UserCount
FROM(
SELECT 
F_UserID,
SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>499 AND F_TradeMoney/10<600'
EXEC (@SqlStr)


--增加玩家充值累积600-699元统计
SELECT @SqlStr=N'
INSERT INTO T_AccountInterzone(AccountInterzone,UserCount) SELECT ''600-699元'' AS InterZone,COUNT(F_UserID) as UserCount
FROM(
SELECT 
F_UserID,
SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>599 AND F_TradeMoney/10<700'
EXEC (@SqlStr)

--增加玩家充值累积700-799元统计
SELECT @SqlStr=N'
INSERT INTO T_AccountInterzone(AccountInterzone,UserCount) SELECT ''700-799元'' AS InterZone,COUNT(F_UserID) as UserCount
FROM(
SELECT 
F_UserID,
SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>699 AND F_TradeMoney/10<800'
EXEC (@SqlStr)


--增加玩家充值累积800-899元统计
SELECT @SqlStr=N'
INSERT INTO T_AccountInterzone(AccountInterzone,UserCount) SELECT ''800-899元'' AS InterZone,COUNT(F_UserID) as UserCount
FROM(
SELECT 
F_UserID,
SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>799 AND F_TradeMoney/10<900'
EXEC (@SqlStr)

--增加玩家充值累积900-999元统计
SELECT @SqlStr=N'
INSERT INTO T_AccountInterzone(AccountInterzone,UserCount) SELECT ''900-999元'' AS InterZone,COUNT(F_UserID) as UserCount
FROM(
SELECT 
F_UserID,
SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>899 AND F_TradeMoney/10<1000'
EXEC (@SqlStr)


--增加玩家充值累积1000-1999元统计
SELECT @SqlStr=N'
INSERT INTO T_AccountInterzone(AccountInterzone,UserCount) SELECT ''1000-1999元'' AS InterZone,COUNT(F_UserID) as UserCount
FROM(
SELECT 
F_UserID,
SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>999 AND F_TradeMoney/10<2000'
EXEC (@SqlStr)

--增加玩家充值累积2000-2999元统计
SELECT @SqlStr=N'
INSERT INTO T_AccountInterzone(AccountInterzone,UserCount) SELECT ''2000-2999元'' AS InterZone,COUNT(F_UserID) as UserCount
FROM(
SELECT 
F_UserID,
SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>1999 AND F_TradeMoney/10<3000'
EXEC (@SqlStr)

--增加玩家充值累积3000-9999元统计
SELECT @SqlStr=N'
INSERT INTO T_AccountInterzone(AccountInterzone,UserCount) SELECT ''3000-9999元'' AS InterZone,COUNT(F_UserID) as UserCount
FROM(
SELECT 
F_UserID,
SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>2999 AND F_TradeMoney/10<10000'
EXEC (@SqlStr)

--增加玩家充值累积10000+元统计
SELECT @SqlStr=N'
INSERT INTO T_AccountInterzone(AccountInterzone,UserCount) SELECT ''10000+元'' AS InterZone,COUNT(F_UserID) as UserCount
FROM(
SELECT 
F_UserID,
SUM(F_TradeMoney) as F_TradeMoney
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog
WHERE F_AfterMoney>0 AND F_TradeTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' AND F_TradeTime<'''+CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30))+'''
GROUP BY F_UserID
) AS MaxAccount WHERE F_TradeMoney/10>9999'
EXEC (@SqlStr)


    --遍历挖掘结束
    INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器统计结束 '+@LSName+'')

END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
SELECT @Result=1 
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器出错 数据库'+@LSName+' 信息:'+ERROR_MESSAGE()+ isnull(@SqlStr,''))
END CATCH

FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
END
CLOSE SynDBTable_CURSOR
DEALLOCATE SynDBTable_CURSOR
--游标结束

INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'玩家充值数据统计结束[_Dig_GSLOGDB]-数据时间'+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))
END
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[_Dig_UserCoreDB]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:00 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
------------------------------------
--项目名称：挖掘数据库日志
--说明：游戏数据库
--时间：2012-07-05 11:11:59 HCH
------------------------------------
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[_Dig_UserCoreDB]
@DigDate SMALLDATETIME,			--开始日期
@DigDateEnd SMALLDATETIME=NULL,	--结束日期(如果不为空,则为@DigDate到@DigDateEnd的数据同步)
@Result INT OUTPUT
 AS 
BEGIN
DECLARE @LSName NVARCHAR(50),@GUID VARCHAR(36),@SqlStr VARCHAR(MAX)
DECLARE @DigDateN DATETIME
SELECT @DigDate=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)
SELECT @DigDateEnd=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDateEnd,111)
SELECT @DigDateN=@DigDate
IF (@DigDateEnd is NULL OR @DigDateN>@DigDateEnd) SELECT @DigDateEnd=@DigDateN

--查看是否运行中
DECLARE	@JobItem NVARCHAR(50)
SELECT @JobItem='_Dig_UserCoreDB'

SELECT @GUID =newid()
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'挖掘数据开始[_Dig_GSLOGDB]-数据时间'+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))

--游标开始
DECLARE @F_ID INT,@F_DBType TINYINT,@F_BigZoneID VARCHAR(5),@F_BattleZoneID VARCHAR(10),@F_DBIP NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBName NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBUser NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBPSW NVARCHAR(30)
DECLARE SynDBTable_CURSOR CURSOR LOCAL FOR SELECT F_ID,F_DBType,F_BigZoneID,F_BattleZoneID,F_DBIP,F_DBName,F_DBUser,F_DBPSW FROM T_BaseParamDB  WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_DBType=5 and F_State=1
OPEN SynDBTable_CURSOR
FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
BEGIN
BEGIN TRY
	SELECT @Result=0
	SELECT @LSName='LKSV_'+CAST(@F_DBType AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+@F_DBName+'_'+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))--链接服务器名称

--链接服务器判断
	IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM sys.servers WITH(NOLOCK)  WHERE is_linked=1 AND name=@LSName)
	BEGIN--链接服务器不存在
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器不存在 '+@LSName+'')
		SELECT @Result=1001 
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @retval INT
		BEGIN TRY
			EXEC @retval = sys.sp_testlinkedserver @LSName
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
			SET @retval = sign(@@error);
			INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'信息'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
		END CATCH;
		IF @retval<>0 --链接服务器无法连接远程服务器
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'')
		SELECT @Result=1002
		END 
	END

	IF(@Result<>0) 
	BEGIN
	FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
	END

	INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器挖掘开始 '+@LSName+'')

	SELECT @DigDate=@DigDateN
--遍历挖掘开始
	WHILE @DigDate<=@DigDateEnd
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @TABLENAME VARCHAR(30)
		DECLARE @DateDtr VARCHAR(10)
		DECLARE @year VARCHAR(4),@month VARCHAR(2),@day VARCHAR(2),@NDate VARCHAR(30) 

		SELECT @year=CAST(datepart(yy, @DigDate) AS VARCHAR(4))
		SELECT @month=CAST(datepart(mm, @DigDate) AS VARCHAR(2))
		SELECT @day=CAST(datepart(dd, @DigDate)AS VARCHAR(2))
		SELECT @DateDtr=replace(convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111),'/','_')
		SELECT @NDate=CAST(dateadd(d,1,@DigDate) AS VARCHAR(30))

		--挖掘数据
		-------------用户活动状态表----------------
		SELECT @TABLENAME='T_UserState '+@DateDtr
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'统计数据 表'+@TABLENAME+'')
	

		--删除旧的统计数据
		IF(convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)=convert(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(),111))
		BEGIN
			SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_UserLoginZoneU WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' '
			EXEC (@SqlStr)	
		END


		--挖掘新的统计数据
--新登录总量统计
		IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_UserLoginZoneU WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID)
		BEGIN
			 SELECT @SqlStr=N'
INSERT INTO T_UserLoginZoneU (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone,F_ZoneID, F_UserFirstLoginNum, F_UserNoLoginDay3,F_UserNoLoginDay3M,F_UserNoLoginDay7,F_UserNoLoginDay7M) 
SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',SUM(F_UserFirstLoginNum),SUM(F_UserNoLoginDay3),SUM(F_UserNoLoginDay3M),SUM(F_UserNoLoginDay7),SUM(F_UserNoLoginDay7M)
FROM    
(
SELECT
SUM(CASE WHEN F_FirstLoginTime<'''+@NDate+''' AND F_FirstLoginTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserFirstLoginNum,
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,GETDATE())=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserNoLoginDay3,
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,GETDATE())>3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserNoLoginDay3M,
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,GETDATE())=7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserNoLoginDay7,
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,GETDATE())>7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserNoLoginDay7M
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserState0 WITH(NOLOCK)
UNION ALL
SELECT
SUM(CASE WHEN F_FirstLoginTime<'''+@NDate+''' AND F_FirstLoginTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserFirstLoginNum,
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,GETDATE())=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserNoLoginDay3,
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,GETDATE())>3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserNoLoginDay3M,
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,GETDATE())=7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserNoLoginDay7,
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,GETDATE())>=7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserNoLoginDay7M
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserState1 WITH(NOLOCK)
UNION ALL
SELECT
SUM(CASE WHEN F_FirstLoginTime<'''+@NDate+''' AND F_FirstLoginTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserFirstLoginNum,
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,GETDATE())=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserNoLoginDay3,
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,GETDATE())>3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserNoLoginDay3M,
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,GETDATE())=7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserNoLoginDay7,
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,GETDATE())>=7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserNoLoginDay7M
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserState2 WITH(NOLOCK)
UNION ALL
SELECT
SUM(CASE WHEN F_FirstLoginTime<'''+@NDate+''' AND F_FirstLoginTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserFirstLoginNum,
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,GETDATE())=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserNoLoginDay3,
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,GETDATE())>3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserNoLoginDay3M,
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,GETDATE())=7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserNoLoginDay7,
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,GETDATE())>=7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserNoLoginDay7M
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserState3 WITH(NOLOCK)
UNION ALL
SELECT
SUM(CASE WHEN F_FirstLoginTime<'''+@NDate+''' AND F_FirstLoginTime>='''+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+''' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserFirstLoginNum,
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,GETDATE())=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserNoLoginDay3,
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,GETDATE())>3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserNoLoginDay3M,
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,GETDATE())=7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserNoLoginDay7,
SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,GETDATE())>=7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_UserNoLoginDay7M
FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserState4 WITH(NOLOCK)
) A
'

			EXEC (@SqlStr)
		END
--每天真钱结算		

	IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_Money_Real_Day WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID)
	BEGIN
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'update T_Money_Real_Day set
		 F_MoneyDeposit=
			(SELECT isnull(SUM(F_TradeMoney),0) FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog WITH(NOLOCK)
		WHERE F_DESC=''充值成功'' AND F_TradeTime>=''' + convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate) + ''' AND F_TradeTime<''' + convert(NVARCHAR(30),dateadd(day,1,@DigDate)) + ''')
		 ,F_MoneyConsume=
			 (SELECT isnull(SUM(F_TradeMoney),0) FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_TradeMoneyLog WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_DESC=''减钱成功'' AND F_TradeTime>=''' + convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate) + ''' AND F_TradeTime<''' + convert(NVARCHAR(30),dateadd(day,1,@DigDate)) + ''')
		  where F_Date='''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''' and F_BigZone='+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'
		'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
	END
--每天充值记录统计

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Money_Recharge_Day WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Money_Recharge_Day (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID,F_MoneyCount) 
                         SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',SUM(F_TradeMoney) AS F_MoneyCount 
                         FROM ['+@LSName+'].UserCoreDB.dbo.T_UserAccountDepositLog WHERE  F_DESC=''充值成功'' AND (convert(VARCHAR(10),F_TradeTime,120)+''00:00:00'')=''' +(convert(VARCHAR(10),@DigDate,120)+'00:00:00') + ''''
		EXEC (@SqlStr) 


	    --挖掘结束

		--挖掘数据的日期递增
		SELECT @DigDate=Dateadd(DAY,1,@DigDate)
	END
--遍历挖掘结束
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器挖掘结束 '+@LSName+'')

END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
SELECT @Result=1 
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器出错 数据库'+@LSName+' 信息:'+ERROR_MESSAGE()+ isnull(@SqlStr,''))
END CATCH

FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
END
CLOSE SynDBTable_CURSOR
DEALLOCATE SynDBTable_CURSOR
--游标结束

INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'挖掘数据结束[_Dig_GSLOGDB]-数据时间'+CAST(@DigDateN AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))
END
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[_Dig_GSSDB]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:00 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
------------------------------------
--项目名称：挖掘数据库日志
--说明：游戏数据库
--时间：2012-07-05 11:11:59 HCH
------------------------------------
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[_Dig_GSSDB]
@DigDate SMALLDATETIME,			--开始日期
@DigDateEnd SMALLDATETIME=NULL,	--结束日期(如果不为空,则为@DigDate到@DigDateEnd的数据同步)
@Result INT OUTPUT
 AS 
BEGIN
SELECT @Result=0
RETURN
DECLARE @LSName NVARCHAR(50),@GUID VARCHAR(36),@SqlStr VARCHAR(MAX)
DECLARE @DigDateN DATETIME
SELECT @DigDate=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)
SELECT @DigDateEnd=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDateEnd,111)
SELECT @DigDateN=@DigDate
IF (@DigDateEnd is NULL OR @DigDateN>@DigDateEnd) SELECT @DigDateEnd=@DigDateN

--查看是否运行中
DECLARE	@JobItem NVARCHAR(50)
SELECT @JobItem='_Dig_GSSDB'

SELECT @GUID =newid()
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'挖掘数据开始[_Dig_GSSDB]-数据时间'+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))

--游标开始
DECLARE @F_ID INT,@F_DBType TINYINT,@F_BigZoneID TINYINT,@F_BattleZoneID INT,@F_DBIP NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBName NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBUser NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBPSW NVARCHAR(30)
DECLARE SynDBTable_CURSOR CURSOR LOCAL FOR SELECT TOP 1 F_ID,F_DBType,F_BigZoneID,F_BattleZoneID,F_DBIP,F_DBName,F_DBUser,F_DBPSW FROM T_BaseParamDB  WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_DBType=4 and F_State=1
OPEN SynDBTable_CURSOR
FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
BEGIN
BEGIN TRY
	SELECT @Result=0
	SELECT @LSName='LKSV_'+CAST(@F_DBType AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+@F_DBName+'_'+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))--链接服务器名称

--链接服务器判断
	IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM sys.servers WITH(NOLOCK)  WHERE is_linked=1 AND name=@LSName)
	BEGIN--链接服务器不存在
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器不存在 '+@LSName+'')
		SELECT @Result=1001 
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @retval INT
		BEGIN TRY
			EXEC @retval = sys.sp_testlinkedserver @LSName
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
			SET @retval = sign(@@error);
			INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'信息'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
		END CATCH;
		IF @retval<>0 --链接服务器无法连接远程服务器
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'')
		SELECT @Result=1002
		END 
	END

	IF(@Result<>0) 
	BEGIN
	FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
	END

	INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器挖掘开始 '+@LSName+'')

	SELECT @DigDate=@DigDateN
--遍历挖掘开始
	WHILE @DigDate<=@DigDateEnd
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @TABLENAME VARCHAR(30)
		DECLARE @DateDtr VARCHAR(10)
		DECLARE @year VARCHAR(4),@month VARCHAR(2),@day VARCHAR(2),@NDate VARCHAR(30) 

		SELECT @year=CAST(datepart(yy, @DigDate) AS VARCHAR(4))
		SELECT @month=CAST(datepart(mm, @DigDate) AS VARCHAR(2))
		SELECT @day=CAST(datepart(dd, @DigDate)AS VARCHAR(2))
		SELECT @DateDtr=replace(convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111),'/','_')
		SELECT @NDate=CAST(dateadd(d,1,@DigDate) AS VARCHAR(30))

		--挖掘数据
		-------------角色表----------------
		SELECT @TABLENAME='T_RoleBaseData '+@DateDtr




		--挖掘新的统计数据
--增量统计
		IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_RoleVocation WHERE F_Date=@DigDate)
		BEGIN
			 SELECT @SqlStr=N'SELECT * FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GSSDB.dbo.T_QuestKey WITH(NOLOCK) '
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
		END
		



	    --挖掘结束

		--挖掘数据的日期递增
		SELECT @DigDate=Dateadd(DAY,1,@DigDate)
	END
--遍历挖掘结束
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器挖掘结束 '+@LSName+'')

END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
SELECT @Result=1 
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器出错 数据库'+@LSName+' 信息:'+ERROR_MESSAGE()+@SqlStr)
END CATCH

FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
END
CLOSE SynDBTable_CURSOR
DEALLOCATE SynDBTable_CURSOR
--游标结束

INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'挖掘数据结束[_Dig_GSSDB]-数据时间'+CAST(@DigDateN AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))
END
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[_Dig_GSLOGDB]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:00 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
------------------------------------
--项目名称：挖掘数据库日志
--说明：MYSQL的游戏数据
--时间：2013-08-22 17:11:59 Liucj
------------------------------------
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[_Dig_GSLOGDB]
@DigDate SMALLDATETIME,			--开始日期
@DigDateEnd SMALLDATETIME=NULL,	--结束日期(如果不为空,则为@DigDate到@DigDateEnd的数据同步)
@Result INT OUTPUT
 AS 
BEGIN
DECLARE @LSName NVARCHAR(50),@GUID VARCHAR(36),@SqlStr VARCHAR(MAX)
DECLARE @DigDateN DATETIME
SELECT @DigDate=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)
SELECT @DigDateEnd=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDateEnd,111)
SELECT @DigDateN=@DigDate
IF (@DigDateEnd is NULL OR @DigDateN>@DigDateEnd) SELECT @DigDateEnd=@DigDateN

--查看是否运行中
DECLARE	@JobItem NVARCHAR(50)
SELECT @JobItem='_Dig_GSLOGDB'
--IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_BaseJobConfig WHERE F_State=1 AND F_JobItem=@JobItem)
--BEGIN
--	SELECT @Result=0
--	RETURN
--END

SELECT @GUID =newid()
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'挖掘数据开始[_Dig_GSLOGDB]-数据时间'+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))

--游标开始
DECLARE @F_ID INT,@F_DBType TINYINT,@F_BigZoneID VARCHAR(5),@F_BattleZoneID VARCHAR(10),@F_DBIP NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBName NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBUser NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBPSW NVARCHAR(30)
DECLARE SynDBTable_CURSOR CURSOR LOCAL FOR SELECT F_ID,F_DBType,F_BigZoneID,F_BattleZoneID,F_DBIP,F_DBName,F_DBUser,F_DBPSW FROM T_BaseParamDB  WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_DBType=0 AND F_State=1
OPEN SynDBTable_CURSOR
FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
BEGIN
BEGIN TRY
	SELECT @Result=0
	SELECT @LSName='LKSV_'+CAST(@F_DBType AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+@F_DBName+'_'+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))--链接服务器名称

--链接服务器判断
	IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM sys.servers WITH(NOLOCK)  WHERE is_linked=1 AND name=@LSName)
	BEGIN--链接服务器不存在
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器不存在 '+@LSName+'')
		SELECT @Result=1001 
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @retval INT
		BEGIN TRY
			EXEC @retval = sys.sp_testlinkedserver @LSName
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
			SET @retval = sign(@@error);
			INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'信息'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
		END CATCH;
		IF @retval<>0 --链接服务器无法连接远程服务器
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'')
		SELECT @Result=1002
		END 
	END

	IF(@Result<>0) 
	BEGIN
	FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
	END

	INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器挖掘开始 '+@LSName+'')
	SELECT @DigDate=@DigDateN
--遍历挖掘开始
	WHILE @DigDate<=@DigDateEnd
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @TABLENAME VARCHAR(30)
		DECLARE @DateDtr VARCHAR(10)
		DECLARE @year VARCHAR(4),@month VARCHAR(2),@day VARCHAR(2)
		DECLARE @OPID varchar(10),@PARA_1 varchar(10),@PARA_2 VARCHAR(20)

		SELECT @year=CAST(datepart(yy, @DigDate) AS VARCHAR(4))
		SELECT @month=CAST(datepart(mm, @DigDate) AS VARCHAR(2))
		SELECT @day=CAST(datepart(dd, @DigDate)AS VARCHAR(2))
		SELECT @DateDtr=replace(convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111),'/','_')

		--挖掘数据
-------------掉落表----------------
		SELECT @TABLENAME=@DateDtr+'_DROP_log'
		EXEC ( 'SELECT top 1 1 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SHOW TABLES'' ) WHERE Tables_in_gslog_db='''+@TABLENAME+''' ')
		IF @@rowcount>0
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'统计数据 表'+@TABLENAME+'')

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_EquipStarVacation WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--装备星级统计
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_EquipStarVacation (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_Vocation, F_StarLevel, F_ItemCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',MAX(b.F_Vocation),MAX(b.F_StarLevel),sum(num) FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT PARA_1,count(1) AS num FROM '+@TABLENAME+' group by PARA_1'' ) a LEFT JOIN T_BaseGameItem b ON a.PARA_1=b.F_ExcelID WHERE  b.F_StarLevel is NOT NULL group by  b.F_Vocation,b.F_StarLevel '
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_EquipLevelVacation WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--装备等级统计
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_EquipLevelVacation (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_SuitName, F_EquipType, F_Vocation, F_StarLevel, F_ItemCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', MAX(F_SuitName), MAX(F_EquipType), MAX(F_Vocation), MAX(F_StarLevel),sum(num) FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT PARA_1,count(1) AS num FROM '+@TABLENAME+' group by PARA_1'' ) a LEFT JOIN T_BaseGameItem b ON a.PARA_1=b.F_ExcelID WHERE  b.F_StarLevel is NOT NULL group by b.F_SuitName, b.F_EquipType, b.F_Vocation, b.F_StarLevel'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)




		END
		ELSE
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'中不包含表'+@TABLENAME+'')
		END  

----------------元宝表--------------
		SELECT @TABLENAME=@DateDtr+'_gold_Log'
 		EXEC ( 'SELECT top 1 1 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SHOW TABLES'' ) WHERE Tables_in_gslog_db='''+@TABLENAME+''' ')
		IF @@rowcount>0
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'统计数据 表'+@TABLENAME+'')
--增加 排行

  		--元宝排行  角色提取
		SELECT @OPID=10055,@PARA_1=0
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Gold_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Gold_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_UserID, F_RoleID,F_GoldCount,F_PickUpCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',UID,CID,F_GoldCount,F_PickUpCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
UID,
CID,
SUM(PARA_2) AS F_GoldCount,
count(OPID) AS F_PickUpCount
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_1='+@PARA_1+'
group by CID order by F_GoldCount desc limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr) 


 		--绑定元宝排行  角色获取
		SELECT @OPID=10056
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_RoleGetsMoney_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_GoldCount>0'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_RoleGetsMoney_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_UserID, F_RoleID,F_GoldCount,F_PickUpCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',UID,CID,F_GoldCount,F_PickUpCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
UID,
CID,
SUM(PARA_2) AS F_GoldCount,
count(OPID) AS F_PickUpCount 
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2>0 group by CID order by F_GoldCount desc limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr) 

--增加 排行结束
 
--减少 排行

 		--元宝排行  角色消耗
		SELECT @OPID=10055
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_RoleGetsMoney_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PickUpCount<0'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_RoleGetsMoney_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1,F_UserID, F_RoleID,F_GoldCount,F_PickUpCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',UID,CID,F_GoldCount,F_PickUpCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
UID,
CID,
SUM(PARA_2) AS F_GoldCount,COUNT(OPID) AS F_PickUpCount 
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2<0 group by CID order by F_GoldCount asc limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

  		--元宝排行  角色购物
		SELECT @OPID=10055,@PARA_1=2
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Gold_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Gold_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_UserID, F_RoleID,F_GoldCount,F_PickUpCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',UID,CID,F_GoldCount,F_PickUpCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT UID,CID,
sum(PARA_2) AS F_GoldCount,count(1) AS F_PickUpCount FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_1='+@PARA_1+'
group by  CID order by F_GoldCount asc limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)  
 

 		--绑定元宝排行  角色消耗
		SELECT @OPID=10056
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_RoleGetsMoney_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_GoldCount<0'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_RoleGetsMoney_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_UserID, F_RoleID,F_GoldCount,F_PickUpCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',UID,CID,PARA_2,F_PickUpCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT UID,CID,
sum(PARA_2) AS PARA_2,count(1) AS F_PickUpCount FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2<0 group by CID order by PARA_2  asc  limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

  		--绑定元宝排行  角色购物
		SELECT @OPID=10056,@PARA_1=2
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Gold_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Gold_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_UserID, F_RoleID,F_GoldCount,F_PickUpCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',UID,CID,PARA_2,F_PickUpCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT UID,CID,
sum(PARA_2) AS PARA_2,count(1) AS F_PickUpCount FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_1='+@PARA_1+'
group by  CID order by PARA_2 asc limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)  

--减少排行 结束
 
        END
		ELSE
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'中不包含表'+@TABLENAME+'')
		END

--------------元宝表 结束-----------

----------------物品表--------------
		SELECT @TABLENAME=@DateDtr+'_Item_Log'
 		EXEC ( 'SELECT top 1 1 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SHOW TABLES'' ) WHERE Tables_in_gslog_db='''+@TABLENAME+''' ')
		IF @@rowcount>0
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'统计数据 表'+@TABLENAME+'')

--物品排行 开始---------------------------------------------------------- 
--增加 总计
		--物品总计 拾取
		SELECT @OPID=10047,@PARA_1=2
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Item_GSLog_Total WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Item_GSLog_Total (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
(SUM(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',1))) as PARA_2
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2='+@PARA_1+' and PARA_2>0
order by PARA_2  desc  limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)  

		--物品总计 NPC处购买
		SELECT @OPID=10047,@PARA_1=15
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Item_GSLog_Total WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Item_GSLog_Total (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
(SUM(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',1))) as PARA_2
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' 
WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND 
PARA_2='+@PARA_1+'
order by PARA_2 desc  limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr) 

		--物品总计 任务奖励
		SELECT @OPID=10047,@PARA_1=27
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Item_GSLog_Total WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Item_GSLog_Total (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
(SUM(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',1))) as PARA_2
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2='+@PARA_1+' and PARA_2>0
order by PARA_2  desc  limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr) 

		--物品总计 NPC处回购
		SELECT @OPID=10047,@PARA_1=32
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Item_GSLog_Total WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Item_GSLog_Total (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
(SUM(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',1))) as PARA_2
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2='+@PARA_1+' and PARA_2>0
order by PARA_2  desc  limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr) 

		--物品总计 邮件邮寄
		SELECT @OPID=10047,@PARA_1=34
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Item_GSLog_Total WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Item_GSLog_Total (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
(SUM(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',1))) as PARA_2
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2='+@PARA_1+' and PARA_2>0
order by PARA_2  desc  limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr) 

--消耗 总计
		--物品总计 死亡掉落
		SELECT @OPID=10048,@PARA_1=20051
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Item_GSLog_Total WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Item_GSLog_Total (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
(SUM(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',1))) as PARA_2
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2='+@PARA_1+'
order by PARA_2  desc  limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

--增加 排行

 		--物品排行  四元精金(581200)拾取排行
		SELECT @OPID=10047,@PARA_1=2
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Item_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+' AND F_PARA_2=581200'

PARA_1 AS F_PARA_2,
UID,
CID,

FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2='+@PARA_1+' AND PARA_1=581200

		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Item_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_UserID, F_RoleID, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',UID,CID,PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
UID,
CID,
(SUM(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',1))) as PARA_2
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2='+@PARA_1+'
group by  CID order by PARA_2  desc  limit 0,100'' )'

SELECT UID,CID,
(SUM(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',1))) as PARA_2
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2='+@PARA_1+'

		EXEC (@SqlStr) 

 		--物品排行  活跃值奖励
		SELECT @OPID=10047,@PARA_1=16
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_HuoYueZhi_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_HuoYueZhi_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID,F_UserID,F_RoleID,F_Item01Count,F_Item02Count,F_Item03Count,F_Item04Count) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+',UID,CID,F_Item01Count,F_Item02Count,F_Item03Count,F_Item04Count FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT UID,CID,
(CASE WHEN COUNT(OPID)>0 then 1 else 0 end) AS F_Item01Count,
(CASE WHEN COUNT(OPID)>1 then 1 else 0 end) AS F_Item02Count,
(CASE WHEN COUNT(OPID)>2 then 1 else 0 end) AS F_Item03Count,
(CASE WHEN COUNT(OPID)>3 then 1 else 0 end) AS F_Item04Count
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2='+@PARA_1+'
group by UID,CID'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr) 


 		--物品排行  命魂盒奖励
		SELECT @OPID=10047,@PARA_1=17
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Item_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Item_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_UserID, F_RoleID, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',UID,CID,PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT UID,CID,
(SUM(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',1))) as PARA_2
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2='+@PARA_1+'
group by  CID order by PARA_2  desc  limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr) 

 		--物品排行  数据库礼品
		SELECT @OPID=10047,@PARA_1=18
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Item_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''

		EXEC (@SqlStr)  

 		--物品排行  道具交易获取次数排行
		SELECT @OPID=10047,@PARA_1=31
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Item_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Item_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID,F_PARA_1, F_UserID, F_RoleID,F_TradeCount,F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',UID,CID,F_TradeCount,PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
UID,
CID,
COUNT(OPID) AS F_TradeCount,
(SUM(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',1))) as PARA_2
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2='+@PARA_1+'
group by CID order by F_TradeCount desc  limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr) 

 		--物品排行  道具被交易次数排行
		SELECT @OPID=10047,@PARA_1=31
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_ItemBusiness_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_ItemBusiness_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID,F_PARA_1,F_ExcelID,F_TradeCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',F_ExcelID,F_TradeCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
PARA_1 AS F_ExcelID,
COUNT(OPID) AS F_TradeCount
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2='+@PARA_1+'
group by F_ExcelID order by F_TradeCount desc  limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr) 


 		--物品排行  收取邮件附件次数排行
		SELECT @OPID=10047,@PARA_1=34
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Item_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_2+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Item_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID,F_PARA_1, F_UserID, F_RoleID,F_TradeCount,F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',UID,CID,F_TradeCount,PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
UID,
CID,
COUNT(OPID) AS F_TradeCount,
(SUM(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',1))) as PARA_2
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2='+@PARA_1+'
group by CID order by F_TradeCount desc  limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr) 

--消耗 排行
 		--物品排行 装备精练
		SELECT @OPID=10048,@PARA_1=20032
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Item_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Item_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID,F_PARA_1,F_ExcelID, F_UserID, F_RoleID, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',F_ExcelID,UID,CID,PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
PARA_1 AS F_ExcelID,
UID,
CID,
(SUM(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',1))) as PARA_2
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2='+@PARA_1+'
group by CID order by PARA_2 desc limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

 		--物品排行 装备精练(各精炼石等级分别排名)
		SELECT @OPID=10048,@PARA_1=20032
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_ItemExcelLevelRank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_ItemExcelLevelRank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID,F_PARA_1,F_ExcelID, F_UserID, F_RoleID, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',F_ExcelID,UID,CID,PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
PARA_1 AS F_ExcelID,
UID,
CID,
(SUM(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',1))) as PARA_2
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2='+@PARA_1+'
group by CID,PARA_1 order by PARA_2 desc limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)


 		--物品排行 卖给NPC
		SELECT @OPID=10048,@PARA_1=20053
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Item_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Item_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_UserID, F_RoleID, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',UID,CID,PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT UID,CID,
(SUM(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',1))) as PARA_2
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2='+@PARA_1+'
group by  CID order by PARA_2  desc limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

 		--物品排行 交易失去物品排行
		SELECT @OPID=10048,@PARA_1=20054
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Item_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Item_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_UserID, F_RoleID, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',UID,CID,PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT UID,CID,
(SUM(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',1))) as PARA_2
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2='+@PARA_1+'
group by  CID order by PARA_2  desc limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

 		--物品排行 邮件失去物品排行
		SELECT @OPID=10048,@PARA_1=20056
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Item_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Item_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_UserID, F_RoleID, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',UID,CID,PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT UID,CID,
(SUM(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',1))) as PARA_2
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_2='+@PARA_1+'
group by  CID order by PARA_2  desc limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

        END
		ELSE
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'中不包含表'+@TABLENAME+'')
		END

--物品排行 结束---------------------------------------------------------- 


    

----------------金钱表--------------
		SELECT @TABLENAME=@DateDtr+'_money_log'
		EXEC ( 'SELECT top 1 1 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SHOW TABLES'' ) WHERE Tables_in_gslog_db='''+@TABLENAME+''' ')
		IF @@rowcount>0
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'统计数据 表'+@TABLENAME+'')

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_MoneyGold WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 金钱总体 银币
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_MoneyGold ( F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_GoldSurplus,F_GoldOut, F_GoldIn) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',isnull(F_Surplus,0),isnull(F_Out,0),isnull(F_Out,0)-isnull(F_Surplus,0) FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT SUM(PARA_2) AS F_Surplus,(sum(replace(PARA_2,''''-'''',''''''''))+SUM(PARA_2))/2 AS F_Out  FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10037 AND PARA_1>2)'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_MoneySilver WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 金钱总体-银币
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_MoneySilver ( F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_GoldSurplus,F_GoldOut, F_GoldIn) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',isnull(F_Surplus,0),isnull(F_Out,0),isnull(F_Out,0)-isnull(F_Surplus,0) FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT SUM(PARA_2) AS F_Surplus,(sum(replace(PARA_2,''''-'''',''''''''))+SUM(PARA_2))/2 AS F_Out  FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10038)'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)


		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_MoneyGoldRole WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 角色金钱统计 银币
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_MoneyGoldRole (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_GoldType, F_GoldSum, F_UserID, F_RoleID) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', F_GoldType, F_GoldSum, UID, CID FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT * FROM (SELECT 0 AS F_GoldType,SUM(PARA_2) AS F_GoldSum, UID,CID FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10037) AND PARA_2>0  group by CID order by F_GoldSum Desc limit 0,10) a
union all
SELECT * FROM (SELECT 1 AS F_GoldType,SUM(PARA_2) AS F_GoldSum, UID,CID FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10037) AND PARA_2<0   group by CID order by F_GoldSum ASC limit 0,10) b
union all
SELECT * FROM (SELECT 2 AS F_GoldType,SUM(PARA_2) AS F_GoldSum, UID,CID FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10037)   group by CID order by F_GoldSum desc limit 0,10) c
union all
SELECT * FROM (SELECT 3 AS F_GoldType,SUM(PARA_2) AS F_GoldSum, UID,CID FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10039)  AND PARA_2>0    group by CID order by F_GoldSum desc limit 0,10) d
union all
SELECT * FROM (SELECT 4 AS F_GoldType,SUM(PARA_2) AS F_GoldSum, UID,CID FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10039)  AND PARA_2<0    group by CID order by F_GoldSum ASC limit 0,10) e
union all
SELECT * FROM (SELECT 5 AS F_GoldType,SUM(PARA_2) AS F_GoldSum, UID,CID FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10039)   group by CID order by F_GoldSum desc limit 0,10) f'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)


		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_MoneyGoldType WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 金钱类型 银币
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_MoneyGoldType (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_GoldSum0, F_GoldSum1, F_GoldSum2, F_GoldSum3, F_GoldSum4, F_GoldSum5,F_GoldSum6, F_GoldSum7, F_GoldSum8, F_GoldSum9, F_GoldSum10) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', Vaule0, Vaule1,Vaule2,Vaule3, Vaule4,Vaule5,Vaule6,Vaule7,Vaule8,0,0 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT  (SELECT  ifnull(SUM(PARA_2),0)  FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10037) AND PARA_1 in( 6,12,28,36)  limit 0,1) AS   Vaule0   ,
(SELECT  ifnull(SUM(PARA_2),0)  FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10037) AND PARA_1 in( 7,10,11,31) AND PARA_2<0  limit 0,1) AS   Vaule1,
(SELECT  ifnull(SUM(PARA_2),0)  FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10037) AND PARA_1 in( 18,19,20,21,23,30)  limit 0,1) AS   Vaule2,
(SELECT ifnull(SUM(PARA_2),0)  FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10037) AND PARA_1 in( 22,32,33,34)  limit 0,1) AS   Vaule3,
(SELECT ifnull(SUM(PARA_2),0)  FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10037) AND PARA_1 in(5,29) AND PARA_2>0 limit 0,1) AS   Vaule4,
(SELECT ifnull(SUM(PARA_2),0)  FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10037) AND PARA_1 in(10) AND PARA_2>0 limit 0,1) AS   Vaule5,
(SELECT ifnull(SUM(PARA_2),0)  FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10037) AND PARA_1 in(9,24) AND PARA_2>0 limit 0,1) AS   Vaule6,
(SELECT ifnull(SUM(PARA_2),0)  FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10037) AND PARA_1 in(24,35) AND PARA_2>0 limit 0,1) AS   Vaule7,
(SELECT ifnull(SUM(PARA_2),0)  FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10037) AND PARA_1=8 AND PARA_2>0 limit 0,1) AS   Vaule8
'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_MoneySilverType WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 金钱类型 银票
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_MoneySilverType (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_GoldSum0, F_GoldSum1, F_GoldSum2, F_GoldSum3, F_GoldSum4, F_GoldSum5,F_GoldSum6, F_GoldSum7, F_GoldSum8, F_GoldSum9, F_GoldSum10) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', Vaule0, Vaule1,Vaule2,Vaule3, Vaule4,0,0,0,0,0,0 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT  (SELECT  ifnull(SUM(PARA_2),0)  FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10038) AND PARA_1 in( 4,6,8,9,15)  limit 0,1) AS   Vaule0   ,
(SELECT  ifnull(SUM(PARA_2),0)  FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10038) AND PARA_1 = 0  limit 0,1) AS   Vaule1,
(SELECT  ifnull(SUM(PARA_2),0)  FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10038) AND PARA_1=1 limit 0,1) AS   Vaule2,
(SELECT ifnull(SUM(PARA_2),0)  FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10038) AND PARA_1 =3  limit 0,1) AS   Vaule3,
(SELECT ifnull(SUM(PARA_2),0)  FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10038) AND PARA_1=4 limit 0,1) AS   Vaule4
'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

--金钱排行 开始----------------------------------------------------------

--增加 总计

		--银币总计 邮件
		SELECT @OPID=10037,@PARA_1=2
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Money_GSLog_Total WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Money_GSLog_Total (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT sum(PARA_2) AS PARA_2 FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_1='+@PARA_1+' and PARA_2>0
order by PARA_2  desc  limit 0,50'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--银币总计 拾取
		SELECT @OPID=10037,@PARA_1=4
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Money_GSLog_Total WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--银票消耗总计 精练转移
		SELECT @OPID=10038,@PARA_1=15
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Money_GSLog_Total WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Money_GSLog_Total (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT sum(PARA_2) AS PARA_2 FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_1='+@PARA_1+'
order by PARA_2  asc  limit 0,50'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

SELECT UID,CID,sum(PARA_2) AS PARA_2 FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE

		EXEC (@SqlStr)


		--银币排行 银币交易获取次数排行
		SELECT @OPID=10037,@PARA_1=1
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Money_TradeCount_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Money_TradeCount_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_UserID, F_RoleID, F_MoneyCount,F_TradeCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',UID,CID,F_MoneyCount,F_TradeCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT UID,CID,SUM(PARA_2) AS F_MoneyCount,COUNT(OPID) as F_TradeCount FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_1='+@PARA_1+' AND PARA_2>0
GROUP BY CID ORDER BY F_MoneyCount DESC LIMIT 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--银币排行 银币交易获取金额
		SELECT @OPID=10037,@PARA_1=1
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Money_MoneyCount_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+' AND F_MoneyCount>0'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Money_MoneyCount_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1,F_PARA_2,F_UserID,F_RoleID,F_TradeCount,F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',F_PARA_2,UID,CID,F_TradeCount,F_MoneyCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
PARA_2 AS F_PARA_2,
UID,
CID,
COUNT(OPID) AS F_TradeCount,
SUM(PARA_2) AS F_MoneyCount 
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_1='+@PARA_1+' AND PARA_2>0
group by CID order by F_MoneyCount desc limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

PARA_2 AS F_PARA_2,

		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Money_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_UserID, F_RoleID, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',UID,CID,PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT UID,CID,sum(PARA_2) AS PARA_2 FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_1='+@PARA_1+'
group by  CID order by PARA_2  asc limit 0,50'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--银币排行 坐骑后天悟道
		SELECT @OPID=10037,@PARA_1=62
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Money_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Money_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1, F_UserID, F_RoleID, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',UID,CID,PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT UID,CID,sum(PARA_2) AS PARA_2 FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_1='+@PARA_1+'
group by  CID order by PARA_2  asc limit 0,50'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)


		--银币排行 银币交易金额
		SELECT @OPID=10037,@PARA_1=1
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Money_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+' AND F_MoneyCount<0'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Money_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1,F_PARA_2,F_UserID,F_RoleID,F_TradeCount,F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',F_PARA_2,UID,CID,F_TradeCount,F_MoneyCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
PARA_2 AS F_PARA_2,
UID,
CID,
COUNT(OPID) AS F_TradeCount,
SUM(PARA_2) AS F_MoneyCount 
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_1='+@PARA_1+' AND PARA_2<0
group by CID order by F_MoneyCount asc limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)


		--银币排行  邮件发送银币金额排行
		SELECT @OPID=10037,@PARA_1=2
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Money_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+' AND F_MoneyCount<0'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Money_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1,F_PARA_2, F_UserID, F_RoleID,F_TradeCount, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',F_PARA_2,UID,CID,F_TradeCount,F_MoneyCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT PARA_2 AS F_PARA_2,UID,CID,COUNT(OPID) AS F_TradeCount,sum(PARA_2) AS F_MoneyCount FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_1='+@PARA_1+' AND PARA_2<0
group by  CID order by F_MoneyCount asc limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--银币排行  仓库取出银币金额排行
		SELECT @OPID=10037,@PARA_1=0
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Money_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+' AND F_MoneyCount<0'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Money_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1,F_PARA_2, F_UserID, F_RoleID,F_TradeCount, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',F_PARA_2,UID,CID,F_TradeCount,F_MoneyCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
PARA_2 AS F_PARA_2,
UID,
CID,
COUNT(OPID) AS F_TradeCount,
SUM(PARA_2) AS F_MoneyCount 
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_1='+@PARA_1+' AND PARA_2<0
group by  CID order by F_MoneyCount asc limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

SELECT UID,CID,sum(PARA_2) AS PARA_2 FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_1='+@PARA_1+'
group by  CID order by PARA_2  asc limit 0,50'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

--金钱排行 结束-------------------------------------------------------------

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_MoneyGoldRankTask WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 金钱任务排行 银币
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_MoneyGoldRankTask (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_GoldSum, F_TaskID,F_TaskCount,F_TaskName) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', tsum,  CAST(taskid AS VARCHAR(10)),tcount,b.F_Name FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT sum(para_2) AS tsum,substring_index(substring_index(REPLACE(op_bak,'''' '''',''''''''),''''\t'''',2),''''\t'''',-1) AS taskid,count(para_2) AS tcount FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10037) AND PARA_1 in(5,29) group by  taskid  order by tsum desc
'' ) a LEFT JOIN T_BaseGameTask b ON CAST(a.taskid AS VARCHAR(10))= CAST( b.F_ExcelID  AS VARCHAR(10)) '
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

--		--删除旧的统计数据
--		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_MoneySilverRankTask WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
--		EXEC (@SqlStr)
--		--挖掘新的统计数据 金钱任务排行 银票
--		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_MoneySilverRankTask (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_GoldSum, F_TaskID,F_TaskCount,F_TaskName) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', tsum,  CAST(taskid AS VARCHAR(10)),tcount,b.F_Name FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
--SELECT sum(para_2) AS tsum,substring_index(substring_index(REPLACE(op_bak,'''' '''',''''''''),''''\t'''',2),''''\t'''',-1) AS taskid,count(para_2) AS tcount FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10038) AND PARA_1 =3 group by  taskid  order by tsum desc
--'' ) a LEFT JOIN T_BaseGameTask b ON CAST(a.taskid AS VARCHAR(10))= CAST( b.F_ExcelID  AS VARCHAR(10)) '
--
--		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		END
		ELSE
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'中不包含表'+@TABLENAME+'')
		END


----------------聊天表--------------
		SELECT @TABLENAME=@DateDtr+'_chat_log'
		EXEC ( 'SELECT top 1 1 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SHOW TABLES'' ) WHERE Tables_in_gslog_db='''+@TABLENAME+''' ')
		IF @@rowcount>0
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'统计数据 表'+@TABLENAME+'')

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_ChatTypeNum WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 聊天数量统计
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_ChatTypeNum (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_ChatType, F_Num) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', PARA_1,  F_Num FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT
 PARA_1,count(1) AS F_Num FROM '+@TABLENAME+' group by PARA_1
'' ) a '
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_ChatRoleNumRank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 聊天数量排行
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_ChatRoleNumRank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_UserID,F_RoleID, F_Num) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', UID,CID, F_Num FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT
 UID,CID,count(1) AS F_Num FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE PARA_1=3 group by CID HAVING count(1)>1 order by count(1) DESC
limit 0,100
'' ) a '

		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_ChatRoleRepeatRank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 重复聊天数量排行
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_ChatRoleRepeatRank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_UserID,F_RoleID, F_Content,F_Num) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', UID,CID,OP_BAK,F_Num FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT
 UID,CID,OP_BAK,count(1) AS F_Num FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE PARA_1=3 group by CID,OP_BAK HAVING count(1)>1 order by count(1) DESC
limit 0,1005
'' ) a '

		EXEC (@SqlStr)


		END
		ELSE
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'中不包含表'+@TABLENAME+'')
		END

----------------任务表--------------
		SELECT @TABLENAME=@DateDtr+'_task_log'
		EXEC ( 'SELECT top 1 1 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SHOW TABLES'' ) WHERE Tables_in_gslog_db='''+@TABLENAME+''' ')
		IF @@rowcount>0
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'统计数据 表'+@TABLENAME+'')

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_TaskFinishRank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 任务完成排行统计
