		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_TaskFinishRank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_TaskID, F_TaskName,F_Num) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', PARA_1,b.F_Name, F_Num FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT PARA_1,count(1) AS F_Num FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10028) group by PARA_1 order by F_Num desc limit 0,100
'' ) a  LEFT JOIN T_BaseGameTask b ON a.PARA_1= b.F_ExcelID'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_TaskFinishRankRT WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 重复接任务 角色完成排行统计
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_TaskFinishRankRT (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_TaskID, F_TaskName,F_UserID,F_RoleID,F_Num) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', PARA_1,b.F_Name,UID,CID, F_Num FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT UID,CID,PARA_1,count(1) AS F_Num FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10028)  group by PARA_1,CID 
having (PARA_1>20000 AND PARA_1<21999 AND count(1)>10) OR ((PARA_1<20000 OR PARA_1>21999) AND count(1)>1) 
order by F_Num desc limit 0,100
'' ) a  LEFT JOIN T_BaseGameTask b ON a.PARA_1= b.F_ExcelID'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_TaskAcceptRank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 任务接受排行统计
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_TaskAcceptRank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_TaskID, F_TaskName,F_Num) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', PARA_1,b.F_Name, F_Num FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT PARA_1,count(1) AS F_Num FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10027) group by PARA_1 order by F_Num desc limit 0,100
'' ) a  LEFT JOIN T_BaseGameTask b ON a.PARA_1= b.F_ExcelID'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_TaskAcceptRankRT WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 重复接任务 角色接受排行统计
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_TaskAcceptRankRT (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_TaskID, F_TaskName,F_UserID,F_RoleID,F_Num) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', PARA_1,b.F_Name,UID,CID, F_Num FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT UID,CID,PARA_1,count(1) AS F_Num FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10027)  group by PARA_1,CID 
having (PARA_1>20000 AND PARA_1<21999 AND count(1)>10) OR ((PARA_1<20000 OR PARA_1>21999) AND count(1)>1) 
order by F_Num desc limit 0,100
'' ) a  LEFT JOIN T_BaseGameTask b ON a.PARA_1= b.F_ExcelID'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_TaskAcceptFinish WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 任务接受完成比
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_TaskAcceptFinish (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_TaskID, F_TaskName,F_NumAccept,F_NumFinish) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', PARA_1,b.F_Name,F_NumAccept,F_NumFinish FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT PARA_1,Sum(CASE OPID when 10027 then 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_NumAccept,
Sum(CASE OPID when 10028 then 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_NumFinish FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE  (OPID = 10027) OR (OPID = 10028) group by PARA_1 limit 0,800
'' ) a  LEFT JOIN T_BaseGameTask b ON a.PARA_1= b.F_ExcelID '
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		END
		ELSE
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'中不包含表'+@TABLENAME+'')
		END

----------------道具、金钱交易表--------------
		SELECT @TABLENAME=@DateDtr+'_trade_log'
		EXEC ( 'SELECT top 1 1 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SHOW TABLES'' ) WHERE Tables_in_gslog_db='''+@TABLENAME+''' ')
		IF @@rowcount>0
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'统计数据 表'+@TABLENAME+'')

		--银币消耗排行 道具交易数量排行
		SELECT @OPID=10002
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_TradeExcel_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_TradeExcel_GSLog_Rank (F_Year,F_Month,F_Day,F_Date,F_BigZone,F_ZoneID,F_OPID,F_UserID_A,F_RoleID_A,F_UserID_B,F_RoleID_B,F_ExcelID,F_ExcelNum,F_TradeDateTime) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+@OPID+',F_UserID_A,F_RoleID_A,F_UserID_B,F_RoleID_B,F_ExcelID,F_ExcelNum,F_TradeDateTime FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT
UID as F_UserID_A,
CID as F_RoleID_A,
PARA_1 as F_UserID_B,
PARA_2 as F_RoleID_B,
substring_index(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',4),''''\t'''',-1) as F_ExcelID,
SUM(substring_index(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',5),''''\t'''',-1)) AS F_ExcelNum,
OP_Time as F_TradeDateTime
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+'
group by F_UserID_A,F_RoleID_A,F_UserID_B,F_RoleID_B,F_ExcelID,F_TradeDateTime order by F_ExcelNum DESC limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--银币消耗排行 道具交易中数量排行
		SELECT @OPID=10002
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_TradeExcelNum_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_TradeExcelNum_GSLog_Rank (F_Year,F_Month,F_Day,F_Date,F_BigZone,F_ZoneID,F_OPID,F_ExcelID,F_ExcelNum) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+@OPID+',F_ExcelID,F_ExcelNum FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT
substring_index(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',4),''''\t'''',-1) as F_ExcelID,
SUM(substring_index(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',5),''''\t'''',-1)) AS F_ExcelNum
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+'
group by F_ExcelID order by F_ExcelNum DESC limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		END
		ELSE
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'中不包含表'+@TABLENAME+'')
		END

----------------战斗表-------------
		SELECT @TABLENAME=@DateDtr+'_fight_log'
		EXEC ( 'SELECT top 1 1 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SHOW TABLES'' ) WHERE Tables_in_gslog_db='''+@TABLENAME+''' ')
		IF @@rowcount>0
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'统计数据 表'+@TABLENAME+'')

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @OPID=10031
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Fight_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_Type=0'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 玩家死亡次数排行
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Fight_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID,F_OPID,F_UserID,F_RoleID,F_Type,F_TradeCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+@F_BigZoneID+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+@OPID+',F_UserID,F_RoleID,F_Type,F_TradeCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT
UID as F_UserID,
CID as F_RoleID,
0   as F_Type,
COUNT(OPID) as F_TradeCount
FROM '+@TABLENAME+'
WHERE OPID='+@OPID+' AND UID<>0 AND CID<>0
GROUP BY UID,CID
'' ) a '
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @OPID=10031
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Fight_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_Type=1'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 被玩家杀死死亡次数排行
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Fight_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID,F_OPID,F_UserID,F_RoleID,F_Type,F_TradeCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+@F_BigZoneID+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+@OPID+',F_UserID,F_RoleID,F_Type,F_TradeCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT
UID as F_UserID,
CID as F_RoleID,
1   as F_Type,
COUNT(OPID) as F_TradeCount
FROM '+@TABLENAME+'
WHERE OPID='+@OPID+' AND UID<>0 AND CID<>0 AND PARA_1<>0 AND PARA_2<>0
GROUP BY UID,CID
'' ) a '
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @OPID=10031
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Fight_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_Type=2'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 被NPC杀死死亡次数排行
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Fight_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID,F_OPID,F_UserID,F_RoleID,F_Type,F_TradeCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+@F_BigZoneID+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+@OPID+',F_UserID,F_RoleID,F_Type,F_TradeCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT
UID as F_UserID,
CID as F_RoleID,
2   as F_Type,
COUNT(OPID) as F_TradeCount
FROM '+@TABLENAME+'
WHERE OPID='+@OPID+' AND UID<>0 AND CID<>0 AND PARA_1=0 AND PARA_2=0
GROUP BY UID,CID
'' ) a '
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
        END
        ELSE
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'中不包含表'+@TABLENAME+'')
		END



----------------其它表--------------
		SELECT @TABLENAME=@DateDtr+'_other_log'
		EXEC ( 'SELECT top 1 1 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SHOW TABLES'' ) WHERE Tables_in_gslog_db='''+@TABLENAME+''' ')
		IF @@rowcount>0
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'统计数据 表'+@TABLENAME+'')



		--活动完成情况统计
       SELECT @OPID=50066
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Other_GSLog_Total WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Other_GSLog_Total (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1,F_InRoleCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+',F_PARA_1,F_InRoleCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''

SELECT
A.PARA_1 AS F_PARA_1,
COUNT(A.CID) AS F_InRoleCount
FROM (SELECT UID,CID,PARA_1 FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+'
GROUP BY UID,CID,PARA_1) as A group by F_PARA_1 '')'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)


		--角色登陆总数统计
       SELECT @OPID=40052
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Other_GSLog_Total WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Other_GSLog_Total (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID,F_InRoleCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+',F_InRoleCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''

SELECT
COUNT(DISTINCT CID) AS F_InRoleCount
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' '')'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_RoleWeibo WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 微博统计
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_RoleWeibo (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_Count) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+@F_BigZoneID+','+@F_BattleZoneID+', F_Num FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT count(1) AS F_Num FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE OPID=50102
'' ) a '
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_ShopSale WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 商城等级统计统计
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_ShopSale (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_RoleLevel,F_ShopType, F_TradeCount, F_RoleCount, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+@F_BigZoneID+','+@F_BattleZoneID+', CAST(F_RoleLevel AS VARCHAR(3)),CASE OPID when 40004 then 0 ELSE 1 END, F_TradeCount, F_RoleCount, F_MoneyCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT
OPID,
substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',1) AS F_RoleLevel,
count(CID) AS F_TradeCount,
count(distinct(CID)) AS F_RoleCount,
SUM(substring_index(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',6),''''\t'''',-1)) AS F_MoneyCount
FROM
'+@TABLENAME+'
WHERE
(OPID=  40004 OR OPID=  40005)
AND PARA_1<>0
group by OPID,F_RoleLevel
'' ) a '
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_ShopSaleItem WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 商城商品统计统计
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_ShopSaleItem (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_ShopType, F_ItemExcelID, F_ItemChildNum,F_ItemSaleNum, F_TradeCount, F_RoleCount, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+@F_BigZoneID+','+@F_BattleZoneID+', CASE OPID when 40004 then 0 ELSE 1 END, F_ItemExcelID, CAST(F_ItemChildNum AS VARCHAR(6)),F_ItemSaleNum, F_TradeCount, F_RoleCount, F_MoneyCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT
OPID,
PARA_1 AS F_ItemExcelID,
substring_index(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',3),''''\t'''',-1) AS F_ItemChildNum,
SUM(PARA_2) AS F_ItemSaleNum,
count(CID) AS F_TradeCount,
count(distinct(CID)) AS F_RoleCount,
SUM(substring_index(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',6),''''\t'''',-1)) AS F_MoneyCount
FROM
'+@TABLENAME+'
WHERE
(OPID=  40004 OR OPID=  40005)
AND PARA_1<>0
group by OPID,F_ItemExcelID,F_ItemChildNum
'' ) a '
		EXEC (@SqlStr)


		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_ShopSaleItemByUser WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 商城每个用户消费统计
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_ShopSaleItemByUser (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date,F_UserID, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_ShopType, F_ItemExcelID, F_ItemChildNum,F_ItemSaleNum, F_TradeCount, F_RoleCount, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''',F_UserID,'+@F_BigZoneID+','+@F_BattleZoneID+', CASE OPID when 40004 then 0 ELSE 1 END, F_ItemExcelID, CAST(F_ItemChildNum AS VARCHAR(6)),F_ItemSaleNum, F_TradeCount, F_RoleCount, F_MoneyCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT
UID AS F_UserID,
OPID,
PARA_1 AS F_ItemExcelID,
substring_index(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',3),''''\t'''',-1) AS F_ItemChildNum,
SUM(PARA_2) AS F_ItemSaleNum,
count(CID) AS F_TradeCount,
count(distinct(CID)) AS F_RoleCount,
SUM(substring_index(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',6),''''\t'''',-1)) AS F_MoneyCount
FROM
'+@TABLENAME+'
WHERE
(OPID=40004 OR OPID=40005)
AND PARA_1<>0
group by F_UserID,OPID,F_ItemExcelID,F_ItemChildNum
'' ) a '
		EXEC (@SqlStr)


        --绑定/不绑定商城 某个角色买某件件商品消耗元宝数排行
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_ShopSaleItemExcelIDCount WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 商城商品统计
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_ShopSaleItemExcelIDCount (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID,F_UserID,F_RoleID,F_RoleLevel,F_ShopType,F_ItemExcelID,F_TradeCount,F_ShopSaleCount,F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+@F_BigZoneID+','+@F_BattleZoneID+',UID,CID,CAST(F_RoleLevel AS VARCHAR(3)),CASE OPID when 40004 then 0 ELSE 1 END,F_ItemExcelID,F_TradeCount, F_ShopSaleCount, F_MoneyCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT
UID,
CID,
substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',1) AS F_RoleLevel,
OPID,
PARA_1 AS F_ItemExcelID,
COUNT(CID) AS F_TradeCount,
SUM(PARA_2) AS F_ShopSaleCount,
SUM(substring_index(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',6),''''\t'''',-1)) AS F_MoneyCount
FROM
'+@TABLENAME+'
WHERE
(OPID=  40004 OR OPID=  40005)
AND PARA_1<>0
group by CID,F_ItemExcelID
'' ) a '
		EXEC (@SqlStr)


        --绑定/不绑定商城 物品消耗等级消耗明细
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_ShopSaleExcelLevel WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 商城商品统计
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_ShopSaleExcelLevel (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID,F_UserID,F_RoleID,F_RoleLevel,F_ShopType,F_ItemExcelID,F_TradeCount,F_RoleCount,F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+@F_BigZoneID+','+@F_BattleZoneID+',UID,CID,CAST(F_RoleLevel AS VARCHAR(3)),CASE OPID when 40004 then 0 ELSE 1 END,F_ItemExcelID,F_TradeCount, F_RoleCount, F_MoneyCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT
UID,
CID,
substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',1) AS F_RoleLevel,
OPID,
PARA_1 AS F_ItemExcelID,
COUNT(CID) AS F_TradeCount,
count(distinct(CID)) AS F_RoleCount,
SUM(substring_index(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',6),''''\t'''',-1)) AS F_MoneyCount
FROM
'+@TABLENAME+'
WHERE
(OPID=  40004 OR OPID=  40005)
AND PARA_1<>0
group by F_ItemExcelID,F_RoleLevel
'' ) a '
		EXEC (@SqlStr)


		--其他排行  灵术猎手奖励排行
		SELECT @OPID=10041,@PARA_1=7
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Other_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+' AND F_PARA_1='+@PARA_1+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Other_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID, F_PARA_1,F_PARA_2, F_UserID, F_RoleID,F_TradeCount, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+','+@PARA_1+',F_PARA_2,UID,CID,F_TradeCount,PARA_2 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
PARA_2 AS F_PARA_2,
UID,
CID,
COUNT(OPID) AS F_TradeCount,
sum(PARA_2) AS PARA_2 
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+' AND PARA_1='+@PARA_1+'
group by  CID order by F_TradeCount  desc  limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--其他排行  精练次数排行
		SELECT @OPID=10019
		--删除旧的统计数据
	    SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Other_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Other_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID,F_UserID, F_RoleID,F_RoleLevel,F_TradeCount, F_MoneyCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+',UID,CID, CAST(F_RoleLevel AS VARCHAR(3)),F_TradeCount,F_MoneyCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
UID,
CID,
PARA_1 AS F_RoleLevel,
COUNT(OPID) AS F_TradeCount,
SUM(substring_index(substring_index(OP_BAK,''''\t'''',3),''''\t'''',-1)) AS F_MoneyCount
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+'
group by CID order by F_TradeCount desc  limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)


		--其他排行  角色登录次数排行
		SELECT @OPID=40052
		--删除旧的统计数据
	    SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Other_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Other_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID,F_UserID, F_RoleID,F_TradeCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+',UID,CID,F_TradeCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
UID,
CID,
COUNT(OPID) AS F_TradeCount
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+'
group by UID,CID order by F_TradeCount desc  limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--其他排行  角色登出次数排行
		SELECT @OPID=40053
		--删除旧的统计数据
	    SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_Other_GSLog_Rank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' AND F_OPID='+@OPID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_Other_GSLog_Rank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_OPID,F_UserID, F_RoleID,F_TradeCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', '+@OPID+',UID,CID,F_TradeCount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
UID,
CID,
COUNT(OPID) AS F_TradeCount
FROM '+@TABLENAME+' WHERE
OPID='+@OPID+'
group by UID,CID order by F_TradeCount desc  limit 0,100'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		END
		ELSE
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'中不包含表'+@TABLENAME+'')
		END


	    --挖掘结束

		--挖掘数据的日期递增
		SELECT @DigDate=Dateadd(DAY,1,@DigDate)
	END
--遍历挖掘结束
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器挖掘结束 '+@LSName+'')

END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
SELECT @Result=1 
SELECT @SqlStr,ERROR_MESSAGE()
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器出错 数据库'+@LSName+' 信息:'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
END CATCH

FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
END
CLOSE SynDBTable_CURSOR
DEALLOCATE SynDBTable_CURSOR
--游标结束

INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'挖掘数据结束[_Dig_GSLOGDB]-数据时间'+CAST(@DigDateN AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))
END
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[_Dig_GSDATADB]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:00 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
------------------------------------
--项目名称：挖掘数据库日志
--说明：MYSQL的游戏数据
--时间：2012-01-05 11:11:59 HCH
------------------------------------
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[_Dig_GSDATADB]
@DigDate SMALLDATETIME,			--开始日期
@DigDateEnd SMALLDATETIME=NULL,	--结束日期(如果不为空,则为@DigDate到@DigDateEnd的数据同步)
@Result INT OUTPUT
 AS 
BEGIN
DECLARE @LSName NVARCHAR(50),@GUID VARCHAR(36),@SqlStr VARCHAR(MAX)
DECLARE @DigDateN DATETIME
SELECT @DigDate=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)
SELECT @DigDateEnd=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDateEnd,111)
SELECT @DigDateN=@DigDate
IF (@DigDateEnd is NULL OR @DigDateN>@DigDateEnd) SELECT @DigDateEnd=@DigDateN


--查看是否运行中
DECLARE	@JobItem NVARCHAR(50)
SELECT @JobItem='_Dig_GSDATADB'

SELECT @GUID =newid()
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'挖掘数据开始[_Dig_GSLOGDB]-数据时间'+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))

--游标开始
DECLARE @F_ID INT,@F_DBType TINYINT,@F_BigZoneID VARCHAR(5),@F_BattleZoneID VARCHAR(10),@F_DBIP NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBName NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBUser NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBPSW NVARCHAR(30)
DECLARE SynDBTable_CURSOR CURSOR LOCAL FOR SELECT F_ID,F_DBType,F_BigZoneID,F_BattleZoneID,F_DBIP,F_DBName,F_DBUser,F_DBPSW FROM T_BaseParamDB  WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_DBType=3 and F_State=1
OPEN SynDBTable_CURSOR
FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
BEGIN
BEGIN TRY
	SELECT @Result=0
	SELECT @LSName='LKSV_'+CAST(@F_DBType AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+@F_DBName+'_'+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))--链接服务器名称

--链接服务器判断
	IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM sys.servers WITH(NOLOCK)  WHERE is_linked=1 AND name=@LSName)
	BEGIN--链接服务器不存在
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器不存在 '+@LSName+'')
		SELECT @Result=1001 
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @retval INT
		BEGIN TRY
			EXEC @retval = sys.sp_testlinkedserver @LSName
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
			SET @retval = sign(@@error);
			INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'信息'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
		END CATCH;
		IF @retval<>0 --链接服务器无法连接远程服务器
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'')
		SELECT @Result=1002
		END 
	END

	IF(@Result<>0) 
	BEGIN
	FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
	END

	INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器挖掘开始 '+@LSName+'')
	SELECT @DigDate=@DigDateN
--遍历挖掘开始
	WHILE @DigDate<=@DigDateEnd
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @TABLENAME VARCHAR(30)
		DECLARE @DateDtr VARCHAR(10)
		DECLARE @year VARCHAR(4),@month VARCHAR(2),@day VARCHAR(2)

		SELECT @year=CAST(datepart(yy, @DigDate) AS VARCHAR(4))
		SELECT @month=CAST(datepart(mm, @DigDate) AS VARCHAR(2))
		SELECT @day=CAST(datepart(dd, @DigDate)AS VARCHAR(2))
		SELECT @DateDtr=replace(convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111),'/','_')

		--挖掘数据
-------------角色基础信息表----------------
		SELECT @TABLENAME=@DateDtr+'playerbaseinfo'
		EXEC ( 'SELECT top 1 1 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SHOW TABLES'' ) WHERE Tables_in_gsdata_db=''playerbaseinfo'' ')
		IF @@rowcount>0
		BEGIN
			INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'统计数据 表'+@TABLENAME+'')

--删除旧的统计数据
			IF(convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)=convert(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(),111))
			BEGIN
				SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_RoleLevel WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+'  AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+' '
				EXEC (@SqlStr)
				SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_RoleLevelGrow WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
				EXEC (@SqlStr)
				SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_RoleLevelRank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
				EXEC (@SqlStr)
				SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_RoleAttackRank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
				EXEC (@SqlStr)
				SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_RoleDefenceRank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
				EXEC (@SqlStr)
				SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_RolePKHonorRank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
				EXEC (@SqlStr)
				DELETE FROM T_MoneySilverExist WHERE F_Year=@year AND F_Month=@month AND F_Day=@day  AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID
			END
--职业等级数量
			IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_RoleLevel WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID)
			BEGIN
			--挖掘新的统计数据
			SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_RoleLevel (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_VocationType, F_VocationNum, F_Level) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',a.nPro,a.num,a.nLevel FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT nLevel,nPro,count(1) AS num FROM playerbaseinfo group by nLevel,nPro'' ) a '
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			END

--金钱存有量 银币
			IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_MoneySilverExist WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID)
			BEGIN
			--挖掘新的统计数据
			SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_MoneySilverExist (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_Money) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',a.TotalMoney FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT sum(dwTotalMoney) AS TotalMoney FROM playerbaseinfo '' ) a '
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			END

--增量统计
		IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_RoleVocation WHERE F_Date=dateadd(d,-1,@DigDate) AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID ) AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_RoleLevelGrow WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID)
		BEGIN
			WITH RVCTE(F_ID, F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_VocationType, F_VocationNum,F_Level) AS
			(SELECT F_ID, F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_VocationType,F_VocationNum, F_Level
			FROM T_RoleLevel WHERE F_Date=@DigDate)
			INSERT INTO T_RoleLevelGrow (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_VocationType, F_VocationNum, F_Level)
			SELECT  a.F_Year, a.F_Month, a.F_Day, a.F_Date, a.F_BigZone, a.F_ZoneID, a.F_VocationType, a.F_VocationNum-isnull(b.F_VocationNum,0),a.F_Level
			FROM    RVCTE a LEFT JOIN  T_RoleLevel b ON a.F_BigZone=b.F_BigZone AND a.F_ZoneID=b.F_ZoneID AND a.F_VocationType=b.F_VocationType AND a.F_Date=dateadd(d,1,b.F_Date) AND a.F_Level=b.F_Level
			union all 
			SELECT  datepart(year,@DigDate), datepart(month,@DigDate), datepart(day,@DigDate), @DigDate, a.F_BigZone, a.F_ZoneID, a.F_VocationType, -a.F_VocationNum,a.F_Level
			FROM   T_RoleLevel  a WHERE a.F_Date=dateadd(d,-1,@DigDate) 
			AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM  RVCTE b WHERE a.F_BigZone=b.F_BigZone AND a.F_ZoneID=b.F_ZoneID AND a.F_VocationType=b.F_VocationType AND a.F_Level=b.F_Level)
		END

--等级排行
			IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_RoleLevelRank WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID)
			BEGIN
			--挖掘新的统计数据
			SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_RoleLevelRank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_Level, F_Experience, F_RoleID, F_Pro,F_RoleName, F_LevelUpTime, F_LastTime) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',a.nLevel,a.n64Exp,a.nGlobalID,a.nPro,a.szName,a.tLevelupTime,a.tLastTime FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT *   FROM  (SELECT nGlobalID,nPro,nLevel,szName,n64Exp,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=0
order by nLevel desc,tLevelupTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT nGlobalID,nPro,nLevel,szName,n64Exp,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=1
order by nLevel desc,tLevelupTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT nGlobalID,nPro,nLevel,szName,n64Exp,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=2
order by nLevel desc,tLevelupTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT nGlobalID,nPro,nLevel,szName,n64Exp,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=3
order by nLevel desc,tLevelupTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT nGlobalID,nPro,nLevel,szName,n64Exp,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=4
order by nLevel desc,tLevelupTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT nGlobalID,nPro,nLevel,szName,n64Exp,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=5
order by nLevel desc,tLevelupTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT nGlobalID,nPro,nLevel,szName,n64Exp,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=6
order by nLevel desc,tLevelupTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT nGlobalID,nPro,nLevel,szName,n64Exp,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=7
order by nLevel desc,tLevelupTime asc limit 0,50) a'' ) a ' 
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			END
--攻击力排行
			IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_RoleAttackRank WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID)
			BEGIN
			--挖掘新的统计数据
			SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_RoleAttackRank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_Attack, F_RoleID, F_RoleName, F_Pro, F_Level, F_LevelUpTime, F_LastTime) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',a.AttackFightAbility,a.nGlobalID,a.szName,a.nPro,a.nLevel,a.tLevelupTime,a.tLastTime FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT *   FROM  (SELECT AttackFightAbility,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=0
order by AttackFightAbility desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT AttackFightAbility,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=1
order by AttackFightAbility desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT AttackFightAbility,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=2
order by AttackFightAbility desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT AttackFightAbility,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=3
order by AttackFightAbility desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT AttackFightAbility,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=4
order by AttackFightAbility desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT AttackFightAbility,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=5
order by AttackFightAbility desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT AttackFightAbility,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=6
order by AttackFightAbility desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT AttackFightAbility,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=7
order by AttackFightAbility desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a'' ) a ' 
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			END

--防御力排行
			IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_RoleDefenceRank WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID)
			BEGIN
			--挖掘新的统计数据
			SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_RoleDefenceRank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_Defence, F_RoleID, F_RoleName, F_Pro, F_Level, F_LevelUpTime, F_LastTime) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',a.DefenceFightAbility,a.nGlobalID,a.szName,a.nPro,a.nLevel,a.tLevelupTime,a.tLastTime FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT *   FROM  (SELECT DefenceFightAbility,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=0
order by DefenceFightAbility desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT DefenceFightAbility,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=1
order by DefenceFightAbility desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT DefenceFightAbility,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=2
order by DefenceFightAbility desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT DefenceFightAbility,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=3
order by DefenceFightAbility desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT DefenceFightAbility,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=4
order by DefenceFightAbility desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT DefenceFightAbility,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=5
order by DefenceFightAbility desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT DefenceFightAbility,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=6
order by DefenceFightAbility desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT DefenceFightAbility,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=7
order by DefenceFightAbility desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a'' ) a ' 
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			END

--PK荣誉排行
			IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_RolePKHonorRank WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID)
			BEGIN
			--挖掘新的统计数据
			SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_RolePKHonorRank (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_PKHonor, F_RoleID, F_RoleName, F_Pro, F_Level, F_LevelUpTime, F_LastTime) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',a.PKHonor,a.nGlobalID,a.szName,a.nPro,a.nLevel,a.tLevelupTime,a.tLastTime FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT *   FROM  (SELECT PKHonor,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=0
order by PKHonor desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT PKHonor,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=1
order by PKHonor desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT PKHonor,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=2
order by PKHonor desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT PKHonor,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=3
order by PKHonor desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT PKHonor,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=4
order by PKHonor desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT PKHonor,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=5
order by PKHonor desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT PKHonor,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=6
order by PKHonor desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a
union all
SELECT * FROM  (SELECT PKHonor,nGlobalID,szName,nPro,nLevel,IF( tLevelupTime=''''0000-00-00 00:00:00'''',NULL, tLevelupTime) AS tLevelupTime,tLastTime FROM playerbaseinfo 
WHERE (nPro div 6)=7
order by PKHonor desc,tLastTime asc limit 0,50) a'' ) a ' 
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			END


		END
		ELSE
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'中不包含表'+@TABLENAME+'')
		END


-------------拍卖行表----------------
		SELECT @TABLENAME=@DateDtr+'t_public_sale_TABLE'
		EXEC ( 'SELECT top 1 1 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SHOW TABLES'' ) WHERE Tables_in_gsdata_db=''t_public_sale_TABLE'' ')
		IF @@rowcount>0
		BEGIN
			INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'统计数据 表'+@TABLENAME+'')

--删除旧的统计数据
			IF(convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)=convert(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(),111))
			BEGIN
				DELETE FROM T_PublicSale WHERE F_Year=@year AND F_Month=@month AND F_Day=@day AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID
				DELETE FROM T_PublicSaleStar WHERE F_Year=@year AND F_Month=@month AND F_Day=@day AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID
				DELETE FROM T_PublicSaleLevel WHERE F_Year=@year AND F_Month=@month AND F_Day=@day AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID
				DELETE FROM T_PublicSaleHuanhua WHERE F_Year=@year AND F_Month=@month AND F_Day=@day AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID
				DELETE FROM T_PublicSaleJinglian WHERE F_Year=@year AND F_Month=@month AND F_Day=@day AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID
				DELETE FROM T_PublicSaleRankFight WHERE F_Year=@year AND F_Month=@month AND F_Day=@day AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID
			END
--拍卖行整体统计
			IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_PublicSale WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID)
			BEGIN
			--挖掘新的统计数据
			SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_PublicSale (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_Num, F_Num0, F_Num1,F_Money,F_Money0,F_Money1,F_ItemNum,F_ItemNum0,F_ItemNum1) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',a.F_Num,a.F_Num0,a.F_Num1,0,a.F_Money0,a.F_Money1,a.F_ItemNum,a.F_ItemNum0,a.F_ItemNum1 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT * FROM (SELECT count(1) AS f_num, 
sum(F_ITEMNUMBER) AS f_itemnum
FROM t_public_sale_TABLE ) aa 
JOIN (SELECT count(1) AS f_num0,
sum(F_ONETIMEMONEY) AS f_money0,
sum(F_ITEMNUMBER) AS f_itemnum0
FROM t_public_sale_TABLE WHERE  F_MONEYTYPE=0) ab    
JOIN (SELECT count(1) AS f_num1,
sum(F_ONETIMEMONEY) AS f_money1,
sum(F_ITEMNUMBER) AS f_itemnum1
FROM t_public_sale_TABLE WHERE  F_MONEYTYPE=1) ac 

 '' ) a '
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			END
--拍卖行星级分布统计
			IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_PublicSaleStar WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID)
			BEGIN
			--挖掘新的统计数据
			SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_PublicSaleStar (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID,F_Level, F_Num, F_Num0, F_Num1,F_Money,F_Money0,F_Money1,F_ItemNum,F_ItemNum0,F_ItemNum1) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',a.F_STRALEVEL,a.F_Num,a.F_Num0,a.F_Num1,0,a.F_Money0,a.F_Money1,a.F_ItemNum,a.F_ItemNum0,a.F_ItemNum1 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT F_STRALEVEL,count(1) AS F_Num,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 0 then 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_Num0,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 1 then 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_Num1,
sum(F_ITEMNUMBER) AS F_ItemNum,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 0 then F_ITEMNUMBER ELSE 0 END) AS F_ItemNum0,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 1 then F_ITEMNUMBER ELSE 0 END) AS F_ItemNum1,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 0 then F_ONETIMEMONEY ELSE 0 END) AS F_Money0,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 1 then F_ONETIMEMONEY ELSE 0 END) AS F_Money1,
sum(F_ONETIMEMONEY)
FROM t_public_sale_TABLE  group by  F_STRALEVEL

 '' ) a '
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			END


--拍卖行等级分布统计
			IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_PublicSaleLevel WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID)
			BEGIN
			--挖掘新的统计数据
			SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_PublicSaleLevel (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID,F_Level, F_Num, F_Num0, F_Num1,F_Money,F_Money0,F_Money1,F_ItemNum,F_ItemNum0,F_ItemNum1) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',a.F_ITEMNEEDLEVEL,a.F_Num,a.F_Num0,a.F_Num1,0,a.F_Money0,a.F_Money1,a.F_ItemNum,a.F_ItemNum0,a.F_ItemNum1 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT F_ITEMNEEDLEVEL,count(1) AS F_Num,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 0 then 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_Num0,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 1 then 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_Num1,
sum(F_ITEMNUMBER) AS F_ItemNum,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 0 then F_ITEMNUMBER ELSE 0 END) AS F_ItemNum0,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 1 then F_ITEMNUMBER ELSE 0 END) AS F_ItemNum1,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 0 then F_ONETIMEMONEY ELSE 0 END) AS F_Money0,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 1 then F_ONETIMEMONEY ELSE 0 END) AS F_Money1,
sum(F_ONETIMEMONEY)
FROM t_public_sale_TABLE  group by  F_ITEMNEEDLEVEL

 '' ) a '
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			END

--拍卖行幻化分布统计
			IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_PublicSaleHuanhua WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID)
			BEGIN
			--挖掘新的统计数据
			SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_PublicSaleHuanhua (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID,F_Level, F_Num, F_Num0, F_Num1,F_Money,F_Money0,F_Money1,F_ItemNum,F_ItemNum0,F_ItemNum1) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',a.F_ITEMHUANHUA,a.F_Num,a.F_Num0,a.F_Num1,0,a.F_Money0,a.F_Money1,a.F_ItemNum,a.F_ItemNum0,a.F_ItemNum1 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT F_ITEMHUANHUA,count(1) AS F_Num,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 0 then 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_Num0,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 1 then 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_Num1,
sum(F_ITEMNUMBER) AS F_ItemNum,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 0 then F_ITEMNUMBER ELSE 0 END) AS F_ItemNum0,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 1 then F_ITEMNUMBER ELSE 0 END) AS F_ItemNum1,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 0 then F_ONETIMEMONEY ELSE 0 END) AS F_Money0,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 1 then F_ONETIMEMONEY ELSE 0 END) AS F_Money1,
sum(F_ONETIMEMONEY)
FROM t_public_sale_TABLE  group by  F_ITEMHUANHUA

 '' ) a '
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			END

--拍卖行精炼分布统计
			IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_PublicSaleJingLian WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID)
			BEGIN
			--挖掘新的统计数据
			SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_PublicSaleJingLian (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID,F_Level, F_Num, F_Num0, F_Num1,F_Money,F_Money0,F_Money1,F_ItemNum,F_ItemNum0,F_ItemNum1) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',a.F_ITEMJINGLIAN,a.F_Num,a.F_Num0,a.F_Num1,0,a.F_Money0,a.F_Money1,a.F_ItemNum,a.F_ItemNum0,a.F_ItemNum1 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT F_ITEMJINGLIAN,count(1) AS F_Num,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 0 then 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_Num0,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 1 then 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_Num1,
sum(F_ITEMNUMBER) AS F_ItemNum,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 0 then F_ITEMNUMBER ELSE 0 END) AS F_ItemNum0,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 1 then F_ITEMNUMBER ELSE 0 END) AS F_ItemNum1,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 0 then F_ONETIMEMONEY ELSE 0 END) AS F_Money0,
sum(CASE F_MONEYTYPE  when 1 then F_ONETIMEMONEY ELSE 0 END) AS F_Money1,
sum(F_ONETIMEMONEY)
FROM t_public_sale_TABLE  group by  F_ITEMJINGLIAN

 '' ) a '
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			END
--拍卖行战斗力排行
			IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_PublicSaleRankFight WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID)
			BEGIN
			--挖掘新的统计数据
			SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_PublicSaleRankFight (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_ExcelID, F_RoleID, F_RoleName, F_FightValue, F_SaleID) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',a.F_EXCELID,a.F_OWNERID,a.F_OWNERNAME,a.F_FIGHT_VALUE,a.F_ID FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT  F_EXCELID,F_OWNERID,F_OWNERNAME,F_FIGHT_VALUE,F_ID
FROM t_public_sale_TABLE order by F_FIGHT_VALUE desc limit 0,100

 '' ) a '
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			END
		END
		ELSE
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'中不包含表'+@TABLENAME+'')
		END

-------------公会基础表----------------
		SELECT @TABLENAME=@DateDtr+'corps_baseinfotable'
		EXEC ( 'SELECT top 1 1 FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SHOW TABLES'' ) WHERE Tables_in_gsdata_db=''corps_baseinfotable'' ')
		IF @@rowcount>0
		BEGIN
			INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'统计数据 表'+@TABLENAME+'')

--删除旧的统计数据
			IF(convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)=convert(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(),111))
			BEGIN
				DELETE FROM T_CorpsRankHonor WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID
				DELETE FROM T_CorpsRankLevel WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID
				DELETE FROM T_CorpsRankUCount WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID
			END

--公会繁荣度统计
			IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_CorpsRankHonor WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID)
			BEGIN
			--挖掘新的统计数据
			SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_CorpsRankHonor (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_CorpsHonor,F_CorpsID, F_CorpsName, F_CorpsLevel, F_OrgCreaterName,F_CreaterName, F_CreaterPro,F_CurMoney, F_CurExp, F_CreateTime, F_LastUpDataTime) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', CorpsHonor,CorpsID, CorpsName, CorpsLevel, OrgCreaterName,CreaterName, CreaterPro,CurMoney, CurExp, CreateTime, LastUpDataTime FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT CorpsHonor,CorpsID, CorpsName, CorpsLevel, OrgCreaterName,CreaterName, CreaterPro,CurMoney, CurExp, CreateTime, LastUpDataTime FROM corps_baseinfotable order by CorpsHonor desc,CreateTime asc limit 0,50'') a'
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			END
--公会等级统计
			IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_CorpsRankLevel WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID)
			BEGIN
			--挖掘新的统计数据
			SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_CorpsRankLevel (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_CorpsHonor,F_CorpsID, F_CorpsName, F_CorpsLevel, F_OrgCreaterName,F_CreaterName, F_CreaterPro,F_CurMoney, F_CurExp, F_CreateTime, F_LastUpDataTime) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', CorpsHonor,CorpsID, CorpsName, CorpsLevel, OrgCreaterName,CreaterName, CreaterPro,CurMoney, CurExp, CreateTime, LastUpDataTime FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT CorpsHonor,CorpsID, CorpsName, CorpsLevel, OrgCreaterName,CreaterName, CreaterPro,CurMoney, CurExp, CreateTime, LastUpDataTime FROM corps_baseinfotable order by CorpsLevel desc,CreateTime asc limit 0,50'') a'
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			END
--公会人数统计
			IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_CorpsRankUCount WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID AND F_ZoneID=@F_BattleZoneID)
			BEGIN
			--挖掘新的统计数据
			SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_CorpsRankUCount (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_CorpsHonor,F_CorpsID, F_CorpsName, F_CorpsLevel, F_OrgCreaterName,F_CreaterName, F_CreaterPro,F_CurMoney, F_CurExp, F_CreateTime, F_LastUpDataTime,F_UserCount) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+', CorpsHonor,CorpsID, CorpsName, CorpsLevel, OrgCreaterName,CreaterName, CreaterPro,CurMoney, CurExp, CreateTime, LastUpDataTime,ucount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT CorpsHonor, a.CorpsID,CorpsName, CorpsLevel, OrgCreaterName,CreaterName, CreaterPro,CurMoney, CurExp, CreateTime, LastUpDataTime,ucount
FROM 
(SELECT CorpsID ,count(1) AS ucount  FROM Corps_MemberTable group by CorpsID order by  ucount desc  limit 0,50) AS  a
 LEFT JOIN
corps_baseinfotable AS b ON a.CorpsID=b.CorpsID'') a'
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			END

--战区信息统计
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_ZoneInfo_Total WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' AND F_ZoneID='+@F_BattleZoneID+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据 
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_ZoneInfo_Total (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_WSZ_CSD, F_XYL_CSD, F_TJM_CSD,F_FY_DataContent,F_FY_DateTime) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',F_WSZ_CSD,F_XYL_CSD,F_TJM_CSD,F_FY_DataContent,F_FY_DateTime FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''
SELECT 
     (SELECT BOOM FROM uniontable WHERE UNIONID=1) AS F_WSZ_CSD,
     (SELECT BOOM FROM uniontable WHERE UNIONID=2) AS F_XYL_CSD,
     (SELECT BOOM FROM uniontable WHERE UNIONID=3) AS F_TJM_CSD,
     (SELECT DATACONTENT FROM crossgsdatasave_baseinfo WHERE nDataID=1) AS F_FY_DataContent,
     (SELECT LastModify  FROM crossgsdatasave_baseinfo WHERE nDataID=1) AS F_FY_DateTime'' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)  


		END
		ELSE
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'中不包含表'+@TABLENAME+'')
		END


	    --挖掘结束

		--挖掘数据的日期递增
		SELECT @DigDate=Dateadd(DAY,1,@DigDate)
	END
--遍历挖掘结束
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器挖掘结束 '+@LSName+'')

END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
SELECT @Result=1 
SELECT @SqlStr
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器出错 数据库'+@LSName+' 信息:'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
END CATCH

FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
END
CLOSE SynDBTable_CURSOR
DEALLOCATE SynDBTable_CURSOR
--游标结束

INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'挖掘数据结束[_Dig_GSLOGDB]-数据时间'+CAST(@DigDateN AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))
END
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[_Dig_GameLogDB]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:00 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
------------------------------------
--项目名称：挖掘数据库日志
--说明：游戏数据库
--时间：2012-07-05 11:11:59 HCH
------------------------------------
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[_Dig_GameLogDB]
@DigDate SMALLDATETIME,			--开始日期
@DigDateEnd SMALLDATETIME=NULL,	--结束日期(如果不为空,则为@DigDate到@DigDateEnd的数据同步)
@Result INT OUTPUT
 AS 
BEGIN
DECLARE @LSName NVARCHAR(50),@GUID VARCHAR(36),@SqlStr VARCHAR(MAX)
DECLARE @DigDateN DATETIME
SELECT @DigDate=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)
SELECT @DigDateEnd=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDateEnd,111)
SELECT @DigDateN=@DigDate
print '@DigDateEnd'
print @DigDateEnd
IF (@DigDateEnd is NULL OR @DigDateN>@DigDateEnd) SELECT @DigDateEnd=@DigDateN

--查看是否运行中
DECLARE	@JobItem NVARCHAR(50)
SELECT @JobItem='_Dig_GameLogDB'

SELECT @GUID =newid()
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'挖掘数据开始[_Dig_GSLOGDB]-数据时间'+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))

--游标开始
DECLARE @F_ID INT,@F_DBType TINYINT,@F_BigZoneID VARCHAR(5),@F_BattleZoneID VARCHAR(10),@F_DBIP NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBName NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBUser NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBPSW NVARCHAR(30)
DECLARE SynDBTable_CURSOR CURSOR LOCAL FOR SELECT F_ID,F_DBType,F_BigZoneID,F_BattleZoneID,F_DBIP,F_DBName,F_DBUser,F_DBPSW FROM T_BaseParamDB  WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_DBType=1 and F_State=1
OPEN SynDBTable_CURSOR
FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
BEGIN
BEGIN TRY
	SELECT @Result=0
	SELECT @LSName='LKSV_'+CAST(@F_DBType AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+@F_DBName+'_'+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+''--链接服务器名称
	print @LSName
--链接服务器判断
	IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM sys.servers WITH(NOLOCK)  WHERE is_linked=1 AND name=@LSName)
	BEGIN--链接服务器不存在
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器不存在 '+@LSName+'')
		SELECT @Result=1001 
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @retval INT
		BEGIN TRY
			EXEC @retval = sys.sp_testlinkedserver @LSName
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
			SET @retval = sign(@@error);
			INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'信息'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
		END CATCH;
		IF @retval<>0 --链接服务器无法连接远程服务器
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'')
		SELECT @Result=1002
		END 
	END
	print @Result
	IF(@Result<>0) 
	BEGIN
	FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
	END

	INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器挖掘开始 '+@LSName+'')

	SELECT @DigDate=@DigDateN
--遍历挖掘开始
	print 'run while foreach'
	WHILE @DigDate<=@DigDateEnd
	BEGIN
		
		print @DigDate
		print @DigDateEnd
		DECLARE @TABLENAME VARCHAR(30),@TABLENAMEN VARCHAR(30),@TABLENAMEP1 VARCHAR(30),@TABLENAMEP2 VARCHAR(30)
		DECLARE @DateDtr VARCHAR(10),@DateDtrN VARCHAR(10),@DateDtrP1 VARCHAR(10),@DateDtrP2 VARCHAR(10)
		DECLARE @year VARCHAR(4),@month VARCHAR(2),@day VARCHAR(2),@NDate VARCHAR(30),@NTableCTE NVARCHAR(MAX)

		SELECT @year=CAST(datepart(yy, @DigDate) AS VARCHAR(4))
		SELECT @month=CAST(datepart(mm, @DigDate) AS VARCHAR(2))
		SELECT @day=CAST(datepart(dd, @DigDate)AS VARCHAR(2))

		SELECT @NDate=CAST(dateadd(d,1,@DigDate) AS VARCHAR(30))
		SELECT  @DateDtr=convert(VARCHAR(8), @DigDate,112)
		SELECT  @DateDtrP1=convert(VARCHAR(8), dateadd(d,-1,@DigDate),112)
		SELECT  @DateDtrP2=convert(VARCHAR(8), dateadd(d,-2,@DigDate),112)

		SELECT  @DateDtrN=convert(VARCHAR(8), dateadd(d,1,@DigDate),112)
		SELECT @TABLENAME='T_UserEnterExitLog'+ @DateDtr
		SELECT @TABLENAMEN='T_UserEnterExitLog'+ @DateDtrN
		print '@TABLENAME'
		print @TABLENAME
		print @TABLENAMEN
		
		SELECT @TABLENAMEP1='T_UserEnterExitLog'+ @DateDtrP1
		SELECT @TABLENAMEP2='T_UserEnterExitLog'+ @DateDtrP2
		print '@TABLENAMEP2: '+@TABLENAMEP2

		--挖掘数据
		print @TABLENAME
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'统计数据 表'+@TABLENAME+'')

--		--挖掘新的统计数据
--		SELECT @NTableCTE='WITH tableCTE(F_LogID, F_UserID, F_UserName, F_LoginTime, F_LoginNGSID, F_ZoneID, F_LoginIP, F_LoginType, F_ExitTime)
--		AS
--		(
--		SELECT F_LogID, F_UserID, F_UserName,CASE when F_LoginTime<'''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''' then  '''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''' ELSE F_LoginTime END AS F_LoginTime, F_LoginNGSID, F_ZoneID, F_LoginIP, F_LoginType, F_ExitTime FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK)'
--		DECLARE @iNum INT
--		DECLARE @iSQLSt NVARCHAR(300);
--		DECLARE @iParm NVARCHAR(300);
--		SET @iSQLSt =N'SELECT top 1 @iNum=1 FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.sysobjects WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE name=@TABLENAMEN AND xtype= ''U''';
--		SET @iParm = N'@TABLENAMEN VARCHAR(30),@iNum INT OUTPUT';
--		EXECUTE sp_executesql @iSQLSt,@iParm,@TABLENAMEN,@iNum OUTPUT; 
--		IF @iNum is NOT NULL
--		BEGIN
--		SELECT @NTableCTE=@NTableCTE+' union all
--		SELECT F_LogID, F_UserID, F_UserName, F_LoginTime, F_LoginNGSID, F_ZoneID, F_LoginIP, F_LoginType,CASE when F_ExitTime>='''+@NDate+''' then  dateadd(n,-1,'''+@NDate+''') ELSE F_ExitTime END AS F_ExitTime FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAMEN+' WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_LoginTime<'''+@NDate+'''';
--		END
--		SELECT @NTableCTE=@NTableCTE+') ';
--		--删除旧的统计数据
--		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_UserOnlineBaseDig WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+''
--		EXEC (@SqlStr)
--		DELETE FROM T_UserOnlineLoginRank WHERE F_Year=@year AND F_Month=@month  AND F_Day=@day
--SELECT @SqlStr=@NTableCTE+N'INSERT INTO T_UserOnlineBaseDig (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Hour,F_Date,F_BigZone,F_ZoneID, F_LoginNum, F_LoginIpNum,F_ExitNum, F_ExitIpNum) SELECT F_Year='+@year+',F_Month='+@month+',F_Day='+@day+',a.F_Hour AS F_Hour,'''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',a.F_ZoneID,isnull(b.F_LoginNum,0) AS F_LoginNum,isnull(b.F_LoginIpNum,0) AS F_LoginIpNum,isnull(c.F_ExitNum,0) AS F_ExitNum,isnull(c.F_ExitIpNum,0) AS F_ExitIpNum
--		FROM (SELECT * FROM 
--(SELECT F_Hour=0 union all SELECT  1 union all SELECT  2 union all SELECT  3 union all SELECT  4 union all SELECT  5 union all SELECT  6 union all SELECT  7 union all SELECT  8 union all SELECT  9 union all SELECT 10 union all SELECT  11 union all SELECT  12 union all SELECT  13 union all SELECT  14 union all SELECT  15 union all SELECT  16 union all SELECT  17 union all SELECT  18 union all SELECT  19 union all SELECT  20 union all SELECT  21 union all SELECT  22 union all SELECT  23) a JOIN (SELECT distinct(F_ZoneID) AS F_ZoneID FROM tableCTE ) b ON 1=1
--) AS a
--		 LEFT outer JOIN
--		(SELECT  F_ZoneID,datepart(hh, F_LoginTime) AS F_Hour,count(1)  AS F_LoginNum,COUNT(DISTINCT(F_LoginIP)) AS F_LoginIpNum FROM tableCTE group by F_ZoneID,datepart(hh, F_LoginTime)) AS b ON a.F_Hour=b.F_Hour AND a.F_ZoneID=b.F_ZoneID
--		 LEFT outer JOIN
--		(SELECT  F_ZoneID,datepart(hh, F_ExitTime) AS F_Hour,count(1)  AS F_ExitNum,COUNT(DISTINCT(F_LoginIP)) AS F_ExitIpNum FROM tableCTE group by F_ZoneID,datepart(hh, F_ExitTime)) AS c ON a.F_Hour=c.F_Hour AND a.F_ZoneID=c.F_ZoneID'
--
--		EXEC (@SqlStr)
--
----更新在线人数、在线IP
--		DECLARE @num INT
--		SELECT @SqlStr=@NTableCTE+'UPDATE T_UserOnlineBaseDig SET F_OnlineNum=c.F_OnlineNum,F_OnlineIpNum=c.F_OnlineIpNum  FROM T_UserOnlineBaseDig b inner JOIN (SELECT F_Date='''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''',F_Hour,F_ZoneID,F_OnlineNum,F_OnlineIpNum FROM ('
--
--		SELECT @num=0
--		WHILE(@num<24)
--		BEGIN
--			SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+'SELECT F_Hour='+CAST(@num AS VARCHAR(2))+',F_ZoneID,count(DISTINCT(F_UserID)) AS F_OnlineNum,count(DISTINCT(F_LoginIP)) AS F_OnlineIpNum FROM tableCTE WHERE datepart(hh, F_LoginTime)='+CAST(@num AS VARCHAR(2))+' OR datepart(hh, F_ExitTime)='+CAST(@num AS VARCHAR(2))+' OR ((datepart(hh, F_LoginTime)<'+CAST(@num AS VARCHAR(2))+'  ) AND datepart(hh, F_ExitTime)>'+CAST(@num AS VARCHAR(2))+') group by F_ZoneID
--		'
--		IF @num<>23 SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' union all '
--		SELECT @num=@num+1
--		END
--		SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' ) w ) c ON (b.F_ZoneID=c.F_ZoneID AND b.F_Date=c.F_Date AND b.F_Hour=c.F_Hour)'
--
--		EXEC (@SqlStr)
--
--	--更新总在线时长
--SELECT @SqlStr=@NTableCTE+'UPDATE T_UserOnlineBaseDig SET F_OnlineTime=c.F_OnlineTime FROM T_UserOnlineBaseDig b inner JOIN (SELECT F_Date='''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''',F_Hour,F_ZoneID,F_OnlineTime FROM ('
--		SELECT @num=0
--		WHILE(@num<24)
--		BEGIN
--		SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+'SELECT F_Hour='+CAST(@num AS VARCHAR(2))+',F_ZoneID,isnull(Sum(
--Datediff(n, CASE when datepart(hh, F_LoginTime)<'+CAST(@num AS VARCHAR(2))+' then dateadd(hh,'+CAST(@num AS VARCHAR(2))+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''') ELSE F_LoginTime END ,CASE when datepart(hh, F_ExitTime)>'+CAST(@num AS VARCHAR(2))+' OR (datepart(hh, F_ExitTime)=23 AND datepart(n, F_ExitTime)=59) then dateadd(hh,'+CAST(@num+1 AS VARCHAR(2))+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''') ELSE F_ExitTime END)
--),0) AS F_OnlineTime FROM tableCTE WHERE datepart(hh, F_LoginTime)='+CAST(@num AS VARCHAR(2))+' OR datepart(hh, F_ExitTime)='+CAST(@num AS VARCHAR(2))+' OR ((datepart(hh, F_LoginTime)<'+CAST(@num AS VARCHAR(2))+'  ) AND datepart(hh, F_ExitTime)>'+CAST(@num AS VARCHAR(2))+') group by F_ZoneID'
--		IF @num<>23 SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' union all '
--		SELECT @num=@num+1
--		END
--		SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+' ) w ) c ON (b.F_ZoneID=c.F_ZoneID AND b.F_Date=c.F_Date AND b.F_Hour=c.F_Hour)'
--
--		EXEC (@SqlStr)


DECLARE @Num INT
DECLARE @SQLSt NVARCHAR(300);
DECLARE @Parm NVARCHAR(300);

print '用户登录统计'
--用户登录统计
	print @DateDtr
	print @F_BigZoneID
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_UserLoginZone WHERE F_Date='''+@DateDtr+'''  AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+'  '
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		print 'statistic online user'
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_UserLoginZone (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date,F_BigZone,F_ZoneID, F_UserLoginNum, F_IPLoginNum,F_UserLoginDay2,F_UserLoginDay3) SELECT F_Year='+@year+',F_Month='+@month+',F_Day='+@day+','''+@DateDtr+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+','+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',(SELECT count(DISTINCT(F_UserID)) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK)) AS F_UserLoginNum,(SELECT count(DISTINCT(F_LoginIP)) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK)) AS F_IPLoginNum '
		print @SqlStr
		
		SET @SQLSt =N'SELECT top 1 @Num=1 FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.sysobjects WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE name=@TABLENAME AND xtype= ''U''';
		SET @Parm = N'@TABLENAME VARCHAR(30),@Num INT OUTPUT';
		print @SQLSt
		print '@TABLENAMEP1: '+@TABLENAMEP1
		EXECUTE sp_executesql @SQLSt,@Parm,@TABLENAMEP1,@Num OUTPUT; 
		print 'out put ：'
		print @Num
		
		
		IF @Num is NOT NULL
		BEGIN
			SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+N',(SELECT count(1) FROM (SELECT COUNT(F_UserID) AS aa FROM  
			(
			SELECT DISTINCT(F_UserID) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK)
			UNION ALL
			SELECT DISTINCT(F_UserID) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAMEP1+' WITH(NOLOCK)  
			) a  GROUP BY F_UserID HAVING COUNT(F_UserID)=2 ) b) AS F_UserLoginDay2'

			print @SqlStr
			SET @SQLSt =N'SELECT top 1 @Num=1 FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.sysobjects WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE name=@TABLENAME AND xtype= ''U''';
			SET @Parm = N'@TABLENAME VARCHAR(30),@Num INT OUTPUT';
			EXECUTE sp_executesql @SQLSt,@Parm,@TABLENAMEP2,@Num OUTPUT; 
			IF @Num is NOT NULL
			BEGIN
			SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+N',(SELECT count(1) FROM (SELECT COUNT(F_UserID) AS aa FROM  
			(
			SELECT DISTINCT(F_UserID) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK)
			UNION ALL
			SELECT DISTINCT(F_UserID) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAMEP1+' WITH(NOLOCK)
			UNION ALL
			SELECT DISTINCT(F_UserID) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAMEP2+' WITH(NOLOCK)
			) a  GROUP BY F_UserID HAVING COUNT(F_UserID)=3 ) b) AS F_UserLoginDay3'
			END
			ELSE
			BEGIN
			SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+N',0 AS F_UserLoginDay3'
			END
		END
		ELSE
		BEGIN
		SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+N',0 AS F_UserLoginDay2'
		SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+N',0 AS F_UserLoginDay3'
		END
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

--活跃用户 流失 回归

		--删除旧的统计数据
		IF(convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)=convert(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(),111))
		BEGIN
			SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_UserStateActive WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+'  AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' '
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_UserStateLose WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+'  AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' '
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_UserStateBack WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+'  AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' '
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
		END

		SELECT @Num=NULL
		SET @SQLSt =N'SELECT top 1 @Num=1 FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.sysobjects WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE name=@TABLENAME AND xtype= ''U''';
		SET @Parm = N'@TABLENAME VARCHAR(30),@Num INT OUTPUT';
		EXECUTE sp_executesql @SQLSt,@Parm,'T_UserStatis',@Num OUTPUT; 

		IF @Num is NOT NULL
		BEGIN
--活跃用户
			IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_UserStateActive WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID)
			BEGIN

				SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_UserStateActive (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date,F_BigZone,F_FirstLoginNum, F_CTNLoginDay3, F_CTNLoginDay4,F_CTNLoginDay5,F_CTNLoginDay6,F_CTNLoginDay7AM) SELECT F_Year='+@year+',F_Month='+@month+',F_Day='+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',
	SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_FirstLoginTime,'''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''')=0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_FirstLoginNum,
	SUM(CASE WHEN F_CTNLoginCount=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_CTNLoginDay3,
	SUM(CASE WHEN F_CTNLoginCount=4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_CTNLoginDay4,
	SUM(CASE WHEN F_CTNLoginCount=5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_CTNLoginDay5,
	SUM(CASE WHEN F_CTNLoginCount=6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_CTNLoginDay6,
	SUM(CASE WHEN F_CTNLoginCount>=7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_CTNLoginDay7AM
	FROM  ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.T_UserStatis WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_ActiveTime>='''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''' AND F_ActiveTime<'''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@NDate)+''' '
				EXEC (@SqlStr)
			END
--流失
			IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_UserStateLose WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID)
			BEGIN
				SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_UserStateLose (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date,F_BigZone, F_NoLoginDay3, F_NoLoginDay4,F_NoLoginDay5,F_NoLoginDay6,F_NoLoginDay7AM) SELECT F_Year='+@year+',F_Month='+@month+',F_Day='+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',
	SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,'''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''')=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_NoLoginDay3,
	SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,'''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''')=4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_NoLoginDay4,
	SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,'''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''')=5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_NoLoginDay5,
	SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,'''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''')=6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_NoLoginDay6,
	SUM(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(D,F_ActiveTime,'''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''')>=7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_NoLoginDay7AM
	FROM  ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.T_UserStatis WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_ActiveTime<'''+CAST(dateadd(d,-2,@DigDate) AS VARCHAR(30))+''' '
				EXEC (@SqlStr)
			END
--回归
			IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_UserStateBack WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID)
			BEGIN
				SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_UserStateBack (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date,F_BigZone, F_BackIntervalDay3, F_BackIntervalDay4,F_BackIntervalDay5,F_BackIntervalDay6,F_BackIntervalDay7AM) SELECT F_Year='+@year+',F_Month='+@month+',F_Day='+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',
	SUM(CASE WHEN F_LastLoginInterval=3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_BackIntervalDay3,
	SUM(CASE WHEN F_LastLoginInterval=4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_BackIntervalDay4,
	SUM(CASE WHEN F_LastLoginInterval=5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_BackIntervalDay5,
	SUM(CASE WHEN F_LastLoginInterval=6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_BackIntervalDay6,
	SUM(CASE WHEN F_LastLoginInterval>=7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS F_BackIntervalDay7AM
	FROM  ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.T_UserStatis WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_ActiveTime>='''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''' AND F_ActiveTime<'''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@NDate)+''' '
				EXEC (@SqlStr)
			END

		END
IF(convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)<>convert(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(),111))
BEGIN
--登录次数排行
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_UserOnlineLoginRank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+'  AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' '
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_UserOnlineLoginRank (F_UserID,F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date,F_BigZone,F_ZoneID, F_LoginNum, F_UserName, F_LoginIP) SELECT distinct(F_UserID),F_Year='+@year+',F_Month='+@month+',F_Day='+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',F_ZoneID,(SELECT count(1) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_UserID=a.F_UserID AND F_ZoneID=a.F_ZoneID) AS F_LoginNum,F_UserName,(SELECT count(distinct(F_LoginIP)) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_UserID=a.F_UserID AND F_ZoneID=a.F_ZoneID) AS F_LoginIP FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' a WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_UserID in (SELECT top 10 F_UserID FROM  ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' b WITH(NOLOCK)  WHERE a.F_ZoneID=b.F_ZoneID  group by  F_UserID order by  count(1) desc) order by F_LoginNum desc'

		EXEC (@SqlStr)
----IP数排行
 
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_UserOnlineIPRank WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+'  AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' '
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_UserOnlineIPRank (F_LoginIP,F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date,F_BigZone,F_ZoneID, F_LoginNum, F_UserName) SELECT rtrim(F_LoginIP),F_Year='+@year+',F_Month='+@month+',F_Day='+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',F_ZoneID,(SELECT count(1) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_LoginIP=a.F_LoginIP AND F_ZoneID=a.F_ZoneID) AS F_LoginNum,(SELECT count(distinct(F_UserName)) FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_LoginIP=a.F_LoginIP AND F_ZoneID=a.F_ZoneID) AS F_LoginIP FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' a  WITH(NOLOCK)WHERE F_LoginIP in (SELECT top 10 F_LoginIP FROM  ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' b WITH(NOLOCK)  WHERE a.F_ZoneID=b.F_ZoneID  group by  F_LoginIP order by  count(1) desc) group by F_ZoneID,F_LoginIP order by F_LoginNum desc'

		EXEC (@SqlStr)
----分布地区统计
 
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_UserLoginArea WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+'  AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' '
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_UserLoginArea (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date,F_BigZone,F_ZoneID, F_AreaName, F_IPLoginNum) SELECT F_Year='+@year+',F_Month='+@month+',F_Day='+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',1,isnull(F_AreaName,''其它地区''),count(1) FROM 
(SELECT (SELECT top 1 F_AreaName FROM T_BaseIPAddress WHERE ip >=  F_IPBeginN AND ip <= F_IPEndN) AS F_AreaName FROM 
(SELECT distinct(dbo.F_IP2INT(F_LoginIP)) AS ip FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK) )
 a) b group by F_AreaName'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
END
----时间段用户数量统计
		DECLARE @ExitTime DATETIME
		IF(convert(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(),112)=convert(VARCHAR(8),@DigDate,112))
		SELECT @ExitTime=GETDATE()
		ELSE
		SELECT @ExitTime=dateadd(d,1,@DigDate)

		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_UserLoginTimePara WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+'  AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' '
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_UserLoginTimePara (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date,F_BigZone,F_ZoneID, F_TimePara, F_UserNum) SELECT F_Year='+@year+',F_Month='+@month+',F_Day='+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',1,F_TimePara,count(1) FROM 
(
SELECT Sum(F_TimeCount)/60 AS F_TimePara FROM 
(SELECT  F_UserID,(CASE when F_TimeCount=0 AND F_ExitTime is NULL then datediff(n,F_LoginTime,'''+convert(NVARCHAR(50),@ExitTime)+''') ELSE F_TimeCount END) AS F_TimeCount FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameLogDB.dbo.'+@TABLENAME+' WITH(NOLOCK)) a group by F_UserID
) a group by F_TimePara'

		EXEC (@SqlStr)

	    --挖掘结束

		--挖掘数据的日期递增
		SELECT @DigDate=Dateadd(DAY,1,@DigDate)
	END
--遍历挖掘结束
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器挖掘结束 '+@LSName+'')

END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
SELECT @Result=1 
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器出错 数据库'+@LSName+' 信息:'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
END CATCH

FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
END
CLOSE SynDBTable_CURSOR
DEALLOCATE SynDBTable_CURSOR
--游标结束

INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'挖掘数据结束[_Dig_GSLOGDB]-数据时间'+CAST(@DigDateN AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))
END
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[_Dig_GameCoreDB]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:00 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
------------------------------------
--项目名称：挖掘数据库日志
--说明：游戏数据库
--时间：2013-08-21 10:11:59 Liucj
------------------------------------
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[_Dig_GameCoreDB]
@DigDate SMALLDATETIME,			--开始日期
@DigDateEnd SMALLDATETIME=NULL,	--结束日期(如果不为空,则为@DigDate到@DigDateEnd的数据同步)
@Result INT OUTPUT
 AS 
BEGIN
DECLARE @LSName NVARCHAR(50),@GUID VARCHAR(36),@SqlStr VARCHAR(MAX)
DECLARE @DigDateN DATETIME
SELECT @DigDate=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)
SELECT @DigDateEnd=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDateEnd,111)
SELECT @DigDateN=@DigDate
IF (@DigDateEnd is NULL OR @DigDateN>@DigDateEnd) SELECT @DigDateEnd=@DigDateN

--查看是否运行中
DECLARE	@JobItem NVARCHAR(50)
SELECT @JobItem='_Dig_GameCoreDB'

SELECT @GUID =newid()
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'挖掘数据开始[_Dig_GSLOGDB]-数据时间'+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))
print 'coming [_Dig_GameCoreDB],start job'

print 'will select service ip'
--游标开始
DECLARE @F_ID INT,@F_DBType TINYINT,@F_BigZoneID VARCHAR(5),@F_BattleZoneID VARCHAR(10),@F_DBIP NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBName NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBUser NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBPSW NVARCHAR(30)
DECLARE SynDBTable_CURSOR CURSOR LOCAL FOR SELECT F_ID,F_DBType,F_BigZoneID,F_BattleZoneID,F_DBIP,F_DBName,F_DBUser,F_DBPSW FROM T_BaseParamDB  WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_DBType=2 and F_State=1
OPEN SynDBTable_CURSOR
FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
BEGIN
BEGIN TRY
	print 'where '
	SELECT @Result=0
	SELECT @LSName='LKSV_'+CAST(@F_DBType AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+@F_DBName+'_'+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))--链接服务器名称
	print ' select service '+@LSName
--链接服务器判断
	IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM sys.servers WITH(NOLOCK)  WHERE is_linked=1 AND name=@LSName)
	BEGIN--链接服务器不存在
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器不存在 '+@LSName+'')
		SELECT @Result=1001 
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @retval INT
		BEGIN TRY
			EXEC @retval = sys.sp_testlinkedserver @LSName
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
			SET @retval = sign(@@error);
			INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'信息'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
		END CATCH;
		IF @retval<>0 --链接服务器无法连接远程服务器
		BEGIN
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'')
		SELECT @Result=1002
		END 
	END

	IF(@Result<>0) 
	BEGIN
	FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
	END

	INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器挖掘开始 '+@LSName+'')

	SELECT @DigDate=@DigDateN
--遍历挖掘开始
	WHILE @DigDate<=@DigDateEnd
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @TABLENAME VARCHAR(30)
		DECLARE @DateDtr VARCHAR(10)
		DECLARE @year VARCHAR(4),@month VARCHAR(2),@day VARCHAR(2),@NDate VARCHAR(30) 

		SELECT @year=CAST(datepart(yy, @DigDate) AS VARCHAR(4))
		SELECT @month=CAST(datepart(mm, @DigDate) AS VARCHAR(2))
		SELECT @day=CAST(datepart(dd, @DigDate)AS VARCHAR(2))
		SELECT @DateDtr=replace(convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111),'/','_')
		SELECT @NDate=CAST(dateadd(d,1,@DigDate) AS VARCHAR(30))

		--挖掘数据
		-------------角色表----------------
		SELECT @TABLENAME='T_RoleBaseData '+@DateDtr

		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器'+@LSName+'统计数据 表'+@TABLENAME+'')
	
--同步角色名称 临时解决角色名乱码问题,还是需要统一编码,因为还有聊天内容乱码的问题.
		SELECT @SqlStr='INSERT INTO T_BaseRoleCreate
		SELECT     '+convert(NVARCHAR(2),@F_BigZoneID)+',F_RoleID, F_RoleName, F_UserID,'+convert(NVARCHAR(2),@F_BattleZoneID)+'
		FROM         ['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleCreate WITH(NOLOCK)
		WHERE     F_RoleID > (SELECT isnull(MAX(F_RoleID),0) FROM T_BaseRoleCreate WHERE F_BigZoneID='+convert(NVARCHAR(2),@F_BigZoneID)+' )'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)


		--删除旧的统计数据
		IF(convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)=convert(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(),111))
		BEGIN
