			SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_RoleVocation WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' '
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_RoleLoseLevel WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' '
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_RoleLoseTimeFrist WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' '
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
			SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM T_RoleLoseTimeAll WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+' AND F_BigZone='+@F_BigZoneID+' '
			EXEC (@SqlStr)
		END


		--挖掘新的统计数据
--总量统计
		IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_RoleVocation WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID)
		BEGIN
			 SELECT @SqlStr=N'
			INSERT INTO T_RoleVocation (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_VocationType, F_VocationNum) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',F_ZoneID,F_Pro,sum(num) AS Pnum
			FROM    
			(  SELECT F_ZoneID,F_Pro,count(1) AS num FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_0 WITH(NOLOCK)
			WHERE F_CreateTime<'''+@NDate+'''
			group by F_ZoneID, F_Pro 
			union all
			SELECT F_ZoneID,F_Pro,count(1) AS num FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_1  WITH(NOLOCK)
			WHERE F_CreateTime<'''+@NDate+'''
			group by F_ZoneID, F_Pro 
			union all
			SELECT F_ZoneID,F_Pro,count(1) AS num FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_2  WITH(NOLOCK)
			WHERE F_CreateTime<'''+@NDate+'''
			group by F_ZoneID, F_Pro 
			union all
			SELECT F_ZoneID,F_Pro,count(1) AS num FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_3  WITH(NOLOCK)
			WHERE F_CreateTime<'''+@NDate+'''
			group by F_ZoneID, F_Pro 
			union all
			SELECT F_ZoneID,F_Pro,count(1) AS num FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_4 WITH(NOLOCK)
			WHERE F_CreateTime<'''+@NDate+'''
			group by F_ZoneID, F_Pro 
			) AS a 
			group by F_ZoneID, F_Pro'
					EXEC (@SqlStr)
		END
		

--增量统计

	        DELETE FROM T_RoleVocationGrow WHERE F_Date=@DigDate  AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID;
            INSERT INTO T_RoleVocationGrow (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_VocationType, F_VocationNum)
			SELECT distinct a.F_Year, a.F_Month, a.F_Day, a.F_Date, a.F_BigZone, a.F_ZoneID, a.F_VocationType, a.F_VocationNum-isnull(b.F_VocationNum,0) FROM T_RoleVocation a
            INNER JOIN T_RoleVocation b ON a.F_BigZone=b.F_BigZone AND a.F_ZoneID=b.F_ZoneID AND a.F_VocationType=b.F_VocationType and a.F_Date=@DigDate and b.F_Date=dateadd(d,-1,@DigDate)

--流失等级统计
		IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_RoleLoseLevel WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID)
		BEGIN
			 SELECT @SqlStr=N'
			INSERT INTO T_RoleLoseLevel (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_Level,F_Pro, F_Num) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro,sum(num) AS Pnum
			FROM    
			(  SELECT F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro,count(1) AS num FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_0 WITH(NOLOCK)
			WHERE F_UpdateTime<Dateadd(DAY,-3,'''+@NDate+''')
			group by F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro
			union all
			SELECT F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro,count(1) AS num FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_1  WITH(NOLOCK)
			WHERE F_UpdateTime<Dateadd(DAY,-3,'''+@NDate+''')
			group by F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro
			union all
			SELECT F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro,count(1) AS num FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_2  WITH(NOLOCK)
			WHERE F_UpdateTime<Dateadd(DAY,-3,'''+@NDate+''')
			group by F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro
			union all
			SELECT F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro,count(1) AS num FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_3  WITH(NOLOCK)
			WHERE F_UpdateTime<Dateadd(DAY,-3,'''+@NDate+''')
			group by F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro
			union all
			SELECT F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro,count(1) AS num FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_4 WITH(NOLOCK)
			WHERE F_UpdateTime<Dateadd(DAY,-3,'''+@NDate+''')
			group by F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro
			) AS a 
			group by F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro'

			EXEC (@SqlStr)
		END

--流失在线时长统计
		IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_RoleLoseTimeFrist WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID)
		BEGIN
			 SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_RoleLoseTimeFrist (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_TimePara,F_Pro, F_Num) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',F_ZoneID,F_TimePara,F_Pro,sum(num) AS Pnum
			FROM    
			(  SELECT F_ZoneID,convert(VARCHAR(9),MAX(b1))+''-''+convert(VARCHAR(9),b2) AS F_TimePara,F_Pro,count(1) AS num FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_0 a WITH(NOLOCK)
 LEFT JOIN (SELECT 0 b1,5 b2 union all SELECT 6,10 union all SELECT 11,15 union all SELECT 16,30 union all SELECT 31,60 union all SELECT 61,90
union all SELECT 91,120 union all SELECT 121,180 union all SELECT 181,300 union all SELECT 301,9999999) b ON a.F_OnlineTime>=b1 AND a.F_OnlineTime<=b2
			WHERE F_OnlineNum=1 AND F_UpdateTime<Dateadd(DAY,-3,'''+@NDate+''')
			group by F_ZoneID,F_Pro,b2
			union all
			SELECT F_ZoneID,convert(VARCHAR(9),MAX(b1))+''-''+convert(VARCHAR(9),b2),F_Pro,count(1) AS num FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_1 a WITH(NOLOCK)
 LEFT JOIN (SELECT 0 b1,5 b2 union all SELECT 6,10 union all SELECT 11,15 union all SELECT 16,30 union all SELECT 31,60 union all SELECT 61,90
union all SELECT 91,120 union all SELECT 121,180 union all SELECT 181,300 union all SELECT 301,9999999) b ON a.F_OnlineTime>=b1 AND a.F_OnlineTime<=b2
			WHERE F_OnlineNum=1 AND F_UpdateTime<Dateadd(DAY,-3,'''+@NDate+''')
			group by F_ZoneID,F_Pro,b2
			union all
			SELECT F_ZoneID,convert(VARCHAR(9),MAX(b1))+''-''+convert(VARCHAR(9),b2),F_Pro,count(1) AS num FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_2 a WITH(NOLOCK)
 LEFT JOIN (SELECT 0 b1,5 b2 union all SELECT 6,10 union all SELECT 11,15 union all SELECT 16,30 union all SELECT 31,60 union all SELECT 61,90
union all SELECT 91,120 union all SELECT 121,180 union all SELECT 181,300 union all SELECT 301,9999999) b ON a.F_OnlineTime>=b1 AND a.F_OnlineTime<=b2
			WHERE F_OnlineNum=1 AND F_UpdateTime<Dateadd(DAY,-3,'''+@NDate+''')
			group by F_ZoneID,F_Pro,b2
			union all
			SELECT F_ZoneID,convert(VARCHAR(9),MAX(b1))+''-''+convert(VARCHAR(9),b2),F_Pro,count(1) AS num FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_3 a WITH(NOLOCK)
 LEFT JOIN (SELECT 0 b1,5 b2 union all SELECT 6,10 union all SELECT 11,15 union all SELECT 16,30 union all SELECT 31,60 union all SELECT 61,90
union all SELECT 91,120 union all SELECT 121,180 union all SELECT 181,300 union all SELECT 301,9999999) b ON a.F_OnlineTime>=b1 AND a.F_OnlineTime<=b2
			WHERE F_OnlineNum=1 AND F_UpdateTime<Dateadd(DAY,-3,'''+@NDate+''')
			group by F_ZoneID,F_Pro,b2
			union all
			SELECT F_ZoneID,convert(VARCHAR(9),MAX(b1))+''-''+convert(VARCHAR(9),b2),F_Pro,count(1) AS num FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_4 a WITH(NOLOCK)
 LEFT JOIN (SELECT 0 b1,5 b2 union all SELECT 6,10 union all SELECT 11,15 union all SELECT 16,30 union all SELECT 31,60 union all SELECT 61,90
union all SELECT 91,120 union all SELECT 121,180 union all SELECT 181,300 union all SELECT 301,9999999) b ON a.F_OnlineTime>=b1 AND a.F_OnlineTime<=b2
			WHERE F_OnlineNum=1 AND F_UpdateTime<Dateadd(DAY,-3,'''+@NDate+''')
			group by F_ZoneID,F_Pro,b2	) AS a 
			group by F_ZoneID,F_Pro,F_TimePara'

			EXEC (@SqlStr)
		END

--流失累计在线时长统计
		IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_RoleLoseTimeALL WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID)
		BEGIN
			 SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_RoleLoseTimeALL (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_TimePara,F_Pro, F_Num) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',F_ZoneID,TimePara,F_Pro,sum(num) AS Pnum
			FROM    
			(  
SELECT F_ZoneID,CASE 
when F_OnlineTime< 60*24 then CAST(F_OnlineTime/60 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''HOUR'' 
when F_OnlineTime< 60*24*30 then CAST(F_OnlineTime/60/24 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''DAY'' 
ELSE  CAST(F_OnlineTime/60/24/30 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''MONTH'' 
END AS TimePara,F_Pro,count(1) AS num FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_0  
WHERE F_OnlineNum>0 AND F_UpdateTime<Dateadd(DAY,-3,'''+@NDate+''')
group by F_ZoneID,F_Pro,CASE 
when F_OnlineTime< 60*24 then CAST(F_OnlineTime/60 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''HOUR'' 
when F_OnlineTime< 60*24*30 then CAST(F_OnlineTime/60/24 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''DAY'' 
ELSE  CAST(F_OnlineTime/60/24/30 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''MONTH'' 
END
			union all
SELECT F_ZoneID,CASE 
when F_OnlineTime< 60*24 then CAST(F_OnlineTime/60 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''HOUR'' 
when F_OnlineTime< 60*24*30 then CAST(F_OnlineTime/60/24 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''DAY'' 
ELSE  CAST(F_OnlineTime/60/24/30 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''MONTH'' 
END AS TimePara,F_Pro,count(1) AS num FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_1  
WHERE F_OnlineNum>0 AND F_UpdateTime<Dateadd(DAY,-3,'''+@NDate+''')
group by F_ZoneID,F_Pro,CASE 
when F_OnlineTime< 60*24 then CAST(F_OnlineTime/60 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''HOUR'' 
when F_OnlineTime< 60*24*30 then CAST(F_OnlineTime/60/24 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''DAY'' 
ELSE  CAST(F_OnlineTime/60/24/30 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''MONTH'' 
END
			union all
SELECT F_ZoneID,CASE 
when F_OnlineTime< 60*24 then CAST(F_OnlineTime/60 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''HOUR'' 
when F_OnlineTime< 60*24*30 then CAST(F_OnlineTime/60/24 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''DAY'' 
ELSE  CAST(F_OnlineTime/60/24/30 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''MONTH'' 
END AS TimePara,F_Pro,count(1) AS num FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_2  
WHERE F_OnlineNum>0 AND F_UpdateTime<Dateadd(DAY,-3,'''+@NDate+''')
group by F_ZoneID,F_Pro,CASE 
when F_OnlineTime< 60*24 then CAST(F_OnlineTime/60 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''HOUR'' 
when F_OnlineTime< 60*24*30 then CAST(F_OnlineTime/60/24 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''DAY'' 
ELSE  CAST(F_OnlineTime/60/24/30 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''MONTH'' 
END
			union all
SELECT F_ZoneID,CASE 
when F_OnlineTime< 60*24 then CAST(F_OnlineTime/60 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''HOUR'' 
when F_OnlineTime< 60*24*30 then CAST(F_OnlineTime/60/24 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''DAY'' 
ELSE  CAST(F_OnlineTime/60/24/30 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''MONTH'' 
END AS TimePara,F_Pro,count(1) AS num FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_3  
WHERE F_OnlineNum>0 AND F_UpdateTime<Dateadd(DAY,-3,'''+@NDate+''')
group by F_ZoneID,F_Pro,CASE 
when F_OnlineTime< 60*24 then CAST(F_OnlineTime/60 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''HOUR'' 
when F_OnlineTime< 60*24*30 then CAST(F_OnlineTime/60/24 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''DAY'' 
ELSE  CAST(F_OnlineTime/60/24/30 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''MONTH'' 
END
			union all
SELECT F_ZoneID,CASE 
when F_OnlineTime< 60*24 then CAST(F_OnlineTime/60 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''HOUR'' 
when F_OnlineTime< 60*24*30 then CAST(F_OnlineTime/60/24 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''DAY'' 
ELSE  CAST(F_OnlineTime/60/24/30 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''MONTH'' 
END AS TimePara,F_Pro,count(1) AS num FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_4  
WHERE F_OnlineNum>0 AND F_UpdateTime<Dateadd(DAY,-3,'''+@NDate+''')
group by F_ZoneID,F_Pro,CASE 
when F_OnlineTime< 60*24 then CAST(F_OnlineTime/60 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''HOUR'' 
when F_OnlineTime< 60*24*30 then CAST(F_OnlineTime/60/24 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''DAY'' 
ELSE  CAST(F_OnlineTime/60/24/30 AS VARCHAR(2))  +''MONTH'' 
END
) AS a 
			group by F_ZoneID,F_Pro,TimePara'

			EXEC (@SqlStr)
		END

 --同步在线角色,最高在线
		IF (convert(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE(),112)=convert(VARCHAR(8), @DigDate,112))
		BEGIN
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO T_RoleOnLineFlow (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_GGSID, F_GGSNAME, F_GNGSID, F_GNGSNAME, F_GZONEID, F_GZONENAME, F_PlayerNumOnline, F_MaxPlayerNumHistory, F_DateTimeMaxPlayerNum)
		SELECT    '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',a.F_ZONEID, a.F_GSID, d.F_GSNAME,a.F_NGSID,c.F_NAME, a.F_ZONEID,b.F_ZONENAME, F_PlayerNumOnline, F_MaxPlayerNumHistory, F_DateTimeMaxPlayerNum
		FROM ['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_GSPlayerNumInfo a  WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN ['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_BattleZone b WITH(NOLOCK)  ON a.F_ZONEID=b.F_ZONEID LEFT JOIN ['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_BattleLine c WITH(NOLOCK) ON a.F_NGSID=c.F_NGSID LEFT JOIN ['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_GameServer d WITH(NOLOCK) ON a.F_GSID=d.F_GSID '
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		END

--等级耗时统计
		IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_RoleLevelTime WHERE F_Date=@DigDate AND F_BigZone=@F_BigZoneID)
		BEGIN
			 SELECT @SqlStr=N'
			INSERT INTO T_RoleLevelTime (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_Level,F_Pro, F_Num) SELECT '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(NVARCHAR(30),@DigDate)+''','+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+',F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro,avg(num) AS Pnum
			FROM    
			(  SELECT F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro,avg(F_OnlineTime) AS num FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_0 WITH(NOLOCK)
			WHERE F_UpdateTime<Dateadd(DAY,-3,'''+@NDate+''')
			group by F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro
			union all
			SELECT F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro,avg(F_OnlineTime) AS num FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_1  WITH(NOLOCK)
			WHERE F_UpdateTime<Dateadd(DAY,-3,'''+@NDate+''')
			group by F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro
			union all
			SELECT F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro,avg(F_OnlineTime) AS num FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_2  WITH(NOLOCK)
			WHERE F_UpdateTime<Dateadd(DAY,-3,'''+@NDate+''')
			group by F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro
			union all
			SELECT F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro,avg(F_OnlineTime) AS num FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_3  WITH(NOLOCK)
			WHERE F_UpdateTime<Dateadd(DAY,-3,'''+@NDate+''')
			group by F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro
			union all
			SELECT F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro,avg(F_OnlineTime) AS num FROM 
			['+@LSName+'].GameCoreDB.dbo.T_RoleBaseData_4 WITH(NOLOCK)
			WHERE F_UpdateTime<Dateadd(DAY,-3,'''+@NDate+''')
			group by F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro
			) AS a 
			group by F_ZoneID,F_Level,F_Pro'

			EXEC (@SqlStr)
		END

	    --挖掘结束

		--挖掘数据的日期递增
		SELECT @DigDate=Dateadd(DAY,1,@DigDate)
	END
print @LSName
--遍历挖掘结束
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器挖掘结束 '+@LSName+'')

END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
print @LSName
SELECT @Result=1 
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器出错 数据库'+@LSName+' 信息:'+ERROR_MESSAGE()+ isnull(@SqlStr,''))
END CATCH

FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
END
CLOSE SynDBTable_CURSOR
print 'job end'
DEALLOCATE SynDBTable_CURSOR
--游标结束

INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'挖掘数据结束[_Dig_GSLOGDB]-数据时间'+CAST(@DigDateN AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))
END
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[_Dig_EquipStarVacation]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:00 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
------------------------------------
--项目名称：挖掘道具掉落统计
--说明：
--时间：2011-05-04 14:51:32 HCH
------------------------------------
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[_Dig_EquipStarVacation]
@DigDate SMALLDATETIME,				--挖掘的数据的日期
@DigDateEnd SMALLDATETIME=NULL,	--挖掘的数据结束的日期(如果不为空,则为@DigDate到@DigDateEnd的数据同步)
@Result INT OUTPUT
 AS 
BEGIN
--初始化变量
DECLARE @LSName NVARCHAR(70)
--DECLARE @Result INT
SELECT @Result=0
DECLARE @SqlStr VARCHAR(MAX),@GUID VARCHAR(36)
SELECT @SqlStr='',@GUID=newid()
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'挖掘数据开始_Dig_EquipStarVacation-挖掘数据时间'+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))
--游标开始
DECLARE @F_ID INT,@F_DBIP NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBName NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBUser NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBPSW NVARCHAR(30)
DECLARE SynTable_CURSOR CURSOR LOCAL FOR SELECT TOP 1 F_ID,F_DBIP,F_DBName,F_DBUser,F_DBPSW FROM T_ParamDigDB WITH(NOLOCK)
OPEN SynTable_CURSOR
FETCH NEXT FROM SynTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
BEGIN

BEGIN TRY
	SELECT @LSName='LKSV_'+@F_DBName+''--链接服务器名称
--链接服务器判断
	IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM sys.servers WITH(NOLOCK)  WHERE is_linked=1 AND name=@LSName)
	BEGIN--链接服务器不存在
		SELECT @Result=1001 
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器不存在 数据库'+@F_DBName+'')
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @retval INT
		BEGIN TRY
			EXEC @retval = sys.sp_testlinkedserver @LSName;
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
			SET @retval = sign(@@error);
			INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 数据库'+@F_DBName+'信息'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
		END CATCH;
		IF @retval<>0 --链接服务器无法连接远程服务器
		BEGIN SELECT @Result=1002 
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'链接服务器无法连通 数据库'+@F_DBName) END 
	END

--数据结束时间判断
	IF(@DigDateEnd is NULL OR @DigDateEnd<@DigDate) SELECT @DigDateEnd=@DigDate
	IF(@Result<>0) BEGIN FETCH NEXT  FROM SynTable_CURSOR  INTO @F_ID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW Continue END
--遍历挖掘开始
	WHILE @DigDate<=@DigDateEnd
	BEGIN
	--检测是否存在当前日期的日志表
		DECLARE @TABLENAME VARCHAR(30)
		DECLARE @DateDtr VARCHAR(10)
		DECLARE @year VARCHAR(4),@month VARCHAR(2),@day VARCHAR(2)

		SELECT @year=CAST(datepart(yy, @DigDate) AS VARCHAR(4))
		SELECT @month=CAST(datepart(mm, @DigDate) AS VARCHAR(2))
		SELECT @day=CAST(datepart(dd, @DigDate)AS VARCHAR(2))
		SELECT  @DateDtr=replace(convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111),'/','_')
		SELECT @TABLENAME=@DateDtr+'_drop_log'

		
		--判断是否存在表
		IF OBJECT_ID (@TABLENAME, 'U') IS NOT NULL
		BEGIN
		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM  '+@LSName+'.'+@F_DBName+'.dbo.T_EquipStarVacation WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO '+@LSName+'.'+@F_DBName+'.dbo.T_EquipStarVacation (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_Vocation, F_StarLevel, F_ItemCount) select '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+',max(a.F_BigZoneID),max(a.F_BattleZoneID),max(b.F_Vocation),max(b.F_StarLevel),count(1) from ['+@TABLENAME+'] a left join T_GameItem b on a.PARA_1=b.F_ExcelID where  F_StarLevel is not null group by a.F_BigZoneID,a.F_BattleZoneID, b.F_Vocation,b.F_StarLevel '
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM  '+@LSName+'.'+@F_DBName+'.dbo.T_EquipLevelVacation WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO '+@LSName+'.'+@F_DBName+'.dbo.T_EquipLevelVacation (F_Year, F_Month, F_Day, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_SuitName, F_EquipType, F_Vocation, F_StarLevel, F_ItemCount) select '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+',max(a.F_BigZoneID),max(a.F_BattleZoneID), max(F_SuitName), max(F_EquipType), max(F_Vocation), max(F_StarLevel),count(1) from ['+@TABLENAME+'] a left join T_GameItem b on a.PARA_1=b.F_ExcelID where  F_StarLevel is not null group by a.F_BigZoneID,a.F_BattleZoneID, b.F_SuitName, b.F_EquipType, b.F_Vocation, b.F_StarLevel'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)


		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM  '+@LSName+'.'+@F_DBName+'.dbo.T_MoneyGold WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据
		SELECT @TABLENAME=@DateDtr+'_money_log'
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO '+@LSName+'.'+@F_DBName+'.dbo.T_MoneyGold ( F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_GoldSurplus,F_GoldOut, F_GoldIn) select '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(nvarchar(30),@DigDate)+''',max(F_BigZoneID),max(F_BattleZoneID),SUM(PARA_2) as F_Surplus,(sum(cast(replace(PARA_2,''-'','''') as int))+SUM(PARA_2))/2 as F_Out, (sum(cast(replace(PARA_2,''-'','''') as int))-SUM(PARA_2))/2  as F_In from ['+@TABLENAME+'] WHERE  (OPID = 10037) group by F_BigZoneID,F_BattleZoneID'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)

		--删除旧的统计数据
		SELECT @SqlStr='DELETE FROM  '+@LSName+'.'+@F_DBName+'.dbo.T_MoneyGoldRole WHERE F_Year='+@year+' AND F_Month='+@month+' AND F_Day='+@day+''
		EXEC (@SqlStr)
		--挖掘新的统计数据
		SELECT @TABLENAME=@DateDtr+'_money_log'
		SELECT @SqlStr=N'INSERT INTO '+@LSName+'.'+@F_DBName+'.dbo.T_MoneyGoldRole ( F_Year, F_Month, F_Day,F_Date, F_BigZone, F_ZoneID, F_GoldSurplus,F_GoldOut, F_GoldIn) select '+@year+','+@month+','+@day+','''+convert(nvarchar(30),@DigDate)+''',max(F_BigZoneID),max(F_BattleZoneID),SUM(PARA_2) as F_Surplus,(sum(cast(replace(PARA_2,''-'','''') as int))+SUM(PARA_2))/2 as F_Out, (sum(cast(replace(PARA_2,''-'','''') as int))-SUM(PARA_2))/2  as F_In from ['+@TABLENAME+'] WHERE  (OPID = 10037) group by F_BigZoneID,F_BattleZoneID'
		EXEC (@SqlStr)


		END
		ELSE
		BEGIN INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'同步数据库中不包含表'+@TABLENAME) SELECT @Result=1 END
		--挖掘数据的日期递增
		SELECT @DigDate=Dateadd(DAY,1,@DigDate)
	END
--遍历挖掘结束
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'挖掘数据异常 同步库'+Db_Name()+'挖掘库'+@F_DBName+'消息'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
SELECT @Result=1 
END CATCH


FETCH NEXT  FROM SynTable_CURSOR  INTO @F_ID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
END
CLOSE SynTable_CURSOR
DEALLOCATE SynTable_CURSOR
--游标结束
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'挖掘数据结束_Dig_EquipStarVacation-挖掘数据时间'+CAST(@DigDate AS VARCHAR(30))+N'到'+isnull(CAST(@DigDateEnd AS VARCHAR(30)),''))
END
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[_Query_SQLSERVER]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:00 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
------------------------------------
--项目名称：查询数据库日志
--说明：SQLSERVER通用
--时间：2012-01-05 11:11:59 HCH
------------------------------------
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[_Query_SQLSERVER]
@BigZoneID INT,
@ZoneID INT,
@DBType SMALLINT,
@QueryTable NVARCHAR(MAX),
@Query NVARCHAR(MAX),
@OrderStr NVARCHAR(MAX),
@PageIndex INT,
@PageSize INT,
@PCount INT OUTPUT
 AS 
BEGIN
DECLARE @LSName NVARCHAR(50),@GUID VARCHAR(36),@SqlStr NVARCHAR(MAX)
SELECT @GUID =newid(),@PCount=0
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'查询[_Dig_GSLOGDB]-条件 '+@QueryTable+' '+@Query+'')

BEGIN TRY
--查询开始
	SELECT top 1 @LSName='[LKSV_'+CAST(F_DBType AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+F_DBName+'_'+CAST(F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+CAST(F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'].'+F_DBName+'.dbo.' FROM T_BaseParamDB  WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_DBType=@DBType AND F_BigZoneID=@BigZoneID AND F_BattleZoneID=@ZoneID

	IF(@LSName is NULL)
	BEGIN
	SELECT @PCount=0 
	RETURN
	END
--设置表名
	SELECT @QueryTable=@LSName+@QueryTable
--查询数量
	SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT @PCount=count(1) FROM '+@QueryTable+' '+@Query+' '
--SELECT @SqlStr
	DECLARE @SqlParam NVARCHAR(300);
	SELECT @SqlParam=N'@PCount INT OUTPUT'
	EXEC sp_executesql  @SqlStr,@SqlParam,@PCount OUTPUT;

--查询结果
	DECLARE @pa INT,@pb INT
	SELECT @pa=(@PageIndex-1)*@PageSize+1,@pb=(@PageIndex)*@PageSize
	SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER('+@OrderStr+') AS ROWNUM,* FROM '+@QueryTable+' '+@Query+' '
	SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT * FROM ('+@SqlStr+') A WHERE  ROWNUM BETWEEN '+cast(@pa as nvarchar(10))+' AND '+cast(@pb as nvarchar(10))+' '
--SELECT @SqlStr
	EXEC (@SqlStr)

--查询结束
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
SELECT @PCount=0 
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'查询ERROR 数据库'+@LSName+' 信息:'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
SELECT ERROR_MESSAGE()
END CATCH
END
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[_Query_SQLCustom]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:00 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
------------------------------------
--项目名称：查询数据库日志
--说明：SQLSERVER,MYSQL通用
--时间：2012-01-10 11:11:59 HCH
------------------------------------
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[_Query_SQLCustom]
@BigZoneID INT,
@ZoneID INT,
@DBType SMALLINT,
@Query NVARCHAR(MAX),
@PageIndex INT,
@PageSize INT,
@PCount INT OUTPUT
AS
BEGIN
DECLARE @LSName NVARCHAR(50),@GUID VARCHAR(36),@SqlStr NVARCHAR(MAX)
SELECT @GUID =newid(),@PCount=0
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'查询[LKSV_'+CAST(@DBType AS VARCHAR(5))+'_DBName_'+CAST(@BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+CAST(@ZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+']-条件 '+@Query+'')

if(Patindex('%update%',@Query)>0 or Patindex('%delete%',@Query)>0 or Patindex('%insert%',@Query)>0 or Patindex('%update%',@Query)>0 or Patindex('%exec%',@Query)>0 or Patindex('%sp_%',@Query)>0)
RAISERROR('SQL语句受限,仅允许查询语句', 16,-1)


BEGIN TRY
--查询开始
	SELECT top 1 @LSName='[LKSV_'+CAST(F_DBType AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+F_DBName+'_'+CAST(F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+CAST(F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+']' FROM T_BaseParamDB  WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_DBType=@DBType AND F_BigZoneID=@BigZoneID AND F_BattleZoneID=@ZoneID

	IF(@LSName is NULL)
	BEGIN
	RAISERROR('找不到此数据库配置项', 16,-1)
	END
------查询数量
--	SELECT @SqlStr= 'SELECT @PCount=count(1) FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,'''+@Query+''' ) '
----SELECT @SqlStr
--	DECLARE @SqlParam NVARCHAR(300);
--	SELECT @SqlParam=N'@PCount INT OUTPUT'
--	EXEC sp_executesql  @SqlStr,@SqlParam,@PCount OUTPUT;
--
------查询结果
--	DECLARE @pa INT,@pb INT
--	SELECT @pa=(@PageIndex-1)*@PageSize+1,@pb=(@PageIndex)*@PageSize
--	SELECT @SqlStr= '(SELECT * FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,'''+@Query+''' ) ) aa'
--	SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER( order by F_ID ) AS ROWNUM,* FROM '+@SqlStr+' '
--	SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT * FROM ('+@SqlStr+') A WHERE  ROWNUM BETWEEN '+cast(@pa as nvarchar(10))+' AND '+cast(@pb as nvarchar(10))+' '
----SELECT @SqlStr
--	EXEC (@SqlStr)
--分页方式,改为限制返回行数

	SELECT @SqlStr= 'SELECT * FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,'''+@Query+''' )'
--SELECT @SqlStr
	EXEC (@SqlStr)
	SELECT @PCount=@@ROWCOUNT
	

--查询结束
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
SELECT @PCount=0
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'查询ERROR信息:'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
SELECT ERROR_MESSAGE()
END CATCH
END
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[_Query_RoleLogin]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:00 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
------------------------------------
--项目名称：查询登录角色
--说明：游戏数据库
--时间：2013-06-13 11:11:59 HCH
------------------------------------
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[_Query_RoleLogin]
@DigDate SMALLDATETIME,			--查询日期
@WhereStr varchar(200)
 AS 
BEGIN
DECLARE @LSName NVARCHAR(50),@GUID VARCHAR(36),@SqlStr VARCHAR(MAX),@ErrorInfo VARCHAR(MAX)
DECLARE @DigDateN DATETIME
SELECT @DigDate=convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111)
SELECT @DigDateN=@DigDate,@SqlStr=''


--游标开始
DECLARE @F_ID INT,@F_DBType TINYINT,@F_BigZoneID TINYINT,@F_BattleZoneID INT,@F_DBIP NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBName NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBUser NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBPSW NVARCHAR(30)
DECLARE SynDBTable_CURSOR CURSOR LOCAL FOR SELECT F_ID,F_DBType,F_BigZoneID,F_BattleZoneID,F_DBIP,F_DBName,F_DBUser,F_DBPSW FROM T_BaseParamDB  WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_DBType=0 and F_State=1
OPEN SynDBTable_CURSOR
FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
BEGIN
BEGIN TRY

	SELECT @LSName='LKSV_'+CAST(@F_DBType AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+@F_DBName+'_'+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))--链接服务器名称

--链接服务器判断
	IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM sys.servers WITH(NOLOCK)  WHERE is_linked=1 AND name=@LSName)
	BEGIN--链接服务器不存在
		select @ErrorInfo=N'链接服务器不存在 '+@LSName+''
		RAISERROR(@ErrorInfo, 16,-1)
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
		DECLARE @retval INT
		BEGIN TRY
			EXEC @retval = sys.sp_testlinkedserver @LSName
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
			SET @retval = sign(@@error);
			select @ErrorInfo=N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'信息'+ERROR_MESSAGE()
			RAISERROR(@ErrorInfo, 16,-1)
		END CATCH;
		IF @retval<>0 --链接服务器无法连接远程服务器
		BEGIN
			select @ErrorInfo=N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+''
			RAISERROR(@ErrorInfo, 16,-1)
		END 
	END



		DECLARE @TABLENAME VARCHAR(30),@Lsql nvarchar(300),@Lstate nvarchar(100),@Rcount INT
		DECLARE @DateDtr VARCHAR(10)
		SELECT @DateDtr=replace(convert(VARCHAR(10), @DigDate,111),'/','_')


		-------------角色登录所在的other表----------------
		SELECT @TABLENAME=@DateDtr+'_other_log'
		SELECT @Lsql= N'SELECT @Rcount=COUNT(1) FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SHOW TABLES'' ) WHERE Tables_in_gslog_db='''+@TABLENAME+''' '
		SELECT @Lstate=N'@Rcount INT OUTPUT'
		EXEC SP_EXECUTESQL @Lsql,@Lstate,@Rcount OUTPUT
		IF @Rcount>0
		BEGIN
		SELECT @SqlStr=@SqlStr+N'select CID,UID,CAST(LEVEL AS NVARCHAR(3)) AS LEVEL FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,''SELECT distinct(CID),UID,substring_index(op_bak,''''\t'''',-1) as LEVEL FROM '+@TABLENAME+' where OPID=50080 '+@WhereStr+' '' ) a union '
		END	


END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
	select @ErrorInfo=N'链接服务器无法连通 '+@LSName+'信息'+ERROR_MESSAGE()
	RAISERROR(@ErrorInfo, 16,-1)
END CATCH

FETCH NEXT FROM SynDBTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
END
CLOSE SynDBTable_CURSOR
DEALLOCATE SynDBTable_CURSOR
--游标结束
select @SqlStr=Left(@SqlStr,len(@SqlStr)-6)
select @SqlStr= 'select distinct(CID),UID,F_UserName as UNAME, LEVEL from ('+@SqlStr+') aa left join [LKSV_8_MAINDB_1_-1].MainDB.dbo.T_User bb with(nolock) on aa.UID=bb.F_UserID';

EXEC (@SqlStr)

END
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[_Query_GSLOGDB]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:00 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
------------------------------------
--项目名称：查询数据库日志
--说明：MYSQL的游戏数据(除GSLOGDB外,其它MYSQL游戏库也通用)
--时间：2012-01-05 11:11:59 HCH
------------------------------------
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[_Query_GSLOGDB]
@BigZoneID INT,
@ZoneID INT,
@DBType SMALLINT,
@QueryTable NVARCHAR(50),
@QueryDate SMALLDATETIME,			--查询日期
@Query NVARCHAR(500),
@PageIndex INT,
@PageSize INT,
@PageType INT=0,--分页方式
@PCount INT OUTPUT
 AS 
BEGIN
DECLARE @LSName NVARCHAR(50),@GUID VARCHAR(36),@SqlStr NVARCHAR(MAX)
SELECT @GUID =newid(),@PCount=0
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'查询[_Dig_GSLOGDB]-条件'+isnull(CAST(@QueryDate AS VARCHAR(30)),'')+' '+@QueryTable+' '+@Query+'')

BEGIN TRY
--查询开始
print '@DBType '+convert(varchar(5),@DBType)
print '@BigZoneID '+convert(varchar(5),@BigZoneID) 
print '@ZoneID '+convert(varchar(5),@ZoneID) 

	SELECT top 1 @LSName='LKSV_'+CAST(F_DBType AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+F_DBName+'_'+CAST(F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+CAST(F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5)) FROM T_BaseParamDB  WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE F_DBType=@DBType AND F_BigZoneID=@BigZoneID AND F_BattleZoneID=@ZoneID
	print @QueryTable
	print @LSName
	IF(@LSName is NULL)
	BEGIN
	SELECT @PCount=0 
	
	RETURN
	END
	DECLARE @TABLENAME VARCHAR(30)
	DECLARE @DateDtr VARCHAR(10)

	IF(@QueryDate is NULL)
	BEGIN
		SELECT @TABLENAME= @QueryTable
	END 
	ELSE
	BEGIN
		SELECT @DateDtr=replace(convert(VARCHAR(10), @QueryDate,111),'/','_')
		SELECT @TABLENAME=@DateDtr+@QueryTable
	END
	
	print '@TABLENAME '+@TABLENAME
	 
--查询数量
	IF @PageType=1999--连续ID计数方式
		SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT MAX(ID) AS pcount FROM '+@TABLENAME+' '+@Query+' '
	ELSE--普通计数方式
		SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT count(1) AS pcount FROM '+@TABLENAME+' '+@Query+' '

	SELECT @SqlStr= 'SELECT @PCount=pcount FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,'''+@SqlStr+''' ) '
--SELECT @SqlStr
	DECLARE @SqlParam NVARCHAR(300);
	SELECT @SqlParam=N'@PCount INT OUTPUT'
	EXEC sp_executesql  @SqlStr,@SqlParam,@PCount OUTPUT;
	IF @PCount IS NULL 
		SELECT @PCount=0

--查询结果
	DECLARE @pa INT,@pb INT

	IF @PageType=1999--连续ID分页方式 1999属于屏蔽些方式
	BEGIN
		SELECT @pa=(@PageIndex-1)*@PageSize+1,@pb=@PageIndex*@PageSize
		SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT * FROM '+@TABLENAME+' '+@Query+' AND ID BETWEEN '+CAST(@pa AS VARCHAR(10))+' AND '+CAST(@pb AS VARCHAR(10))+''
	END
	ELSE--普通分页方式
	BEGIN
		SELECT @pa=(@PageIndex-1)*@PageSize,@pb=(@PageIndex+1)*@PageSize
		SELECT @SqlStr='SELECT * FROM '+@TABLENAME+' '+@Query+' limit '+CAST(@pa AS VARCHAR(10))+','+CAST(@PageSize AS VARCHAR(10))+''
	END

print @SqlStr
--SELECT 'SELECT * FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,'''+@SqlStr+''' ) '
	EXEC ( 'SELECT * FROM OPENQUERY ('+@LSName+' ,'''+@SqlStr+''' ) ')

--查询结束
END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
SELECT @PCount=0 
INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'查询ERROR 数据库'+@LSName+' 信息:'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
END CATCH
END
GO
/****** Object:  View [dbo].[RolesData_View]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:01 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[RolesData_View]
AS
SELECT     '1-30级' AS LevelRange, A.F_BigZone AS BigZoneID, A.F_ZoneID AS ZoneID, SUM(A.F_Attack) / COUNT(A.F_ID) AS AvgAttack, SUM(D.F_Defence) / COUNT(D.F_ID) 
                      AS AvgDefence
FROM         dbo.T_RoleAttackRank AS A INNER JOIN
                      dbo.T_RoleDefenceRank AS D ON D.F_RoleID = A.F_RoleID AND D.F_BigZone = A.F_BigZone
WHERE     (A.F_Level > 0) AND (A.F_Level <= 30) AND (A.F_Date = CONVERT(varchar(10), DATEADD(DAY, - 1, GETDATE()), 111))
GROUP BY A.F_BigZone, A.F_ZoneID
UNION ALL
SELECT     '31-40级' AS LevelRange, A.F_BigZone AS BigZoneID, A.F_ZoneID AS ZoneID, SUM(A.F_Attack) / COUNT(A.F_ID) AS AvgAttack, SUM(D.F_Defence) / COUNT(D.F_ID) 
                      AS AvgDefence
FROM         dbo.T_RoleAttackRank AS A INNER JOIN
                      dbo.T_RoleDefenceRank AS D ON D.F_RoleID = A.F_RoleID AND D.F_BigZone = A.F_BigZone
WHERE     (A.F_Level > 30) AND (A.F_Level <= 40) AND (A.F_Date = CONVERT(varchar(10), DATEADD(DAY, - 1, GETDATE()), 111))
GROUP BY A.F_BigZone, A.F_ZoneID
UNION ALL
SELECT     '41-50级' AS LevelRange, A.F_BigZone AS BigZoneID, A.F_ZoneID AS ZoneID, SUM(A.F_Attack) / COUNT(A.F_ID) AS AvgAttack, SUM(D.F_Defence) / COUNT(D.F_ID) 
                      AS AvgDefence
FROM         dbo.T_RoleAttackRank AS A INNER JOIN
                      dbo.T_RoleDefenceRank AS D ON D.F_RoleID = A.F_RoleID AND D.F_BigZone = A.F_BigZone
WHERE     (A.F_Level > 40) AND (A.F_Level <= 45) AND (A.F_Date = CONVERT(varchar(10), DATEADD(DAY, - 1, GETDATE()), 111))
GROUP BY A.F_BigZone, A.F_ZoneID
UNION ALL
SELECT     '51-55级' AS LevelRange, A.F_BigZone AS BigZoneID, A.F_ZoneID AS ZoneID, SUM(A.F_Attack) / COUNT(A.F_ID) AS AvgAttack, SUM(D.F_Defence) / COUNT(D.F_ID) 
                      AS AvgDefence
FROM         dbo.T_RoleAttackRank AS A INNER JOIN
                      dbo.T_RoleDefenceRank AS D ON D.F_RoleID = A.F_RoleID AND D.F_BigZone = A.F_BigZone
WHERE     (A.F_Level > 50) AND (A.F_Level <= 55) AND (A.F_Date = CONVERT(varchar(10), DATEADD(DAY, - 1, GETDATE()), 111))
GROUP BY A.F_BigZone, A.F_ZoneID
UNION ALL
SELECT     '56-60级' AS LevelRange, A.F_BigZone AS BigZoneID, A.F_ZoneID AS ZoneID, SUM(A.F_Attack) / COUNT(A.F_ID) AS AvgAttack, SUM(D.F_Defence) / COUNT(D.F_ID) 
                      AS AvgDefence
FROM         dbo.T_RoleAttackRank AS A INNER JOIN
                      dbo.T_RoleDefenceRank AS D ON D.F_RoleID = A.F_RoleID AND D.F_BigZone = A.F_BigZone
WHERE     (A.F_Level > 55) AND (A.F_Level <= 60) AND (A.F_Date = CONVERT(varchar(10), DATEADD(DAY, - 1, GETDATE()), 111))
GROUP BY A.F_BigZone, A.F_ZoneID
UNION ALL
SELECT     '61-65级' AS LevelRange, A.F_BigZone AS BigZoneID, A.F_ZoneID AS ZoneID, SUM(A.F_Attack) / COUNT(A.F_ID) AS AvgAttack, SUM(D.F_Defence) / COUNT(D.F_ID) 
                      AS AvgDefence
FROM         dbo.T_RoleAttackRank AS A INNER JOIN
                      dbo.T_RoleDefenceRank AS D ON D.F_RoleID = A.F_RoleID AND D.F_BigZone = A.F_BigZone
WHERE     (A.F_Level > 60) AND (A.F_Level <= 65) AND (A.F_Date = CONVERT(varchar(10), DATEADD(DAY, - 1, GETDATE()), 111))
GROUP BY A.F_BigZone, A.F_ZoneID
UNION ALL
SELECT     '66-70级' AS LevelRange, A.F_BigZone AS BigZoneID, A.F_ZoneID AS ZoneID, SUM(A.F_Attack) / COUNT(A.F_ID) AS AvgAttack, SUM(D.F_Defence) / COUNT(D.F_ID) 
                      AS AvgDefence
FROM         dbo.T_RoleAttackRank AS A INNER JOIN
                      dbo.T_RoleDefenceRank AS D ON D.F_RoleID = A.F_RoleID AND D.F_BigZone = A.F_BigZone
WHERE     (A.F_Level > 65) AND (A.F_Level <= 70) AND (A.F_Date = CONVERT(varchar(10), DATEADD(DAY, - 1, GETDATE()), 111))
GROUP BY A.F_BigZone, A.F_ZoneID
UNION ALL
SELECT     '71-75级' AS LevelRange, A.F_BigZone AS BigZoneID, A.F_ZoneID AS ZoneID, SUM(A.F_Attack) / COUNT(A.F_ID) AS AvgAttack, SUM(D.F_Defence) / COUNT(D.F_ID) 
                      AS AvgDefence
FROM         dbo.T_RoleAttackRank AS A INNER JOIN
                      dbo.T_RoleDefenceRank AS D ON D.F_RoleID = A.F_RoleID AND D.F_BigZone = A.F_BigZone
WHERE     (A.F_Level > 70) AND (A.F_Level <= 75) AND (A.F_Date = CONVERT(varchar(10), DATEADD(DAY, - 1, GETDATE()), 111))
GROUP BY A.F_BigZone, A.F_ZoneID
UNION ALL
SELECT     '76-80级' AS LevelRange, A.F_BigZone AS BigZoneID, A.F_ZoneID AS ZoneID, SUM(A.F_Attack) / COUNT(A.F_ID) AS AvgAttack, SUM(D.F_Defence) / COUNT(D.F_ID) 
                      AS AvgDefence
FROM         dbo.T_RoleAttackRank AS A INNER JOIN
                      dbo.T_RoleDefenceRank AS D ON D.F_RoleID = A.F_RoleID AND D.F_BigZone = A.F_BigZone
WHERE     (A.F_Level > 75) AND (A.F_Level <= 80) AND (A.F_Date = CONVERT(varchar(10), DATEADD(DAY, - 1, GETDATE()), 111))
GROUP BY A.F_BigZone, A.F_ZoneID
UNION ALL
SELECT     '81-85级' AS LevelRange, A.F_BigZone AS BigZoneID, A.F_ZoneID AS ZoneID, SUM(A.F_Attack) / COUNT(A.F_ID) AS AvgAttack, SUM(D.F_Defence) / COUNT(D.F_ID) 
                      AS AvgDefence
FROM         dbo.T_RoleAttackRank AS A INNER JOIN
                      dbo.T_RoleDefenceRank AS D ON D.F_RoleID = A.F_RoleID AND D.F_BigZone = A.F_BigZone
WHERE     (A.F_Level > 80) AND (A.F_Level <= 85) AND (A.F_Date = CONVERT(varchar(10), DATEADD(DAY, - 1, GETDATE()), 111))
GROUP BY A.F_BigZone, A.F_ZoneID
UNION ALL
SELECT     '86-90级' AS LevelRange, A.F_BigZone AS BigZoneID, A.F_ZoneID AS ZoneID, SUM(A.F_Attack) / COUNT(A.F_ID) AS AvgAttack, SUM(D.F_Defence) / COUNT(D.F_ID) 
                      AS AvgDefence
FROM         dbo.T_RoleAttackRank AS A INNER JOIN
                      dbo.T_RoleDefenceRank AS D ON D.F_RoleID = A.F_RoleID AND D.F_BigZone = A.F_BigZone
WHERE     (A.F_Level > 85) AND (A.F_Level <= 90) AND (A.F_Date = CONVERT(varchar(10), DATEADD(DAY, - 1, GETDATE()), 111))
GROUP BY A.F_BigZone, A.F_ZoneID
UNION ALL
SELECT     '91-95级' AS LevelRange, A.F_BigZone AS BigZoneID, A.F_ZoneID AS ZoneID, SUM(A.F_Attack) / COUNT(A.F_ID) AS AvgAttack, SUM(D.F_Defence) / COUNT(D.F_ID) 
                      AS AvgDefence
FROM         dbo.T_RoleAttackRank AS A INNER JOIN
                      dbo.T_RoleDefenceRank AS D ON D.F_RoleID = A.F_RoleID AND D.F_BigZone = A.F_BigZone
WHERE     (A.F_Level > 90) AND (A.F_Level <= 95) AND (A.F_Date = CONVERT(varchar(10), DATEADD(DAY, - 1, GETDATE()), 111))
GROUP BY A.F_BigZone, A.F_ZoneID
UNION ALL
SELECT     '96-100级' AS LevelRange, A.F_BigZone AS BigZoneID, A.F_ZoneID AS ZoneID, SUM(A.F_Attack) / COUNT(A.F_ID) AS AvgAttack, SUM(D.F_Defence) / COUNT(D.F_ID) 
                      AS AvgDefence
FROM         dbo.T_RoleAttackRank AS A INNER JOIN
                      dbo.T_RoleDefenceRank AS D ON D.F_RoleID = A.F_RoleID AND D.F_BigZone = A.F_BigZone
WHERE     (A.F_Level > 95) AND (A.F_Level <= 100) AND (A.F_Date = CONVERT(varchar(10), DATEADD(DAY, - 1, GETDATE()), 111))
GROUP BY A.F_BigZone, A.F_ZoneID
UNION ALL
SELECT     '101-105级' AS LevelRange, A.F_BigZone AS BigZoneID, A.F_ZoneID AS ZoneID, SUM(A.F_Attack) / COUNT(A.F_ID) AS AvgAttack, SUM(D.F_Defence) / COUNT(D.F_ID) 
                      AS AvgDefence
FROM         dbo.T_RoleAttackRank AS A INNER JOIN
                      dbo.T_RoleDefenceRank AS D ON D.F_RoleID = A.F_RoleID AND D.F_BigZone = A.F_BigZone
WHERE     (A.F_Level > 100) AND (A.F_Level <= 105) AND (A.F_Date = CONVERT(varchar(10), DATEADD(DAY, - 1, GETDATE()), 111))
GROUP BY A.F_BigZone, A.F_ZoneID
GO
EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_DiagramPane1', @value=N'[0E232FF0-B466-11cf-A24F-00AA00A3EFFF, 1.00]
Begin DesignProperties = 
   Begin PaneConfigurations = 
      Begin PaneConfiguration = 0
         NumPanes = 4
         Configuration = "(H (1[40] 4[20] 2[20] 3) )"
      End
      Begin PaneConfiguration = 1
         NumPanes = 3

   End
   Begin DiagramPane =

         Left = 0
      End
      Begin Tables = 
      End
   End
   Begin SQLPane =

         Width = 284

   End
   Begin CriteriaPane = 
      Begin ColumnWidths = 5
         Column = 1440
         Alias = 900
         Table = 1170
         Output = 720
         Append = 1400
         NewValue = 1170
         SortType = 1350
         SortOrder = 1410
         GroupBy = 1350
         Filter = 1350
         Or = 1350
         Or = 1350
         Or = 1350
      End
   End
End
' , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'VIEW',@level1name=N'RolesData_View'

EXEC sys.sp_addextendedproperty @name=N'MS_DiagramPaneCount', @value=1 , @level0type=N'SCHEMA',@level0name=N'dbo', @level1type=N'VIEW',@level1name=N'RolesData_View'
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[_Init_LinkServerAndJob]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:01 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
------------------------------------
--项目名称：初始化链接服务器设置
--说明：
--时间：2012-7-25 10:02:32 HCH
------------------------------------
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[_Init_LinkServerAndJob]
@Result VARCHAR(200) OUTPUT--运行结果
 AS 
BEGIN
SELECT @Result='链接服务器及作业计划JOB初始化成功'
BEGIN TRY
--游标开始
DECLARE @LSName NVARCHAR(50),@F_ID INT,@F_DBType TINYINT,@F_BigZoneID TINYINT,@F_BattleZoneID INT,@F_DBIP NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBPort NVARCHAR(10),@F_DBName NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBUser NVARCHAR(30),@F_DBPSW NVARCHAR(30)
DECLARE SynTable_CURSOR CURSOR LOCAL FOR SELECT F_ID,F_DBType,F_BigZoneID,F_BattleZoneID,F_DBIP,F_DBPort,F_DBName,F_DBUser,F_DBPSW FROM T_BaseParamDB WHERE LEN(F_DBPSW)>0
OPEN SynTable_CURSOR
FETCH NEXT FROM SynTable_CURSOR INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBPort,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
WHILE @@FETCH_STATUS = 0
BEGIN

	SELECT @LSName='LKSV_'+CAST(@F_DBType AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+@F_DBName+'_'+CAST(@F_BigZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))+'_'+CAST(@F_BattleZoneID AS VARCHAR(5))--链接服务器名称
--建立链接服务器
	IF EXISTS(SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM sys.servers WITH(NOLOCK)  WHERE is_linked=1 AND name=@LSName)
	BEGIN
	EXEC sp_dropserver  @LSName, 'droplogins' 
	END

	IF(@F_DBType=0  OR @F_DBType=3 OR @F_DBType=7)--GSLOG_DB,GSDATADB,GSPARA_DB
	BEGIN
		IF (@F_DBPort IS NULL OR LEN(@F_DBPort)=0) 
		SELECT @F_DBPort=3306
		print 'case 0 3 7'
		print '@F_DBIP :'+@F_DBIP
		print '@F_DBName :'+@F_DBName
		print '@F_DBUser :'+@F_DBUser
		DECLARE @Prov NVARCHAR(300)--35 ms
		SELECT @Prov= 'DRIVER={MySQL ODBC 5.1 Driver};SERVER='+@F_DBIP+';DATABASE='+@F_DBName+';UID='+@F_DBUser+';PORT='+@F_DBPort+';OPTION=2049'
		print @Prov
		print '@LSName :'+@LSName
		EXEC sp_addlinkedserver @server=@LSName, @srvproduct = @F_DBName, @provider = 'MSDASQL', @datasrc = NULL, @location = NULL, @provstr =@Prov, @catalog = NULL
		EXEC sp_addlinkedsrvlogin @rmtsrvname=@LSName, @useself='false', @rmtuser=@F_DBUser, @rmtpassword=@F_DBPSW;
	END
	ELSE IF(@F_DBType=1 OR @F_DBType=2 OR @F_DBType=4 OR @F_DBType=5 OR @F_DBType=8)--GAMELOGDB,GAMECOREDB,GSSDB,UserCoreDB,MainDB
	BEGIN
		EXEC master.dbo.sp_addlinkedserver @server = @LSName, @srvproduct=N'SQLSERVER', @provider=N'SQLOLEDB', @datasrc=@F_DBIP,@catalog=@F_DBName
		EXEC master.dbo.sp_addlinkedsrvlogin @rmtsrvname = @LSName, @locallogin = NULL , @useself = N'False', @rmtuser = @F_DBUser, @rmtpassword = @F_DBPSW
	END
	ELSE
	BEGIN
	SELECT 1
	END

	EXEC master.dbo.sp_serveroption @server=@LSName, @optname=N'rpc', @optvalue=N'true'
	EXEC master.dbo.sp_serveroption @server=@LSName, @optname=N'rpc out', @optvalue=N'true'
print '@LSName :'+@LSName
--测试连接
	DECLARE @retval INT
	BEGIN TRY
		EXEC @retval = sys.sp_testlinkedserver @LSName;
	END TRY
	BEGIN CATCH
		SET @retval = sign(@@error);
		SELECT @Result='IP:'+@F_DBIP+'数据库:'+@F_DBName+' 信息:'+ERROR_MESSAGE()+' 请检查后重试' RETURN
	END CATCH;
	IF @retval<>0 --链接服务器无法连接远程服务器
	BEGIN 
	SELECT @Result='IP:'+@F_DBIP+'数据库:'+@F_DBName+' 测试连通失败,请检查后重试' RETURN
	END 

	UPDATE T_BaseParamDB SET F_DBPSW='' WHERE F_ID=@F_ID

FETCH NEXT  FROM SynTable_CURSOR  INTO @F_ID,@F_DBType,@F_BigZoneID,@F_BattleZoneID,@F_DBIP,@F_DBPort,@F_DBName,@F_DBUser,@F_DBPSW
END
CLOSE SynTable_CURSOR
DEALLOCATE SynTable_CURSOR
--游标结束


--建立作业计划开始
BEGIN TRANSACTION
DECLARE @ReturnCode INT
SELECT @ReturnCode = 0
/****** 对象:  JobCategory [[Uncategorized (Local)]]]    脚本日期: 02/23/2012 13:53:13 ******/
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM msdb.dbo.syscategories WHERE name=N'[Uncategorized (Local)]' AND category_class=1)
BEGIN
EXEC @ReturnCode = msdb.dbo.sp_add_category @class=N'JOB', @type=N'LOCAL', @name=N'[Uncategorized (Local)]'
IF (@@ERROR <> 0 OR @ReturnCode <> 0) 
BEGIN 
SELECT @Result='无法添加工作类别,请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback
END
END

DECLARE @jobId BINARY(16),@DelJobName VARCHAR(100)
SELECT @JobID = job_id ,@DelJobName=[name] FROM   msdb.dbo.sysjobs WHERE (name = '作业:DigGameDB挖掘游戏数据')           
IF (@JobID IS NOT NULL)                
BEGIN              
	-- 检查此作业是否为多重服务器作业              
	IF (EXISTS (SELECT  *  FROM msdb.dbo.sysjobservers  WHERE   (job_id = @JobID) AND (server_id <> 0)))             
	BEGIN                        
		--RAISERROR (N'无法导入作业，因为已经有相同名称的多重服务器作业。', 16, 1)
		SELECT @Result='无法导入作业，因为已经有相同名称的多重服务器作业,请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback               
	END             
	ELSE      
	BEGIN             
		EXECUTE msdb.dbo.sp_DELETE_job @job_name = @DelJobName      
		SELECT @JobID = NULL            
	END      
END       
print @Result

EXEC @ReturnCode =  msdb.dbo.sp_add_job @job_name=N'作业:DigGameDB挖掘游戏数据', 
		@enabled=1, 
		@notify_level_eventlog=2, 
		@notify_level_email=0, 
		@notify_level_netsend=0, 
		@notify_level_page=0, 
		@delete_level=0, 
		@description=N'用于挖掘游戏数据', 
		@category_name=N'[Uncategorized (Local)]', 
		@owner_login_name=N'sa', @job_id = @jobId OUTPUT
IF (@@ERROR <> 0 OR @ReturnCode <> 0)
BEGIN 
SELECT @Result='添加工作失败,请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback
END
/****** 对象:  Step [1.挖掘GSLOG_DB数据]    脚本日期: 02/23/2012 13:53:14 ******/
EXEC @ReturnCode = msdb.dbo.sp_add_jobstep @job_id=@jobId, @step_name=N'1.挖掘GSLOG_DB数据', 
		@step_id=1, 
		@cmdexec_success_code=0, 
		@ON_success_action=3, 
		@ON_success_step_id=0, 
		@on_fail_action=3, 
		@on_fail_step_id=0, 
		@retry_attempts=1, 
		@retry_interval=10,  
		@os_run_priority=0, @subsystem=N'TSQL', 
		@command=N'DECLARE	@return_value int,@Result int
EXEC	@return_value = [dbo].[_JOB_Dig_GSLOGDB]
		@Result = @Result OUTPUT
IF @result<>0
BEGIN DECLARE @ErrorStr VARCHAR(300)
SELECT @ErrorStr=N''神龙游提示您:[1.挖掘GSLOG_DB数据]执行失败-具体内容请查看-数据库DigGameDB表[T_JobMsg]''
RAISERROR (@ErrorStr, 16, 1) 
END', 
		@database_name=N'DigGameDB', 
		@flags=0
IF (@@ERROR <> 0 OR @ReturnCode <> 0)
BEGIN 
SELECT @Result='添加工作步骤失败[1.挖掘GSLOG_DB数据],请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback
END
/****** 对象:  Step [2.挖掘GAMECOREDB数据]    脚本日期: 08/23/2012 15:04:01 ******/
EXEC @ReturnCode = msdb.dbo.sp_add_jobstep @job_id=@jobId, @step_name=N'2.挖掘GAMECOREDB数据', 
		@step_id=2, 
		@cmdexec_success_code=0, 
		@on_success_action=3, 
		@on_success_step_id=0, 
		@on_fail_action=3, 
		@on_fail_step_id=0, 
		@retry_attempts=0, 
		@retry_interval=0, 
		@os_run_priority=0, @subsystem=N'TSQL', 
		@command=N'DECLARE	@return_value int,@Result int
EXEC	@return_value = [dbo].[_JOB_Dig_GameCoreDB]
		@Result = @Result OUTPUT
IF @result<>0
BEGIN DECLARE @ErrorStr VARCHAR(300)
SELECT @ErrorStr=N''神龙游提示您:[2.挖掘GAMECOREDB数据]执行失败-具体内容请查看-数据库DigGameDB表[T_JobMsg]''
RAISERROR (@ErrorStr, 16, 1) 
END', 
		@database_name=N'DigGameDB', 
		@flags=0
IF (@@ERROR <> 0 OR @ReturnCode <> 0)
BEGIN 
SELECT @Result='添加工作步骤失败[2.挖掘GAMELOGDB数据],请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback
END
/****** 对象:  Step [3.挖掘GSDATADB数据]    脚本日期: 08/23/2012 15:04:01 ******/
EXEC @ReturnCode = msdb.dbo.sp_add_jobstep @job_id=@jobId, @step_name=N'3.挖掘GSDATADB数据', 
		@step_id=3, 
		@cmdexec_success_code=0, 
		@on_success_action=3, 
		@on_success_step_id=0, 
		@on_fail_action=3, 
		@on_fail_step_id=0, 
		@retry_attempts=0, 
		@retry_interval=0, 
		@os_run_priority=0, @subsystem=N'TSQL', 
		@command=N'DECLARE	@return_value int,@Result int
EXEC	@return_value = [dbo].[_JOB_Dig_GSDATADB]

IF @result<>0
BEGIN DECLARE @ErrorStr VARCHAR(300)
SELECT @ErrorStr=N''神龙游提示您:[3.挖掘GSDATADB数据]执行失败-具体内容请查看-数据库DigGameDB表[T_JobMsg]''
RAISERROR (@ErrorStr, 16, 1) 
END', 
		@database_name=N'DigGameDB', 
		@flags=0
IF (@@ERROR <> 0 OR @ReturnCode <> 0)
BEGIN 
SELECT @Result='添加工作步骤失败[3.挖掘GSDATADB数据],请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback
END
/****** 对象:  Step [4.挖掘GameLogDB数据]    脚本日期: 02/23/2012 13:53:14 ******/
EXEC @ReturnCode = msdb.dbo.sp_add_jobstep @job_id=@jobId, @step_name=N'4.挖掘GameLogDB数据', 
		@step_id=4, 
		@cmdexec_success_code=0, 
		@ON_success_action=1, 
		@ON_success_step_id=0, 
		@ON_fail_action=2, 
		@ON_fail_step_id=0, 
		@retry_attempts=0, 
		@retry_interval=0, 
		@os_run_priority=0, @subsystem=N'TSQL', 
		@command=N'DECLARE	@return_value int,@Result int
EXEC	@return_value = [dbo].[_JOB_Dig_GameLogDB]
		@Result = @Result OUTPUT
IF @result<>0
BEGIN DECLARE @ErrorStr VARCHAR(300)
SELECT @ErrorStr=N''神龙游提示您:[4.挖掘GameLogDB数据]执行失败-具体内容请查看-数据库DigGameDB表[T_JobMsg]''
RAISERROR (@ErrorStr, 16, 1) 
END', 
		@database_name=N'DigGameDB', 
		@flags=0
IF (@@ERROR <> 0 OR @ReturnCode <> 0)
BEGIN 
SELECT @Result='添加工作步骤失败[4.挖掘GameLogDB数据],请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback
END



EXEC @ReturnCode = msdb.dbo.sp_UPDATE_job @job_id = @jobId, @start_step_id = 1
IF (@@ERROR <> 0 OR @ReturnCode <> 0)
BEGIN 
SELECT @Result='更新工作失败[调整启用步骤],请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback
END
DECLARE @jobdate INT,@jobtime INT,@jtime DATETIME
--工作每天运行时间@jtime
SET @jtime=CAST('4:15' AS DATETIME)
SET @jobdate=CAST(replace(convert(VARCHAR(10),GETDATE(),120),'-','') AS INT);
SET @jobtime=CAST(replace(substring(convert(VARCHAR(19),@jtime,120),12,8),':','') AS INT);
EXEC @ReturnCode = msdb.dbo.sp_add_jobschedule @job_id=@jobId, @name=N'工作计划[重复执行,定时]', 
		@enabled=1, 
		@freq_type=4, 
		@freq_interval=1, 
		@freq_subday_type=1, 
		@freq_subday_interval=0, 
		@freq_relative_interval=0, 
		@freq_recurrence_factor=0, 
		@active_start_date=@jobdate, 
		@active_END_date=99991231, 
		@active_start_time=@jobtime, 
		@active_END_time=235959
IF (@@ERROR <> 0 OR @ReturnCode <> 0)
BEGIN 
SELECT @Result='创建工作运行时间失败,请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback
END
EXEC @ReturnCode = msdb.dbo.sp_add_jobserver @job_id = @jobId, @server_name = N'(local)'
IF (@@ERROR <> 0 OR @ReturnCode <> 0)
BEGIN 
SELECT @Result='更新工作失败[调整启用步骤],请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback
END
COMMIT TRANSACTION
--建立作业计划结束

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--建立作业计划开始
BEGIN TRANSACTION a
--DECLARE @ReturnCode INT
SELECT @ReturnCode = 0
/****** 对象:  JobCategory [[Uncategorized (Local)]]]    脚本日期: 02/23/2012 13:53:13 ******/
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM msdb.dbo.syscategories WHERE name=N'[Uncategorized (Local)]' AND category_class=1)
BEGIN
EXEC @ReturnCode = msdb.dbo.sp_add_category @class=N'JOB', @type=N'LOCAL', @name=N'[Uncategorized (Local)]'
IF (@@ERROR <> 0 OR @ReturnCode <> 0) 
BEGIN 
SELECT @Result='无法添加工作类别,请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback
END
END

--DECLARE @jobId BINARY(16),@DelJobName VARCHAR(100)
SELECT @JobID = NULL ,@DelJobName=NULL 
SELECT @JobID = job_id ,@DelJobName=[name] FROM   msdb.dbo.sysjobs WHERE (name = '作业:DigGameDB挖掘游戏数据(当天)')           
IF (@JobID IS NOT NULL)                
BEGIN              
	-- 检查此作业是否为多重服务器作业              
	IF (EXISTS (SELECT  *  FROM msdb.dbo.sysjobservers  WHERE   (job_id = @JobID) AND (server_id <> 0)))             
	BEGIN                        
		--RAISERROR (N'无法导入作业，因为已经有相同名称的多重服务器作业。', 16, 1)
		SELECT @Result='无法导入作业，因为已经有相同名称的多重服务器作业,请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback               
	END             
	ELSE      
	BEGIN             
		EXECUTE msdb.dbo.sp_DELETE_job @job_name = @DelJobName      
		SELECT @JobID = NULL            
	END      
END       


EXEC @ReturnCode =  msdb.dbo.sp_add_job @job_name=N'作业:DigGameDB挖掘游戏数据(当天)', 
		@enabled=1, 
		@notify_level_eventlog=2, 
		@notify_level_email=0, 
		@notify_level_netsend=0, 
		@notify_level_page=0, 
		@delete_level=0, 
		@description=N'用于挖掘游戏数据,Check Table [T_BaseJobConfig]', 
		@category_name=N'[Uncategorized (Local)]', 
		@owner_login_name=N'sa', @job_id = @jobId OUTPUT
IF (@@ERROR <> 0 OR @ReturnCode <> 0)
BEGIN 
SELECT @Result='添加工作失败,请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback
END
/****** 对象:  Step [1.挖掘GAMELOGDB数据]    脚本日期: 02/23/2012 13:53:14 ******/
EXEC @ReturnCode = msdb.dbo.sp_add_jobstep @job_id=@jobId, @step_name=N'1.Run _JOB_Dig_Today', 
		@step_id=1, 
		@cmdexec_success_code=0, 
		@ON_success_action=1, 
		@ON_success_step_id=0, 
		@on_fail_action=2, 
		@on_fail_step_id=0, 
		@retry_attempts=1, 
		@retry_interval=10,  
		@os_run_priority=0, @subsystem=N'TSQL', 
		@command=N'DECLARE @Result int
		EXEC [dbo].[_JOB_Dig_Today]
		@Result = @Result OUTPUT
		IF @result<>0
		BEGIN DECLARE @ErrorStr VARCHAR(300)
		SELECT @ErrorStr=N''神龙游提示您:作业:DigGameDB挖掘游戏数据(当天) 执行失败-具体内容请查看-数据库DigGameDB表[T_JobMsg]''
		RAISERROR (@ErrorStr, 16, 1) 
		END', 
		@database_name=N'DigGameDB', 
		@flags=0
IF (@@ERROR <> 0 OR @ReturnCode <> 0)
BEGIN 
SELECT @Result='添加工作步骤失败[1.Run _JOB_Dig_Today],请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback
END

--DECLARE @jobdate INT,@jobtime INT,@jtime DATETIME
--工作每天运行时间@jtime
SET @jtime=CAST('4:15' AS DATETIME)
SET @jobdate=CAST(replace(convert(VARCHAR(10),GETDATE(),120),'-','') AS INT);
SET @jobtime=CAST(replace(substring(convert(VARCHAR(19),@jtime,120),12,8),':','') AS INT);
EXEC @ReturnCode = msdb.dbo.sp_add_jobschedule @job_id=@jobId, @name=N'工作计划[重复执行,间隔时间]', 
		@enabled=1, 
		@freq_type=4, 
		@freq_interval=1, 
		@freq_subday_type=4, 
		@freq_subday_interval=5, --时间间隔
		@freq_relative_interval=0, 
		@freq_recurrence_factor=0, 
		@active_start_date=@jobdate, 
		@active_END_date=99991231, 
		@active_start_time=0, 
		@active_END_time=235959
IF (@@ERROR <> 0 OR @ReturnCode <> 0)
BEGIN 
SELECT @Result='创建工作运行时间失败,请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback
END
EXEC @ReturnCode = msdb.dbo.sp_add_jobserver @job_id = @jobId, @server_name = N'(local)'
IF (@@ERROR <> 0 OR @ReturnCode <> 0)
BEGIN 
SELECT @Result='更新工作失败[调整启用步骤],请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback
END
COMMIT TRANSACTION a
--建立作业计划结束

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

--建立作业计划开始
BEGIN TRANSACTION a
--DECLARE @ReturnCode INT
SELECT @ReturnCode = 0
/****** 对象:  JobCategory [[Uncategorized (Local)]]]    脚本日期: 02/23/2012 13:53:13 ******/
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT name FROM msdb.dbo.syscategories WHERE name=N'[Uncategorized (Local)]' AND category_class=1)
BEGIN
EXEC @ReturnCode = msdb.dbo.sp_add_category @class=N'JOB', @type=N'LOCAL', @name=N'[Uncategorized (Local)]'
IF (@@ERROR <> 0 OR @ReturnCode <> 0) 
BEGIN 
SELECT @Result='无法添加工作类别,请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback
END
END

--DECLARE @jobId BINARY(16),@DelJobName VARCHAR(100)
SELECT @JobID = NULL ,@DelJobName=NULL 
SELECT @JobID = job_id ,@DelJobName=[name] FROM   msdb.dbo.sysjobs WHERE (name = '作业:DigGameDB挖掘游戏数据(当天)2')           
IF (@JobID IS NOT NULL)                
BEGIN              
	-- 检查此作业是否为多重服务器作业              
	IF (EXISTS (SELECT  *  FROM msdb.dbo.sysjobservers  WHERE   (job_id = @JobID) AND (server_id <> 0)))             
	BEGIN                        
		--RAISERROR (N'无法导入作业，因为已经有相同名称的多重服务器作业。', 16, 1)
		SELECT @Result='无法导入作业，因为已经有相同名称的多重服务器作业,请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback               
	END             
	ELSE      
	BEGIN             
		EXECUTE msdb.dbo.sp_DELETE_job @job_name = @DelJobName      
		SELECT @JobID = NULL            
	END      
END       


EXEC @ReturnCode =  msdb.dbo.sp_add_job @job_name=N'作业:DigGameDB挖掘游戏数据(当天)2', 
		@enabled=1, 
		@notify_level_eventlog=2, 
		@notify_level_email=0, 
		@notify_level_netsend=0, 
		@notify_level_page=0, 
		@delete_level=0, 
		@description=N'用于挖掘游戏数据,Check Table [T_BaseJobConfig]', 
		@category_name=N'[Uncategorized (Local)]', 
		@owner_login_name=N'sa', @job_id = @jobId OUTPUT
IF (@@ERROR <> 0 OR @ReturnCode <> 0)
BEGIN 
SELECT @Result='添加工作失败,请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback
END
/****** 对象:  Step [1.挖掘GAMELOGDB数据]    脚本日期: 02/23/2012 13:53:14 ******/
EXEC @ReturnCode = msdb.dbo.sp_add_jobstep @job_id=@jobId, @step_name=N'1.Run _JOB_Dig_Today', 
		@step_id=1, 
		@cmdexec_success_code=0, 
		@ON_success_action=1, 
		@ON_success_step_id=0, 
		@on_fail_action=2, 
		@on_fail_step_id=0, 
		@retry_attempts=1, 
		@retry_interval=10,  
		@os_run_priority=0, @subsystem=N'TSQL', 
		@command=N'DECLARE @Result int,@sdate DATETIME
		SELECT @sdate=convert(VARCHAR(10),GETDATE(),120)
		EXEC	[dbo].[_Dig_GameCoreDB]
				@DigDate = @sdate,
				@Result = @Result OUTPUT
		IF @result<>0
		BEGIN DECLARE @ErrorStr VARCHAR(300)
		SELECT @ErrorStr=N''神龙游提示您:作业:DigGameDB挖掘游戏数据(当天) 执行失败-具体内容请查看-数据库DigGameDB表[T_JobMsg]''
		RAISERROR (@ErrorStr, 16, 1) 
		END', 
		@database_name=N'DigGameDB', 
		@flags=0
IF (@@ERROR <> 0 OR @ReturnCode <> 0)
BEGIN 
SELECT @Result='添加工作步骤失败[1.Run _JOB_Dig_Today],请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback
END

--DECLARE @jobdate INT,@jobtime INT,@jtime DATETIME
--工作每天运行时间@jtime
SET @jtime=CAST('4:15' AS DATETIME)
SET @jobdate=CAST(replace(convert(VARCHAR(10),GETDATE(),120),'-','') AS INT);
SET @jobtime=CAST(replace(substring(convert(VARCHAR(19),@jtime,120),12,8),':','') AS INT);
EXEC @ReturnCode = msdb.dbo.sp_add_jobschedule @job_id=@jobId, @name=N'工作计划[重复执行,间隔时间]', 
		@enabled=1, 
		@freq_type=4, 
		@freq_interval=1, 
		@freq_subday_type=4, 
		@freq_subday_interval=5, --时间间隔
		@freq_relative_interval=0, 
		@freq_recurrence_factor=0, 
		@active_start_date=@jobdate, 
		@active_END_date=99991231, 
		@active_start_time=0, 
		@active_END_time=235959
IF (@@ERROR <> 0 OR @ReturnCode <> 0)
BEGIN 
SELECT @Result='创建工作运行时间失败,请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback
END
EXEC @ReturnCode = msdb.dbo.sp_add_jobserver @job_id = @jobId, @server_name = N'(local)'
IF (@@ERROR <> 0 OR @ReturnCode <> 0)
BEGIN 
SELECT @Result='更新工作失败[调整启用步骤],请检查后重试' GOTO QuitWithRollback
END
COMMIT TRANSACTION a
--建立作业计划结束
print @Result

END TRY
BEGIN CATCH
SELECT @Result=ERROR_MESSAGE()
IF (@@TRANCOUNT > 0) ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
END CATCH
RETURN
END

QuitWithRollback:
IF (@@TRANCOUNT > 0) ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
RETURN
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[_Init_DigAllGameDB]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:01 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
------------------------------------
--项目名称：初始化时间区间内的统计
--说明：
--时间：2011-12-31 16:11:32 HCH
------------------------------------
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[_Init_DigAllGameDB]
@DigDateB SMALLDATETIME,			--开始日期
@DigDateE SMALLDATETIME=NULL,	--结束日期
@ResultStr varchar(300) OUTPUT
 AS 
BEGIN
	DECLARE	@Result int,@return_value int
    SELECT @ResultStr='初始化数据统计成功,具体内容请查看日志表T_BaseJobMsg'
	BEGIN TRY
	EXEC	@return_value = [dbo].[_Dig_GSLOGDB]
			@DigDate = @DigDateB,
			@DigDateEnd = @DigDateE,
			@Result = @Result OUTPUT

	EXEC	@return_value = [dbo].[_Dig_GameCoreDB]
			@DigDate = @DigDateB,
			@DigDateEnd = @DigDateE,
			@Result = @Result OUTPUT

	EXEC	@return_value = [dbo].[_Dig_GSDATADB]
			@DigDate = @DigDateB,
			@DigDateEnd = @DigDateE,
			@Result = @Result OUTPUT

	EXEC	@return_value = [dbo].[_Dig_GameLogDB]
			@DigDate = @DigDateB,
			@DigDateEnd = @DigDateE,
			@Result = @Result OUTPUT

 
	END TRY
	BEGIN CATCH
	SELECT @Result='初始化数据统计错误 存储过程_Init_Dig_GSLOGDB 消息:'+ERROR_MESSAGE()+''
	INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES ('存储过程[_Init_DigAllGameDB]',N'消息:'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
	END CATCH

end
GO
/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[_JOB_HDig_UserCoreDB_Money]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:01 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
------------------------------------
--项目名称：作业使用
--说明：
--时间：2011-12-31 16:11:32 HCH
------------------------------------
Create PROCEDURE [dbo].[_JOB_HDig_UserCoreDB_Money]
@Result int output
 AS 
BEGIN

	DECLARE	@return_value int,@sdate DATETIME
	SELECT @sdate=convert(VARCHAR(10),GETDATE(),120)

	BEGIN TRY
	EXEC	@return_value = [dbo].[_Dig_UserCoreDB_Money]
			@DigDate = @sdate,
			@Result = @Result OUTPUT
	END TRY
	BEGIN CATCH
	SELECT @Result=1
	INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES ('存储过程[_Dig_UserCoreDB_Money]_JOB_HDig',N'消息:'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
	END CATCH


end
GO

	END TRY
	BEGIN CATCH

@Result int output
 AS

			@DigDate = @sdate,
			@Result = @Result OUTPUT
	END TRY
	BEGIN CATCH

/****** Object:  StoredProcedure [dbo].[_JOB_Dig_Today]    Script Date: 05/05/2017 18:08:01 ******/
SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO
------------------------------------
--项目名称：作业使用
--说明：
--时间：2011-12-31 16:11:32 HCH
------------------------------------
CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[_JOB_Dig_Today]
@Result INT OUTPUT
 AS 
BEGIN
	SELECT @Result=0
	--IF NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_BaseJobConfig WHERE F_State=0 AND F_RunTime<=dateadd(n,-F_Interval,GETDATE()))
	--RETURN

	DECLARE @GUID VARCHAR(36)
	SELECT @GUID =newid()

	DECLARE	@JobItem NVARCHAR(50),@sdate DATETIME
	SELECT @sdate=convert(VARCHAR(10),GETDATE(),120)
------------------------------

	SELECT @JobItem='_Dig_GameLogDB'
	IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_BaseJobConfig WHERE F_State=0 AND F_JobItem=@JobItem AND F_RunTime<=dateadd(n,-F_Interval,GETDATE()))
	BEGIN
		UPDATE T_BaseJobConfig SET F_State=1 WHERE F_JobItem=@JobItem
		BEGIN TRY
		EXEC	[dbo].[_Dig_GameLogDB]
				@DigDate = @sdate,
				@Result = @Result OUTPUT
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
		SELECT @Result=1
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'Pro:[_JOB_Dig_Today] Item:[_Dig_GameLogDB] MSG:'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
		END CATCH
		UPDATE T_BaseJobConfig SET F_State=0,F_RunTime=GetDate() WHERE F_JobItem=@JobItem
	END

------------------------------

	SELECT @JobItem='_Dig_GameCoreDB'
	IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_BaseJobConfig WHERE F_State=0 AND F_JobItem=@JobItem AND F_RunTime<=dateadd(n,-F_Interval,GETDATE()))
	BEGIN
		UPDATE T_BaseJobConfig SET F_State=1 WHERE F_JobItem=@JobItem
		BEGIN TRY
		EXEC	[dbo].[_Dig_GameCoreDB]
				@DigDate = @sdate,
				@Result = @Result OUTPUT
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
		SELECT @Result=1
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'Pro:[_JOB_Dig_Today] Item:[_Dig_GameCoreDB] MSG:'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
		END CATCH
		UPDATE T_BaseJobConfig SET F_State=0,F_RunTime=GetDate() WHERE F_JobItem=@JobItem
	END

------------------------------

	SELECT @JobItem='_Dig_UserCoreDB'
	IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_BaseJobConfig WHERE F_State=0 AND F_JobItem=@JobItem AND F_RunTime<=dateadd(n,-F_Interval,GETDATE()))
	BEGIN
		UPDATE T_BaseJobConfig SET F_State=1 WHERE F_JobItem=@JobItem
		BEGIN TRY
		EXEC	[dbo].[_Dig_UserCoreDB]
				@DigDate = @sdate,
				@Result = @Result OUTPUT
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
		SELECT @Result=1
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'Pro:[_JOB_Dig_Today] Item:[_Dig_UserCoreDB] MSG:'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
		END CATCH
		UPDATE T_BaseJobConfig SET F_State=0,F_RunTime=GetDate() WHERE F_JobItem=@JobItem
	END

------------------------------

	SELECT @JobItem='_Dig_GSDATADB'
	IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_BaseJobConfig WHERE F_State=0 AND F_JobItem=@JobItem AND F_RunTime<=dateadd(n,-F_Interval,GETDATE()))
	BEGIN
		UPDATE T_BaseJobConfig SET F_State=1 WHERE F_JobItem=@JobItem
		BEGIN TRY
		EXEC	[dbo].[_Dig_GSDATADB]
				@DigDate = @sdate,
				@Result = @Result OUTPUT
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
		SELECT @Result=1
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'Pro:[_JOB_Dig_Today] Item:[_Dig_GSDATADB] MSG:'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
		END CATCH
		UPDATE T_BaseJobConfig SET F_State=0,F_RunTime=GetDate() WHERE F_JobItem=@JobItem
	END

------------------------------

	SELECT @JobItem='_Dig_GSLOGDB'
	IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_BaseJobConfig WHERE F_State=0 AND F_JobItem=@JobItem AND F_RunTime<=dateadd(n,-F_Interval,GETDATE()))
	BEGIN
		UPDATE T_BaseJobConfig SET F_State=1 WHERE F_JobItem=@JobItem
		BEGIN TRY
		EXEC	[dbo].[_Dig_GSLOGDB]
				@DigDate = @sdate,
				@Result = @Result OUTPUT
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
		SELECT @Result=1
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'Pro:[_JOB_Dig_Today] Item:[_Dig_GSLOGDB] MSG:'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
		END CATCH
		UPDATE T_BaseJobConfig SET F_State=0,F_RunTime=GetDate() WHERE F_JobItem=@JobItem
	END

------------------------------

	SELECT @JobItem='_Dig_GSSDB'
	IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM T_BaseJobConfig WHERE F_State=0 AND F_JobItem=@JobItem AND F_RunTime<=dateadd(n,-F_Interval,GETDATE()))
	BEGIN
		UPDATE T_BaseJobConfig SET F_State=1 WHERE F_JobItem=@JobItem
		BEGIN TRY
		EXEC	[dbo].[_Dig_GSSDB]
				@DigDate = @sdate,
				@Result = @Result OUTPUT
		END TRY
		BEGIN CATCH
		SELECT @Result=1
		INSERT INTO T_BaseJobMsg (F_RunID,F_Msg) VALUES (@GUID,N'Pro:[_JOB_Dig_Today] Item:[_Dig_GSSDB] MSG:'+ERROR_MESSAGE())
		END CATCH
		UPDATE T_BaseJobConfig SET F_State=0,F_RunTime=GetDate() WHERE F_JobItem=@JobItem
	END
END
GO
